font-size: 17.6px; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">QUARTER CENTURY AGO MY SHIP WENT TO AUSTRALIA TO LOAD COKING COAL..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">COUPLE OF DAYS BEFORE PM CHANDRASHEKHAR SOLD 67 TONNES OF PURE GOLD TO ROTHSCHILDs BANKS&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE CONFERENCE HALL WAS PACKED WITH AUSSIE AGENTS, CHARTERERS, CUSTOMS, IMMIGRATION, COASTGUARD , AGRICULTURE DPT ETC</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ONE CHARTERER CUNT ASK ME\" CAPTAIN, CAN YOU PAY US FOR THIS COAL--YOU COUNTRY IS BANKRUPT\" AND HE SHOVED A LOCAL NEWSPAPER UNDER MY NOSE</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I WARNED HIM \" DONT GET INDIA PISSED OFF, WE MIGHT DECIDE TO NUKE YOU WITH A ICBM\"</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THERE WAS STUNNED SILENCE&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THEN A AGENT SAID \" USA WILL NEVER ALLOW IT \"</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ATLEAST THEY NEVER CONTESTED MY STATEMENT</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ONE OF MY CHIEF OFFICERs WIFE WAS ON BOARD FOR THE FIRST MAIDEN TRIP. I ASKED HER , \"FIRST TIME OUT OF INDIA ?\"</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SHE SAID \"NOPE --I HAVE BEEN TO SWITZERLAND AND EUROPE SEVERAL TIMES WITH MY DAD \"</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">HER DAD USED TO WORK FOR SAIL -- SHE HERSELF TOLD ME \"TOP SHOTS IN SAIL GET KICKBACKS FROM AUSTRALIA TO IMPORT COKING COAL \"</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SHE SAID THERE WAS ONE MMTC INDIAN BOSS WHO DID NOT WANT MONEY -HE ONLY WANTED YOUNG WHITE GIRLS TO HAVE SEX WHILE ON JAUNTS ABROAD</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">LATER I VERIFIED THIS WITH A CONTACT IN MMTC-- HE SAID THAT MANS DAUGHTER WOULD FUCK ANY MAN - EVEN SERVANTS -SHE WAS JUST 14 - A NYMPHOMANIAC&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE GREAT QUALITY OF AUSTRALIAN COKING COAL FOR INDIAN STEEL INDUSTRY HAS BEEN SUSTAINED BY CORRUPT INDIAN BOSSES IN SAIL AND STEEL INDUSTRY--IT IS A LIE</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NO MATTER HOW MUCH PM MODI JUMPS UP AND DOWN --INDIA WILL CONTINUE BURNING COAL-- WE KNOW APCO MODIs CLANDESTINE ROLE IN SHORING UP PARIS COP21.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I WROTE THE BELOW POST FOR PM MODI AND JNU WOMAN NIRMALA SIRARAMAN WHO WENT TO NAIROBI FOR WTO.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">READ ALL SIX PARTS --</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/12/thermal-coal-power-plants-clean-exhaust.html</span></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">INDIA HAS THE THIRD HIGHEST RESERVES OF COAL ON THIS PLANET</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Thermal coal, is suitable for electric power production. Thermal coal is ground into a fine powder that burns quickly at high heats and is used in power plants to heat water in boilers that run steam turbines.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Metallurgical or coking coal has a higher energy content and lower moisture and is used to make iron, steel and other metals.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Coking coal is simply coal that has already had the impurities burned out of it. Primarily, coking coal is low ash and also low sulfur and phosphorus. These impurities would adversely affect steel smelted using the coke.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">OUR COAL IMPORT BILL IS MORE THAN 1.1 LAKH CRORES ANUALLY .. THERE ARE HUGE KICKBACKS FOR POLITICIANS AND TOP SAIL OFFICIALS</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Coking coal produced in India has higher ash content which makes it less suitable to use with the technology available here--and there has been VERY LITTLE effort to do something about this..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Steel companies in India fulfill 83% of their coking coal requirements through imports--MAJJA HAI --&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THERE ARE SEVERAL GRADES OF COAL IN INDIA WHICH CAN BE EASILY UPGRADED TO COKING COAL. BUT HEY, NOBODY WANTS TO DO IT. KICKBACKS INTO SWISS BANKS WILL VANISH&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Coking coal is fed into ovens and subjected to oxygen-free pyrolysis, a process that heats the coal to approximately 1,100 degrees Celsius. It melts it and drives off any volatile compounds and impurities to leave pure carbon. The hot, purified, liquefied carbon solidifies into lumps called \"coke\" that can be fed into a blast furnace along with iron ore and limestone to produce steel.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE WATCH !</span></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">MODI WANTS TO RUN OUR STEEL/ HEAVY INDUSTRIES WITH SOLAR AND WIND POWER !</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/10/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_10.html?showComment=1507598026404#c8205610240397427650\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 10, 2017 at 6:43 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_9MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nDO NOT STOP DIWALI CELEBRATIONS AND BURNING OF CROP STUBBLE IN PUNJAB AND HARYANA...<br />\nIF INDIA HAS TO BE THIS PLANETs NO 1 SUPERPOWER IN 16 YEARS WE NEED A CAPITAL WHICH IS NOT PRONE TO SMOG DUE TO TEMPERATURE INVERSION... SHIFT THE CAPITAL ... NEW DELHI HAD OUTLIVED ITS USE...Indian were to first on the planet to do agriculture. ..We taught the rest of the planet about the magic of BIOCHAR \u2026 Biochar has the ability to sequester carbon out of the atmosphere and back into the ground ...Tall grasses burn quick and hot, however, close to the ground where the roots start, air is excluded so the base of the grasses will pyrolyze and not burn\u2026 Carbon is the most essential element of soil fertility. When organic matter is added to agricultural soils to increase carbon levels, most of it rapidly decomposes to carbon dioxide and escapes to the atmosphere... Only a very small percentage eventually becomes stable humic matter... Humification takes decades to centuries..The process creates a fine-grained, highly porous charcoal that helps soils retain nutrients and water\u2026.Biochar serves as an electron buffer for redox reactions and helps bacteria swap electrons among themselves, improving their metabolic efficiency as a microbial community.. ..With its pores and its electrical charges, biochar is capable of both aBsorption and aDsorption.. ..The surfaces of biochar, both internal and external, aDsorb materials by electro-chemical bonds, working like an electric sponge...Biochar surfaces adsorb carbon and retain it in compounds with minerals, supporting at the same time a large microbial community that potentially makes more efficient use of organic debris containing carbon and other nutrients...Unlike biochar, compost is quickly broken down by microbial action in soil over months to at most, decades, depending primarily on climate... Biochar lasts at least ten times longer in most soils.... Biochar is effective at retaining nitrogen in soils and there is NO need for CHEMICAL UREA...The desh drohi GREEN REVOLUTION has left us with a rapidly deteriorating climate, and soils that are dying and eroding.... Biochar, as a form of recalcitrant carbon, is the medicine that DELIBERETELY degraded and unproductive Indian top soils need....India was blessed with HUMUS laden topsoil with healthy microbes and earthworms for millions of years.... Just 55 years of desh drohi GREEN REVOLUTION has decimated our holy topsoil...THIS IS THE ONLY INTELLIGENT WAY TO PREVENT FARMER SUICIDES...The desh drohi GREEN REVOLUTION has caused our holy topsoil to lose 80% of their original soil organic carbon (SOC) pool...<br />\n90% of our lakes have disappeared due to artificial nitro fertIliser overuse. ..<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4259290255715405026\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_13M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/10/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_10.html?showComment=1507600455479#c5750861595378403530\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 10, 2017 at 7:24 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_15MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSLAVERY AND JEW ROTHSCHILD GO TOGETHER<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/04/indentured-coolie-slavery-reinvented.html<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/05/black-african-slave-trade-and-jews-capt.html</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">AFTER THE SANDINISTAS FREEDOM FIGHTER KICKED OUT THE JEW PRESIDENT AND THE BLOODSUCKING JEWS ( WHO CORNERED ALL THE WEALTH ) THREE AMERICAN PRESIDENTS ( REAGAN/ BUSH SR/ CLINTON ) FUNDED CONTRAS TO TO BIOLOGICAL AND CHEMICAL WARFARE ON THE HAPLESS NICARAGUAN PEOPLE..</span></b></div>\n<br />\nDONT EVER THINK THIS CAN BE BURIED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD MONOPOLISED MEDIA / HOLLYWOOD<br />\n<br />\nPOM ( USA ) was enlisted in a project with the Stormont labs of Woodland, California, and the Wackenhut Corporation to develop chemical and biological weapons that could be deployed in guerrilla warfare. POM was assigned the task of producing the munitions themselves.<br />\n<br />\nPOM ( Park On Meter ) was founded by Seth Ward Sr., the father of Walter Hubbell\u2019s wife, Suzie. While an attorney at Rose Law firm, Hubbell had shepherded POM\u2019s application to become the first company to receive an industrial development loan from the Arkansas Development Finance Authority<br />\n<br />\nWEBSTER HUBBEL IS CHELSEA CLINTONs BIOLOGICAL FATHER<br />\n<br />\nWebster Hubbell ( SEXUAL AFFAIR WITH HILLARY CLINTON ) - he served on POM's board during the early '80s.. While a partner at Rose, Hubbell served as POM's lawyer<br />\n<br />\nPOM, it has been alleged by Michael Riconosciuto, a GENIUS computer expert serving a prison sentence on drug charges in Washington state, was under secret contract to make components of prototype chemical and biological weapons for use by the Contras<br />\n<br />\nPark-On-Meter was the first company to receive a loan from the Arkansas Development Finance Authority (ADFA) set up by Arkansas Governor Bill Clinton in 1985. The ADFA took over much of the state's bond-issuing power and gave the governor Bill Clinton the ability \"essentially to create money\".<br />\n<br />\nThe ADFA has no regulator and no legislative oversight. The governor appoints the board and has the right to approve or disapprove every bond issue. There is virtually no limit on the value of bonds that can be issued. One financial advisor described this scenario as a \"prescription for abuse\".<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br />ARKANSAS WAS A HUB FOR MONEY LAUNDERING VIA SHELL COMPANIES --THANKS TO ROTHSCHILD AGENT BILL CLINTON</span></b><br />\n<br />\nThis ADFA was at the center of financial dealings in which large amounts of money could be moved around easily , discreetly.<br />\n<br />\nTheoretically, bonds could be issued to provide a loan to a company involved in laundering drug profits. That loan represented clean money. The loan could in turn be paid back with drug profits, slowly over time and in small increments. In this way drug money could be successfully filtered into the legitimate financial system.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_15BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/10/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_10.html?showComment=1507638845834#c8624852493608070071\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 10, 2017 at 6:04 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_50MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/07/king-cobra-and-snake-temples-of-kerala.html</span><br />\n<br />\nIn the Mahabharata 4000 BC, Arjuna and Lord Krishna set fire to the great and ancient Khandava forest , so that they could build their Indraprastha palace .<br />\n<br />\nEverything living in the forest died, except Maya Danava - he was saved and then arm twisted to show gratitude by designing the amazing Indraprasta hall -the hall of magic illusions where Duryodhana fell into the pool and Draupadi screamed in derision ANDHASYA PUTRA ANDAHAH --<br />\n<br />\n-- meaning son of blind King Dhritatashtra and blindfolded queen Gandhari is blind too. This extreme insult to a guest king would kick start the greatest world war MAHABHARATA on planet earth in 4000 BC.<br />\n<br />\nMaya Danava designed the Mayan calendar later -<br />\n<br />\n4 birds ( Sarngakas ) and Aswasena, the son of the Naga king Takshaka also survived this forest fire .<br />\n<br />\nAswasena later tried to take revenge for his mother, and hid in the quiver of Karna who was fighting Arjuna still like an arrow, but Arjuna's charioter Lord Krishna prevented this dart from hitting Arjuna by causing the horses to bend down thus sinking the chariot wheels. .<br />\n<br />\n60 years after the Mahabharata war, Takshaka had his revenge by killing Parikshit, Arjuna's grandson. Parikshit was forewarned and so he build a tower in the midle of a lake, with every hole and crevice plugged.<br />\n<br />\nBut Takshaka coverted itself into a worm and bore into a mango, which was to be taken in a basket as food. Parikshit was engulfed in flames due to the potency of the venom--as a poetic justice , as Takshaka's wife was killed in the Khandava forest fire.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">KRISHNA WOULD REAP HIS KARMA WHEN HIS ENTIRE POWER DRUNK YADAV CLAN WOULD PERISH&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">A grateful Maya Danava cried in gratitude after he was saved from the great Khandava forest fire -- how he can ever repay Arjuna.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\nImmediately Lord Krishna trapped him. \"Let a palatial Sabha (meeting hall) as thou choosest, be built by thee, if thou, O son of Diti, who art the foremost of all artists, desirest to do good to Yudhishthira the just (Mbh.2.1)\".<br />\n<br />\nKrishna told Arjuna \"Your city has been constructed by Vishwakarma and is truly beautiful. However, the Indraprastha palace is much too plain for such a wonderful city. Let a palatial meeting hall be constructed for Yudhishtra the just. Maya Danava is the best person to construct it, being the architect of the Asuras.\" Maya measured out a plot of land five thousand cubits square and began the construction. Soon the peerless palace of great beauty encrusted with diamonds was completed. The columns of this palace were made of gold. Maya appointed 8000 Danavas called Kinkaras ( from Kerala ) to guard this palace. Inside the palace, there were many amazing devices. It took the Maya just fourteen months to complete this building. Everything was made as per the principles of Vaastu.<br />\n<br />\nIn Indian history, Mayan appears several times, most significantly as the author of Mayamatam, \"Concept of Mayan\" which is a Vaastu Shastra, a text on art, architecture and town planning.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_50MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_50BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_50B_box\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_51B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7203152711210853632\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_51M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/10/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_10.html?showComment=1507638960001#c7203152711210853632\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 10, 2017 at 6:06 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_51MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nNarada on hearing of this palace hall came to visit , and he cried \"O Child, I have never seen nor heard ever before, neither among men, nor among the gods, any assembly room built of gems and precious stones like this hall of thine. I have been to the hall of Indra, it is not equal to yours. I have been to the hall of Yama that shines like burnished gold, but it is inferior to this hall in beauty. I have visited Pushakaramalini, the hall of Varuna, floating in the waters, but it is not equal to yours. The hall of Kubera certainly displays his immense wealth, but is not as beautiful as yours. I have been to the hall of Lord Brahma, the grandsire of all beings, where the Prajapatis offer him worship, but its splendor is nothing to yours. I have seen all these assembly halls O King, but without question, your hall is the best that ever was.\"<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nVaastu shastra prescribes desirable characteristics for sites and buildings based on flow of energy called Vaastu Purusha. In India, the best modern architects learn Maya Danava's Vaastu as part of their syllabus.<br />\n<br />\nUpon the onset of the Kali yuga and the departure of Lord Krishna, Yudhisthira and his four brothers retired, leaving the throne to their only descendant to survive the war of Kurukshetra, Arjuna's grandson Parikshit.</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\">King Parikshit who was killed by snake bite , was father of Emperor Jayameyjayan who built Kedarnath Temple in a grand manner .</span><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\">&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/06/6000-year-old-kedarnath-temple-highest.html</span><br />\n<br />\nKing Parikshit's son Janamejaya who was afflicted with painful debilitating rheumatism and leprosy sores ( curse of snake king ), visited Guruvayur with his Guru Atreya and was cured.<br />\n<br />\n##########<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b>THE CURSE</b></span><br />\n<br />\nEPILOGUE:<br />\n<br />\nAfter the great Kuruskhetra war , that nearly destroyed humankind and humanity alike, the battle field lay still ! The battle was over , and the vast field lay blood soaked and strewn with bodies of kings, princes and soldiers .<br />\n<br />\nThere was no mood for hip-hip huzzah among the surviving Pandava army. Most stood sullen and stunned by the gruesome scene .They were devastated at the destruction that a single war had caused.<br />\n<br />\nStunned and speechless, they scanned the battle field to check out for survivors among the lifeless. Gandhari with her blind fold still in place was crying over her dead sons. She was rambling in extreme grief , her speech slurred. \u201cDuryodhana , my son , open your eyes. speak to me my first born\u2026A hundred did we bear, all fine and proud. Was it for such a foolish end? Her husband, the blind king Dritharashtra stood by, looking lost.<br />\n<br />\nThe Pandavas and Krishna hurried over to Gandhari and Dritharashtra, to offer their respects, apologies and condolences. Sanjaya, the king\u2019s escort, gently bent down to Gandhari, to inform the blindfolded woman of the arrival of the Pandavas and Krishna. Her grief turned to a burning rage<br />\n<br />\nShe went up to Krishna and screamed .The Pandavas recoiled in fear. Gandhari cried out to Krishna \u201cYou, who I worshipped as Vishnu and You, known as an avatar of the supreme godhead. Aren\u2019t you ashamed of your doings? Could you not have averted this war with your divine will and power? Is this how you answer my prayers? Ask your mother, Devaki, the pain of losing a child. She had seven of her children being killed at birth and now I have seen a hundred sons of mine being butchered to death\u201d .<br />\n<br />\nKrishna laughed gently.<br />\n<br />\nShe now vented her steam \u201c Oh mocking god , If my years of Vishnu bhakthi have been true, and if I have been true to my husband with this blindf, then, may you die in 36 years from today. May Dwaraka be floodeld , may every one of your Yadava kin perish by killing each other, just as you made the kins of Kuru kill one another. May the Yadavas perish \u201c<br />\n<br />\nSuddenly the gravity of her words dawned on her . She has indeed been true to her devotion to Vishnu and to her blindfold . Her curse would take effect . Her anger vapourised and she fell at Krishna\u2019s feet for foregiveness .<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3--<br />\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_51MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_51BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_51B_box\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_52B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7511722909312812665\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_52M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/10/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_10.html?showComment=1507639031178#c7511722909312812665\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 10, 2017 at 6:07 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_52MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2--<br />\n<br />\nKrishna smiled and gently lifted her up. He whispered \u201c Oh mother , your curse will take effect, not only because of your true devotion towards me and your husband, but also due to the ever changing sands of time. In the mean time, let\u2019s attend to the tending of the dead and sending them away on their journey to the heavens.\u201d Lord Krishna walked past the stunned Pandavas.<br />\n<br />\nAfter the war was over Krishna was himself contemplating the end of the snooty Yadav race. They were very powerful under the protection of lord Krishna so no external force could defeat them. If the Yadavas were unharnessed , they will become a burden to the planet. Krishna realized the gravity of the situation and the importance of bringing the destruction of his own beloved race. Gandhari\u2019s curse came at the right time as if on divine cue.<br />\n<br />\nDays flew by after the coronation of Yudhishtra as the king of Hasthinapur. Krishna went back to Dwaraka to rule over the prosperous kingdom. Slowly but steadily the the curse of Gandhari bore fruit.<br />\n<br />\nThe pompous Yadavas shed their conduct, morals, scruples and humility. One incident sealed their fate. Some great sages were on pilgrimage and they stopped by at Dwarka to meet Krishna and Balarama.<br />\n<br />\nThe Yadavas, which included Bhodakas, Vrishnis, Kekeyas and Andakas, wre now at the peak of wanton uncouth behavior. A bunch of Yadava boys decided to tease the sages. They dressed Samba, the handsome son of Krishna as a woman and tied pillows on his stomach to make the woman look pregnant.<br />\n<br />\nThey approached the sages and asked them to predict whether the 'lady' would give birth to a boy or a girl. The dismayed sages saw through this charade and were shocked at this lack pf respect. In anger, on of the sages cursed them saying that the disguised boy will give birth to a lump of iron which will destroy the entire Yadava race.<br />\n<br />\nThe Yadavas, again showed extreme disrespect and responded with sarcasm, instead of an apology.<br />\n<br />\nThere was a pall of fear and impending doom the next day when Krishna\u2019s son Sambha developed labour pains and soon delivered an iron mace . They immediately rushed with the mace to Akroora and Ugrasena and in the presence of Krishna himself; they narrated the weird tide of events.<br />\n<br />\nKrishna knew the events which would transpire in future , and kept quiet. Seeing Krishna silent , Akroora cried \u201cGrind the mace to a fine powder and cast it into the ocean.\u201d The Yadavas nodded and ran to comply.<br />\n<br />\nAkroora looked with intent at Krishna, his eyes full of questions. Krishna simply smiled back. \u201cUncle, the Kala Chakra is now in motion . Sambha has played his part perfectly.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nHe left without another word, leaving both of them bewildered.<br />\n<br />\n\u201cWhat did he mean by that?\u201d asked Ugrasena. \u201cI can tell you that, father.\u201d Ugrasena turned around to the source of voice - Rukmini. \u201cThirty six year ago, Krishna prayed to Shiva for a son like him\u2014a god of detruction -does that mean anything?\u201d<br />\n<br />\nThe time for Gandhari\u2019s curse to take effect had arrived.<br />\n<br />\nOutside the palace, the Yadavas had obeyed Akroora\u2019s command and they ground the iron mace into fine powder\u2014except for a stubborn triangular piece looking like an arrow head. It was too hard to grind . The Yadavas threw everything into the sea.<br />\n<br />\nThe fear disappeared and they went back to their wanton and rowdy behavior . They started to drink heavily and were intoxicated throughout the day. Time rolled by. The triangular piece of the mace was swallowed by a fish. The fish was caught by a hunter, who upon finding the piece in the fish\u2019s entrails immediately used it to craft a fine poisonous arrow.<br />\n<br />\nThe fine powder, on the other hand, washed back ashore and deposited itself by the beautiful coast of Dwaraka. A certain sharp serrated grass grew in lush abundance in the area where the powder was deposited.<br />\n<br />\nEverything was set and in place for the final showdown.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 4--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_52MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_52BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_52B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_53B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5028966245065528614\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_53M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/10/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_10.html?showComment=1507639124969#c5028966245065528614\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 10, 2017 at 6:08 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_53MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 3--<br />\n<br />\nAfter 36 years of Mahabharat war, evil omen started to appear in the Dwaraka city. The Sudarshana chakra, Panchajanya shankh, the chariot of lord Krishna and the plough weapon of Balarama just disappeared from earth. One day, the Yadavas gathered on the beach. The liquor that they drank made them lose their senses completely.<br />\n<br />\nThey started teasing one another, bringing up the gory pasts and gruesome mistakes of each other. Satyaki and Krithavarma acted as the starting points of the doom of Dwaraka. Satyaki had fought on Pandava\u2019s side in the battle of Kurukshetra and Krithavarma, on the Kaurava side. They taunted one another, bringing back memories of the horrific war where the Pandavas cheated against the rules of war , aided and abetted by Krishna.<br />\n<br />\nIn a fit of rage, Satyaki, jumped on Krithaverma and cut his head off. The friends of Krithavarma pounced on Satyaki and a great mass brawl followed. Pradyumna, the son of Krishna, innocent though he was, found himself in the thick of the fight and was killed. As they have come to the sea shore for a pleasure, they did not carry any weapons along with them.<br />\n<br />\nThey saw the long grown sharp serrated grass in abundance along the sea shore. They picked up the grass stems and beat and killed each other. The whole area was soaked in red blood. Those grass stems are nothing but blades made of the powder of the same lump of Iron born to Samba. The curse of saints had borne fruit. Each blade of grass became a mace, smashing into the Yadavas, killing them instantly. Except Krishna, all Yadavas were killed. Krishna\u2019s charioteer Daruka and another one called Babhru only survived.<br />\n<br />\nThey both approached Sri Krishna and said: \u201cO Krishna! All Yadavas were killed. Whereabouts of Balarama are not known. It is better to search for him.\u201d Balarama was in deep meditation under a tree. Seeing this, Krishna told Daruka, \u201c\u201cO Daruka! you immediately go to Hastinapura and inform Dharmaja about the mass massacre of Yadavas and bring Arjuna here. He will look after everything.\u201d said Krishna. Accordingly, Daruka rushed towards Hastinapura in a chariot. Krishna went to the place where Balarama was sitting and said \u201cO brother Balarama! I will sit in meditation along with you.\u201d<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nBut there was no reply from Balarama. A long spiral smoke type serpent came out of the face of Balarama. Balarama had just left this mortal body. His soul travelled into the sky through the sea. As Balarama was the incarnation of Adi Sesha, Naga community welcomed back Balarama. Balarama attained moksha and joined Vishnu at Vaikuntam .<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nKrishna knew that the time for him to shed his earthly avatar had come. Krishna knew the only way for someone to kill him was by wounding his foot. He remembered the curse of Maharishi Durvasa, which left his foot vulnerable. Krishna laid down under a tree and went into Yoga Samadhi. At that time a hunter Jara entered that forest. That hunter misunderstood the moving foot of Krishna as a lurking deer and shot a lethal arrow that pierced into Krishna\u2019s feet.<br />\n<br />\nAs soon as the hunter reached Krishna, he realised his mistake and pleaded the lord for forgiveness. Lord Krishna consoles him and tells him how his death was inevitable and things are going as per divine plan . Krishna says that in his previous birth as Lord Rama in the Tretayuga, Rama killed Vaali (Sugreeva's brother) from behind. So, Krishna has now reaped the price for the same through Jara who was king Vaali in his previous birth.<br />\n<br />\nSuch was the Dharma thatt, even for the Ruler of the Universe, the laws of Karma remain the same. Hence, lord Krishna left the mortal world. The time from which lord Krishna died is considered to be the beginning of Kaliyuga. Daruka, sent by Sri Krishna, met Pandavas and informed them about the tragic deaths.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 5--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_53MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_53BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_53B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_54B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2535231292161895293\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_54M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/10/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_10.html?showComment=1507639393058#c2535231292161895293\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 10, 2017 at 6:13 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_54MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 4--<br />\n<br />\nOn hearing this, Pandavas plunged into great grief. After taking suitable instructions from Dharmaja, Arjuna reached Dwarka. Dwarka was destined to be flooded within seven days of Krishna\u2019s death; hence, Arjuna decided to take the survivors to Indraprastha. Krishna's father left for heavenly abode while being in deep meditation. Arjuna performed the last rites for Krishna and his kinsman. All the ladies and children started moving towards Indraprastha along with Arjuna.<br />\n<br />\nAs the people walked away from the Dwaraka city, and they looked back for the last time, the city sank into the sea.<br />\n<br />\nOn the way, some thieves of saw that only one man with a bow accompanied the ladies. They tried to rob them. Arjuna who was once a very great archer, found it very difficult to even lift his bow. When he tried to invoke his Divya astras, he forgot all those mental passwords to arm his arrows.. The thieves killed many people and kidnapped some beautiful women. Some of the ladies including the wives of Krishna and Balarama self immolated. This was NOT Sati.<br />\n<br />\nArjuna unable to even protect the women arrived at Hastinapur in a most dejected condition, not wishing to live anymore. The Pandavas visited sage VedaVyasa and narrated the Yadavas destruction, Krishna's death and Arjuna\u2019s inability to save the Yadava women. The sage consoled the Pandavas and told them that their purpose on the earth is served.<br />\n<br />\nThe Pandavas coroneted Parikshit and embarked on their final journey towards the Himalayas with Draupdai . A dog followed them . Krishna participated in the Kurukshethra battle only after Arjuna and Duryodana themselves voluntarily came to seek his help in Dwaraka. Matters so transpired that he gave his mighty Narayani sena to Duryodana and became a charioteer to Arjuna.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">KRISHNA HAD AN UNWRITTEN MISSION.<br /><br />TO ELIMINATE THE 100 TEST TUBE BABIES AND THEIR FUTURE GENERATIONS<br /><br />HE DID THIS AND HOW !</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/09/shishupala-and-dantavakra-third-re.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/09/ethics-of-human-cloning-decided-6000.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">INDIAN DNA WAS PRISTINE ( DUE TO GOTRA SYSTEM OF PRESERVING Y CHROMOSOME )<br /><br />TILL THE MUSLIM AND CHRISTIAN INVADERS CAME AND MADE US SLAVES ..<br /><br />TODAY INDIAN DNA IS BEING CORRUPTED BY IVF AND TEST TUBE BABIES .. Sir can you give a link??</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_60BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_60b+seedBRnSD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_59T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; PRIONS FROM DEAD BURIED BODIES INVADE WATER AQUIFERS AND CAUSE PRION DISEASES LIKE SPONGIFORM ENCEPHALOPATHIES. (TSEs)\u2026.</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\nWE HAVE TO LEARN FROM TRUE HISTORY -- NOT FAKE HISTORY WRITTEN BY ROTHSCHILDs COMMIE HISTORIANS\u2026. . Infectious, abnormal proteins known as prions cause kuru. \u2026. Kuru belongs to a class of diseases called transmissible spongiform encephalopathies (TSEs), also called prion diseases. It primarily affects the cerebellum\u2026<br />\n<br />\nPrions are not living organisms and do not reproduce. \u2026They are inanimate, misshapen proteins that multiply in the brain and form clumps, hindering normal brain processes\u2026. Creutzfeldt-Jakob, Gerstmann-Str\u00e4ussler-Scheinker disease, and fatal familial insomnia are other degenerative diseases caused by prions.<br />\n<br />\nThese spongiform diseases, as well as kuru, create sponge-like holes in your brain \u2026 Prions that cause kuru can\u2019t be easily destroyed\u2026 Brains contaminated with prions remain infectious even when preserved in formaldehyde for years\u2026<br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Dufferin there was\nwooden decks even in the interiors . &nbsp;&nbsp;Every\njunior cadet had his own holystone \u2013and god save him if he loses it.&nbsp; &nbsp;If we did\nNOT produce enough PULP we got kicked from behind . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEBODY ASKED ME<br />\n<br />\nWHAT IS THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN AJIT VADAKAYIL AND NARENDRA DAMODARDAS MODI<br />\n<br />\nWELL YOU WANT US TO EXCHANGE HATS?<br />\n<br />\nREALLY?<br />\n<br />\nCAPT NARENDRA DAMODARDAS MODI VERSUS PM AJIT VADAKAYIL<br />\n<br />\nALL THOSE WHO THINK PM AJIT VADAKAYIL WILL WRITE ALL THAT THAT MINDLESS SHIT MODI WROTE IN HIS TWITTER ACCOUNT AND SAID IN HIS MANN KE BAATH\u2014RAISE YOUR HANDS .<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br />ALL THOSE WHO THINK CAPT NARENDRA MODI WILL LAST ONE WEEK AS SHIP CAPTAIN WITHOUT BEING THROWN OVERBOARD , RAISE YOUR HANDS</span><br />\nHOW MANY OF YOU THINK PM AJIT VADAKAYIL WILL PRAY TO SHIRDI SAIBABA , BASAVA , GANDHI, BR AMBEDKAR ETC AS SOON AS HE SEES A CAMERA \u2013RAISE YOUR HANDS<br />\n<br />\nI SAID WITH MANY INDIAN NAVY CAPTAINS AT SEA AS A JUNIOR OFFICER\u2014AS THEYE WAS SHORTAGE OF MERCHANT NAY CAPTAINS ( EXODUS TO FOREIGN COMPANIES \u2013BETTER WAGES IN DOLLARS ) .<br />\n<br />\nTHESE FIGHTING NAVY CAPTAINS WERE INCOMPETENT AND THEIR SOLE AIM WAS TO SHINE PERSONALLY BY PLAYING TO THE GALLERY\u2014ALL OF THEM BEHAVED THE WAY MODI IS BEHAVING AS PM.<br />\n<br />\nPM KURSI PEHLA \u2013 WATAN BAAD MEIN !<br />\n<br />\nTHIS REMINDS ME \u2013<br />\n<br />\nTHERE WAS A TYPHOON IN THE PACIFIC , THE CAPTAIN WAS FROM INDIAN NAVY WHO WAS NOT COMPETENT. ALL THOUGHT SHIP WOULD SINK ( TERRIFIC SLAMMING ) , AND SOMEHOW SHIP ESCAPED SINKING.<br />\n<br />\nAFTER 5 HARD DAYS WHEN GOOD WEATHER CAME, CAPTAIN CALLED FOR A CREW MUSTER I<br />\n<br />\nHE HAD A SEASONAL \u201cWEATHER ROUTING CHART \u201c WITH HIM<br />\n<br />\nHE POINTS TO THE WIND ROSES ON THE CHART AND TELLS THE CREW \u201c YEH SAB TOOFAAN HAI\u2014HUM NE JAHAAZA KO BACHAAYA \u201c ( HULLO DEAD CREW-- THESE RED CIRCLES ARE ALL STORMS , I SAVED THE SHIP)<br />\n<br />\nMY QUARTER MASTER FROM RATNAGIRI \u2013 HE CAME TO SEA AT THE AGE OF 15 AND WAS 63 YEARS OLD..&nbsp; &nbsp; HE SHOUTED BACK \u201c SAAAB-- TUM HUMKO KYA BACHAAYA \u2013HUMKO KHUDA BHACHAAYA \u201c<br />\n<br />\nTHAT SUMS IT UP<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">MODI HAS REFUSED TO ACT ON MY BLOGPOSTS JUST BECAUSE HE DOES NOT RECEIVE AN EGO MASSAGE FROM CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL</span><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br />APWAM</span></b> MODI ( AADARANEEYA POOJANEEYA WAZIREH AZAAM MAHODAY ) \u2013 WAIT FOR IT . PEOPLE WHO HAVE NOT WALKED, CONFINED TO WHEELCHAIRS WILL STAND UP.<br /><br />KHALISTANIS, ISIS AND ISLAMIC SEPARATISTS USED IT FOR BRAINWASH ..&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\nA victim who has forgotten what happened while on Scopolamine may not retain the reasoning or philosophy given to them by their attackers.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_244BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_245T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_245TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\" unselectable=\"on\"><div style=\"zoom: 1;\" unselectable=\"on\">\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_245B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_244b+seedD0D\" kind=\"d\">\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5479038796792300585\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_245M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. If a signal is sent down a path which is disrupted by Scopolamine or another neurotoxin, then it may not produce a response. If enough pathways are disrupted the loop is broken, all signals stop, and the victims mind goes blank.<br />\n<br />\nScopolamine is not a truth serum. A person on Scopolamine may be more likely to say whatever they think they are expected to say. A criminal may quietly talk into the ear of a victim on a low dose of Scopolamine. If the criminal does it right the victim will believe that what is being said is coming from their own mind.<br />\n<br />\nThe belief in the military is a few simple things such as loyalty, duty, honor, etc. However, a person in a Scopolamine fueled organization can be conditioned to believe whatever their superior says to them.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nIn the military, there are examples of officers rightfully disobeying an order of a superior officer. There is a procedure for and there are good reasons for relieving a superior officer. However, in a Scopolamine fueled organization this could never happen.</div>\n<div>\n<b style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\">WHY ARE OUR FIGHTER JET PILOTS OF THE INDIAN AIRFORCE TAKING UPPERS AND DOWNERS ?&nbsp; , serif;\">Raghu Nayak, the gardener at the Birla House in New Delhi, was the first to chase Godse and overpower him. President Rajendra Prasad awarded Nayak Rs 500.. In 2016 , the Odisha government handed over a cheque of Rs 5 lakhs to his 85 yer old widow Mandodari Nayak</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">According to George Fetherling, Godse did not try to flee, \"stood silently waiting to be arrested but was not approached at first because he was still armed; at last a member of the Indian air force grabbed him by the wrist, and Godse released his weapon\". Fetherling, then \"quickly surrounded Godse to prevent the crowd from lynching him\"</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ROTHSCHILD AGENT HERBERT TOM REINER ( VICE CONSUL US EMBASSY ) TOLD A LIE WHEN HE SAID HE HEARD 3 BULLETS , HE WAS 5 FEET AWAY FROM GODSE AND NABBED HIM PHYSICALLY..</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">NEHRU MADE SURE THERE WAS NO POST MORTEM OF GANDHIs BODY--THOUGH THE LAW REQUIRED IT</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Mahatma Gandhi was assassinated on 30 January 1948 in the compound of Birla House-- Gandhi died at 5:40pm, about half an hour after he was shot.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ALMOST ALL HEARD 4 SHOTS&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Vincent Sheean who witnesses the event wrote that he heard \"four, dull, dark explosions\"</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Godse and Apte were sentenced to death on 8 November 1949. They were hanged in the Ambala jail on 15 November 1949</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>During the assassination trial, the Nehru government did not call American Marine Herbert \"Tom\" Reiner who caught Godse-- though the law required this.</b></span></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">According to the Almanac of World Crime, at the hanging Apte's neck broke and he died instantly. but, \"Godse died slowly by the rope,\" instead of having his neck snap, he choked \"to death for fifteen minutes.\"</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">BR Ambedkar remarked after a momentary silence and regret, \"My real enemy is gone; thank goodness the eclipse is over now\"</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THIS BLOGSITE DOES NOT CARE FOR ROTHSCHILDs AGENT --KATHIAWARI JAIN CRYPTO JEW GANDHI</span><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">GODSE SWORE THAT HE FIRED ONLY THREE SHOTS</span></b>.&nbsp; &nbsp; HE DID NOT ATTEMPT TO RUN.. RATHER HE RAISED HIS HAND HOLDING THE GUN AND HIMSELF SHOUTED FOR THE POLICE TO ARREST HIM</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">According to George Fetherling, Godse did not try to flee, \"stood silently waiting to be arrested but was not approached at first because he was still armed; at last a member of the Indian air force grabbed him by the wrist, and Godse released his weapon\".</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Hillary had affairs with two colleague lawyers at ROSE FIRM Vincent Foster (murdered ) and Webster Hubbell.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE MOVIE \"AMERICAN MADE \" TRIED TO WHITE WASH THE TRUTH.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">One business in the CIA's Arkansas network was Park-on-Meter, or POM Inc.. biological warfare was done on the Sandistinas in Nicaragua</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Commercially, POM produces parking meters and machine parts. Covertly, it was manufacturing untraceable custom weapons parts for the Contras and shipping them to Mena.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">POM developed software to help launder the Mena drug money and BCCI money</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In 1983 POM in conjunction withWackenhut and Stormont Laboratories in Woodland, CA, began production of the delivery system for the new chemical and biological warfare CBW weaponry for use in the Contra war.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Park-On-Meter was the first company to receive a loan from the Arkansas Development Finance Authority (ADFA)..ADFA was created by the state legislature at Bill Clinton's urging in 1985.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The ADFA took over much of the Arkansas state's bond-issuing power and gave the governor Bill Clinton the ability \"essentially to create money\".&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The ADFA has no regulator and no legislative oversight. The governor appoints the board and has the right to approve or disapprove every bond issue. There is virtually no limit on the value of bonds that can be issued--- ROTHSCHILDs \"prescription for abuse\"</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\". The principle bond underwriter for the ADFA was Lasater &amp; Company, founded in 1983 by Dan Lasater. In just two years Lasater &amp; Co. underwote $664 million in Arkansas bonds.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Born in utter poverty Dan Lasater had close ties with Bill Clinton, through his friendship with Clinton's mother and half-brother, Roger. By the early '80s, Lasater was known throughout Little Rock for his COCAINE SNORTING AND PEDOPHILE SEX PARTIES . In 1982 he the biggest contributers to Clinton's election campaign</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Barry Seal made deposits of cash from the Mena drug operation directly to Lasater &amp; Co.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Lasater was charged with \"social distribution\" of drugs and sentenced to 2 1/2 years in prison. He served only six months, until Governor Clinton pardoned him.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">POM president/co-owner Seth Ward's brother-in-law is Webster Hubbell ( SEXUAL AFFAIR WITH HILLARY ) - he served on POM's board during the early '80s..While a partner at Rose, Hubbell served as POM's lawyer&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">While Hubbel practiced law he was Mayor of Little Rock from 1979 until 1982, one of the nation's youngest mayors. Hillary and Hubbel were having sex in 1979.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">He also served on Little Rock's City Board from 1978 to 1984. He was appointed by Bill Clinton as Chief Justice of the Arkansas Supreme Court in 1984 at age 36. When Clinton became President of the United States, Hubbell was appointed as Associate Attorney General</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; USING MULTICOLORED PERMANENT MARKER PENS WITH MY SIGNATURE AFFIXED UNDERNEATH<br />\n<br />\nTHESE DIAGRAMS ( SCHEMATIC ) STILL EXIST DECADES AFTER I DELIVERED A NEW SHIP<br />\n<br />\nI NEVER SAW A OPERATE IT IN AN EMERGENCY<br />\n<br />\nI MADE MY OWN SIMPLIFIED OPERATION PROCEDURES --CUTTING THROUGH THE CRAP--THIS IS WHY SHORE BOSSES PREFERRED TO SEND ME FOR DELIVERY OF A NEW SHIP<br />\n<br text-decoration-line: none;\">October 8, 2017 at 11:10 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_34MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IN AN EMERGENCY EVEN ENGINEERS CAME RUNNING TO CAPT VADAKAYIL</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I HAD THE UNIQUE ABILITY TO TRACE PIPELINES ON THE SPOT AND TAKE INSTANT DECISIONS</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NOBODY DARED TO QUESTION THESE DECISIONS .</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<b style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\">WHEN I WENT TO SEE THE MOVIE \"POINT BREAK : I HAD A NICE LAUGH</b></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-weight: bold;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\n<b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\"></b></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\"><b>PEOPLE ARE WORSHIPING RATS FOR THEIR HUMAN SPIRIT</b></b></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n</b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IF HAVE DONE THOUSAND TIMES BETTER AND NEVER BOASTED ABOUT THIS</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I HAVE NOT WRITTEN MY BOOK \"<i><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">GAMES CAPTAIN PLAYED </span></b></i>\" AS IT WOULD BE TOO MUCH FOR ANYBODY TO READ -</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/01/point-break-movie-review-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">###########</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">There was this time , my ship was coming out of a narrow tributary of mighty river Amazon. We were timed to cross a shallow bar at high water.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">While we were crossing the bar , I got a frantic call from Chief Engineer\u2014all temperatures of sea water cooled machinery ( main engines/ generators etc ) were rising rapidly \u2013with the added information that we are on HIGH sea suction which is nearly 4 metres above the ship\u2019s bottom LOW sea suction.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">This meant that river mud had ingressed the seawater inlet pipes.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Chief Engineer arbitrarily informed that he wants to shut down the main engines and generators--lest the pistons get seized in the cylinders .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I firmly commanded him\u2014\u201c You cannot stop any machinery till I order you to do it . Go to manual override . This is an emergency and I now control the ship\u2019s response \u201c</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Immediately I told the Brazilian river pilot\u2014I now have taken over your pilotage under Master\u2019s authority.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I quickly consulted the chart and literally power waded the ship to a deep sliver of water. Meanwhile I had the anchors ready.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">As soon as I dropped anchor, I raced to the engine room. The ENTIRE engineers were there white faced with all sorts of alarms beeping.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED TO 2-</span><br />\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_34MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_34BR\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_34B_box\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_35B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; border-bottom: 0px; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6818402057393665962\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_35M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/10/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_7.html?showComment=1507441293088#c6818402057393665962\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 8, 2017 at 11:11 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_35MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nI quickly got the ship\u2019s fresh water tank hooked on to the generators using the \u201cinternational shore coupling\u201d and fire hose after knocking off a flange . The best part was that only I knew the pipelines\u2014I traced it then and there .<br />\n<br />\nThe cooling water starved generators gasped back to life.<br />\n<br />\nI got the LOW sea suction opened up and got clean river water into the cooling systems.<br />\n<br />\nTo cut a long story short we now had the mud cleared out and main engines and generators all running smooth.<br />\n<br />\nWhen I went back to the bridge the pilot said that we cant do night navigation in the tributary as per rules.<br />\n<br />\nI told him, we cant remain there for daylight as at the next turn of tide , the ships rudder would hit the river bank and then my brand new ship is history.<br />\n<br />\nI told him\u2014\u201cI WILL TAKE THE SHIP OUT IN DARKNESS . I KNOW THE RIVER BENDS , THE DEEPS AND SILTED AREAS . I WILL COMMIT IN WRITING\u201d<br />\n<br />\nAnyways , I got search lights out at the forecastle and we started our trip in absolute darkness with river bank trees almost brushing the ship at certain areas.<br />\n<br />\nThe entire river tribals had taken out fire torches are were whistling and clapping as we whooshed past at terrific speed beating the fall of tide depth.<br />\n<br />\nFinally , as we exited the tributary and entered the mighty Amazon, the young pilot remarked that he was confident that I would do it. But if we had run aground , polluted and blocked the tributary, we both would have been in a Brazilian jail.<br />\n<br />\nThe rest of my stunned crew could only say \u201c CAPTAIN DELIVERED AGAINST ALL ODDS-- AS USUAL \u201c.<br />\n<br />\nThe grapevine had spread the engine crew has spread the world of how captain TOOK OVER TECHNICAL OPERATIONAL COMMAND OF THE ENGINE ROOM and how every order was followed without demur ..<br />\n<br />\nWhat I have said above is a tour de force.<br />\n<br />\nIt far exceeds the extreme sport efforts of the incidents in the movie , where the stake is only life or limb. The loaded ship cannot be stopped like a motor bike , ice skate or surfing board.<br />\n<br />\nSince this happened on a El Nino year 1997 , I have got up thrice at night reliving this incident in a deep sweat.<br />\n<br />\nNo, it was NOT a nightmare, but \u201creliving \u201c the incident in a vivid dream where my body succumbed to faster heartbeats, hyperventilation and sweat.. while in REAL life I was cool .<br />\n<br />\nOr was it a dream ?<br />\n<br />\n-- the waving torches held by half naked tribals, the whistling , the clapping , the WHOOSH sound of river bank trees showing up at the last moment to bright searchlights on the bow on a moonless night<br />\n<br />\nTotal silence on the navigating bridge except my con orders and the repeating of orders by my helmsman and Chief Mate.<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2009/07/amazon-navigation-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\n######################<br />\n<br />\n( TODAY I SPIT ON RAJNIKANTH WHO CANT TAKE A FUCKIN' DECISION )<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-FI5n6bW4fNo/WdnGL3kbYfI/AAAAAAABWA4/1o88h1ixi-w7xNuXBoRJfvXNhBHoHe7twCLcBGAs/s1600/APA_625500304413.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"545\" data-original-width=\"889\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-FI5n6bW4fNo/WdnGL3kbYfI/AAAAAAABWA4/1o88h1ixi-w7xNuXBoRJfvXNhBHoHe7twCLcBGAs/s1600/APA_625500304413.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In May 2011, the shareholders of Kasturi and Sons Ltd. held an extraordinary general meeting and voted to appoint Rothschild's Commie Sidharth Varadarajan as The Hindu's editor on the recommendation of the company's board, thus making Varadarajan the first editor of the newspaper not drawn from the family of shareholders in its 150-year history</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; where Rahul Gandhi went to speak with questions leaked to him in advance</b></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In 2015, Varadarajan founded an online news portal called The Wire and became its Founding Editor--we know who is behind this move</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
