Duryodhana sent his friend, the Rakshasa Alambasa, to oppose the Naga warrior.<br />\n<br />\nIravan was slain after a fierce fight. When Arjuna heard this, he broke down completely<br />\n<br />\nSeeing Iravan killed, Ghatotkacha ( son of the Pandava Bhima and the Rakshasi Hidimbi ) uttered a loud war-cry which made all the assembled soldiers tremble. And with his division, he fell upon the Kaurava army ferociously. So great was the destruction he wrought that at many points the Kaurava formation was broken<br />\n<br />\nTHIS SIDE STORY HAS BEEN USED BY JEW ROTHSCHILDs FAKE MUTTS TO CREATE BULLSHIT STORIES TO MAKE THE HINDU SELF LOATHING<br />\n<br />\nMUCH WORSE THAN WHAT WIKIPEDIA HAS SAID IS DONE TODAY, USING CROSS DRESSED TAMIL DALITS TO RIDICULE HINDUISM..<br />\n<br />\nTHE BENAMI MEDIA, JNU COMMIES AND LITERARY FEST DROHIS LOVE THIS DENEGRATION</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">JNU commie professors come out with new new stories every years--stating we have done research in Malaysia / Indonesia etc ---all lies</span></div>\n<br />\n################<br />\n<br />\nROTHSCHILD USED HIS FAKE KANCHI MUTT TO DO PROPAGANDA--<br />\n<br />\nHERE IS TOTAL BULLSHIT BY WIKIPEDIA<br />\n<br />\nQUOTE--Aravan (\u0b85\u0bb0\u0bb5\u0bbe\u0ba9\u0bcd, Arav\u0101\u1e47). He is also a patron god of well-known transgender communities called ThiruNangai (also Aravani in South India, and Hijra throughout South Asia). Aravan is worshipped in the form of his severed head and is believed to cure disease and induce pregnancy in childless women. . Some paintings also depict the sacrifice of Aravan. In these scenes, he is often depicted bowing to Kali, while his head is about to be severed; or, as in one Sowcarpet painting, a self-decapitated Aravan holds both a sword and his own severed head, offering the latter to the goddess.[16][17] the Tamil versions discuss Aravan's (Tamil name) ritual self-sacrifice to Kali before the war. Hiltebeitel relates this to the South Indian glorification of \"heroic\" self-mutilation and self-decapitation before a goddess.[24][25] .. In Villiputuralvar's 14th-century version, Krishna first offers himself as the sacrificial victim, but Aravan volunteers to replace him. Krishna tricks the gods Surya (the Sun) and Chandra (the Moon) to co-ordinate their movements so that the day of the new moon will fall one day earlier\u2014the current day. Another version, popular with transsexuals, cites the reason behind Aravan's wish to be \"coital bliss\" and tells explicitly about consummation of the marriage.[54][55] ..The Kuttantavar cult ritualizes both the heroic death and the marriage ceremony\u2014enacted by ThiruNangais (officially, \"eunuchs\" in Tamil Nadu)..Sometimes a chicken is sacrificed on stage in a terukuttu performance to signify the sacrifice.[56][59] In Villiputuralvar's retelling, an elephant is sacrificed to the goddess, complementing Aravan's own self-sacrifice.[49 Krishna asks Aravan\u2014the sole witness of the entire war, \"who was truly responsible for winning this war?\"Aravan replies that he saw two things: Krishna's discus decapitating the enemy, and his conch shell collecting their blood. ] About 25,000 transvestites, including the Aravanis, visit the festival.[75] ..During the first six days of the Kuttantavar festival, Aravan's head (cami) is \"danced\" around the streets of Kuvagam.. Traditionally, goats and chickens are sacrificed. On the 13th day, Aravan's \"soul\" is ritually transferred from his head to a pot..Even married men and men afflicted with diseases, all dressed as women, are described as ritually \"marrying\" Aravan in the festival, to please the deity.[79]..<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2---</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_131BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_131b+seedHOzND\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_128T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_131b+seedHOzND\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_128TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_128TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_128TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_131b+seedHOzND\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_128TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_128TN\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_131b+seedHOzND\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_128TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_128TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_128TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_131b+seedHOzND\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_128B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1957667864736380426\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_128M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/10/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_7.html?showComment=1507514449021#c1957667864736380426\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 9, 2017 at 7:30 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_128MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nAfter this dance, the priest marries the Aravanis to Aravan through the traditional thali-tying ceremony. The Aravanis then conduct sex work, symbolic of consummating their ritual marriage. A \"night of wild revelry and sexual promiscuity\" follows for the Aravanis.[55][72] THIS FUCKING STILL TAKES PLACE AND EVR PERIYAR PARTY POLICE DO NOT ARREST.. The head is then paraded around the village on a portable platform called a ketayam. The ceremony ends with a sacrificial offering of roosters. The \"widowed\" Aravanis, with their hair dishevelled, lament the death of their \"husband\" as he performs the kalappali. The garlands from Aravan's image are thrown at devotees one by one, symbolizing his gradual loss of vitality. At this \"weeping ground\", the Aravanis mourn Aravan's death by breaking their bangles, beating their breasts and discarding their bridal finery, like the legendary Mohini-Krishna. They cut their thalis, which are flung at a post erected for the ceremony (vellikkal). After bathing, they put on white saris as a mark of their widowhood. The Aravanis bear these signs of widowhood for a month before re-adorning themselves with bangles and coloured saris again.[77]Also at the alukalam, a symbolic sacrifice of cooked \"blood rice\" is distributed in honour of the deceased Aravan. This rice is believed to make childless women conceive. After the death rites at dusk, the chariot is now considered a \"house of death\", and the lifeless head is removed from the frame of its skeletal body, then covered by a cloth, and finally paraded around the village as though at a funeral. The head is taken to the temple of Kali, where is it \"revived\". On the 18th and final day, the head is decorated and paraded around the village a final time. In the evening, the pujari (\"priest\") as Yudhishthira (Dharmaraja) crowns Aravan's head in a coronation ceremony held in the inner sanctum of his temple.[77][81].. The officiating priest first takes a sword, striking pieces from the head. Then, a pumpkin is sliced into 32 pieces, symbolizing 32 pieces of Aravan's sacrificed body. Next, Aravan is fed his own \"blood\", represented by the blood of goat, sacrificed to Aravan beforehand. Aravan's body from the neck downwards is then covered with a bloodstained white cloth. Finally, blood-soaked rice is sprinkled on Aravan's face. Devotees, as in the Kuttantavar cult, believe eating this rice from Aravan's face, recovered after the ceremony, can induce pregnancy.[86]...one of the actors, believed to be possessed by Kali, kills a rooster over the statue's neck, symbolizing the sacrifice. Again, blood-soaked rice is distributed to devotees, especially childless women.[87] Similar rituals associated with a symbolic sacrifice and blood-soaked rice are performed in Melaccari,[88] Alantur, Punamalli and Villupuram. At Alantur and Punamalli, a goat is sacrificed, in Cuddalore, Patirikkuppam and Villupuram, a cock is sacrificed.[89]<br />\n<br />\nUNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\n############################<br />\n<br />\nALL THESE ARE FOUL STORIES COOKED UP BY EVR PERIYAR ATHEISTS ...EVR PERIYARs TRIP TO TAMIL DIASPORA NATIONS WAS FUNDED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/07/hinduism-in-bali-turn-of-tide-and-hindu.html</span><br />\n<br />\nAT KODUNGALLUR JEW ROTHSCHILD ARM TWISTED THE CRYPTO JEW KING TO KICK START BHARANI FESTIVAL , SINGING SEXUALLY LOADED VULGAR SONGS HOW SHIVAs WIFE CAN ONLY BE SATISFIED BY A PRICK AS LARGE AS THE TEMPLE FLAG POT-- THE THROWING OF SHIT, MENSES BLOOD , SEMEN INTO THE INNER SANCTUM ON THE IDOL --AND SACRIFICE OF ANIMALS AND CHICKEN --<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/03/kodungallur-bharani-festival-capt-ajit.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/11/all-animal-sacrifices-in-hindu-temples.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/02/devadasi-system-immoral-lie-of-temple.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/07/kamasutra-by-vatsayana-immoral-sexual.html</span><br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_128MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_128BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">JUST SAW SOMEONE ON BENAMI TV STATING THAT JUDICIARY OPINED THAT DIWALI HAD ONLY LIGHTS ( DIYAS ) -- THAT INDIA NEVER HAD CRACKERS</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WELL LET ME TELL YOU THIS</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<b style=\"color: blue; , serif;\">THRISSUR POORAM IS AN UNINTERRUPTED FESTIVAL SINCE ANCIENT DAYS&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SUPREME COURT IS DOING EXTREME OVER REACH</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<b style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">COLLEGIUM JUDGES CAN ONLY JUDGE INDIVIDUAL CASES --&nbsp; NOT MAKE LAWS FOR THE ENTIRE NATION</b></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n</b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE HAD VEDI MARUNNU CRACKERS ( MIGHTY ONES ) FOR FESTIVALS IN KERALA TEMPLES. BASICALLY SALTPETRE , COCONUT SHELL CHARCOAL AND SULPHUR.</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SALTPETRE ( POTASSIUM NITRATE ) WAS TAKEN ON ROTHSCHILDs SHIPS TO FRANCE SWEDEN AND GERMANY -- THE DUPONT / NOBEL/ BASF FAMILY MADE ROCKETS OUT OF THIS--&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE WHITE MAN DID NOT KNOW HOW TO BLAST MINES .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ONLY LATER THEY FOUND SALTPETRE IN ATACAMA DESERT&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">LATER JEW NOBEL ( YES SAME NOBEL PRIZE MAN ) MADE DYNAMITE . HE HAD NOTHING ORIGINAL --HE JUST LIFTED FROM INDIA</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IN 1540 AD GRACIA MENDES NASI IMPORTED 500 TONNES OF SALT PETRE FROM THE CALICUT KING ( MY HOMETOWN )&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IN ANCIENT DAYS ONLY INDIA HAD EXPLOSIVES</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AS SOON AS JEW FRANCIS XAVIER CAME TO INDIA--HE WENT IN SEARCH OF SALT PETRE&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/09/portuguese-inquisition-is-goa-by-jesuit.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">VASCO DA GAMA LANDED IN CALICUT ( MY HOMETOWN ) IN 1498 AD --HE ATTENDED A TEMPLE FESTIVAL AND SAW MIGHTY FIREWORKS</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">There is evidence ( not that we care ) --</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In a letter of 1605 from the King of Spain to the Viceroy of Goa there is an order to send \" 10 or 12 caskets of saltpetre \" as soon as possible.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">There is evidence in India too--by a surrender document --</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\"Raja Pratapaditya of Jessore capitulated to Islam Khan in 1609, he agreed to surrender twenty thousand infantry, five hundred war boats, and a thousand \u201cmaunds\u201d (41 tons) of gunpowder\"</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Napoleon left written evidence \" \u201cIn the year before the battle of Waterloo (1815) the East India Company exported 146000 cwt. of saltpetre to England.\u201d&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Note :146,000 cwt is 7300 tons of saltpetre. ( British Ordnance Board powder mills in 1809 )</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/napoleon-unknown-side-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ROTHSCHILD WON THE BATTLE OF WATERLOO ONLY DUE TO INDIAN SALTPETRE--THIS IS ACKNOWLEDGED IN WRITING</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\" 6000 factories manned by \u2018salpetriers\u2018 worked in France to overcome the naval blockade.\"</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Operated by a caste of peoples called the nuniah, saltpetre beds supplied the most vital element in gunpowder \u2013 saltpetre. And India produced 100% of it.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">TOTAL WORLD MONOPOLY</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED TO 2-</span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_162BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_162b+seedg_9D\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_160B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/10/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_7.html?showComment=1507537536861#c7070695520788503001\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 9, 2017 at 1:55 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_160MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nWE ASK THE BOTTOM DREGS OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL --OUR LAWYERS TURNED JUDGES-- DIWALI IS ONCE A YEAR.... EVERY DAY WE ARE WOKEN UP AT 0445 AM BY EAR DRUM SHATTERING AZAN CALLS FROM MOSQUES WHICH DEPRIVE US OF REM SLEEP ..<br />\n<br />\nThe rest of the world tried to make saltpetre using calcium nitrate, a hygroscopic salt, which spoilt easily by absorbing moisture from air.<br />\n<br />\nTHE CALCUTTA ARMENIAN JEWS SUPPLIED ROTHSCHILD WITH SALTPETRE .<br />\n<br />\nTHESE ARMENIAN JEWS BOUGHT IT FROM A CRYPTO JEW MARWARI NAMED OMICHAND<br />\n<br />\nTHE 1757 BATTLE OF PLASSEY WAS ONLY ON PAPER-- IT WAS A HEGELIAN DIALECTIC--AND ROTHSCHILD AGENT OMICHAND BABY WAS PART OF THIS<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/back-swing-of-john-galt-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\n100 years later rothschild stopped all pretenses of being a spice trader and took over india<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/murky-truths-of-sepoys-mutiny-1857.html</span><br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD MADE ENORMOUS AMOUNTS OF MONEY FROM SPICES/ OPIUM AND SALTPETRE -- ALL FROM INDIA<br />\n<br />\nThere is written evidence --<br />\n<br />\nC.H.Davis, of the Bureau Of Ordnance, Navy Department, on November 22, 1862 reported to the US Congress,<br />\n<br />\nQUOTE : I feel it, therefore, to be my first duty to urge that suitable provision of ordnance material be made for probable future necessities of the Navy. Most important among them is nitre, which enters so largely into the composition of gunpowder that it may be said to be gunpowder itself, with some slight additions of sulphur and charcoal under proper combination. It is not produced naturally in this country, nor by any other but India, except in insignificant quantities. Hindostan alone supplies the whole world, which being a British dependency, places us entirely at the mercy or caprice of that power for our stock of this essential article. :UNQUOTE<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://www.leeds.ac.uk/ims/fieldsofconflict/Report6.pdf</span><br />\n<br />\nWith the arrival of Chile\u2019s nitrate (sodium nitrate \u2013 NaNO3) deposits in Atacama desert, ROTHSCHILD WEANED the world was weaned away from Indian saltpetre. Chilean nitrates were used to derive nitric acid, a key intermediate for explosives manufacture.<br />\n<br />\nChilean nitrate was sodium nitrate, (NaNO3), which could be used to derive nitric acid. Nitric acid was used for manufacture of explosives. HAPAG, the Hamburg based shipping line ( owned by Rothschild ) , became the biggest in the world, carrying Chilean nitrates to Germany. The end of Boer War (1899-1902) saw the emergence of Germany as a major producer of munitions \u2013 especially the smokeless gunpowder.<br />\n<br />\nWith the discovery of nitroglycerine and TNT and its widespread commercialization by bitter rival JEW Alfred Nobel (of Nobel Prize fame) from the 1860s onwards, this Rotshchild's saltpetre monopoly ended.<br />\n<br />\nALFRED NOBEL WAS A JEW-- HE WAS THE FIRST IN THE BAKU OIL BUSINESS . LATER RIVAL JEW ROTHSCHILD ( PARTNER ) SHOVED HIM OFF. JEW STALIN WAS GROOMED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD AT BAKU<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/04/lawrence-of-arabia-part-two-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_160MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_160BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_160B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_161B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6151230499538183934\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_161M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. FUNDS FOR GUNS TO ARM CONTRAS WAS GENERATED BY COCAINE SOLD ON US STREETS TO BLACKS AND MEXICANS..<br />\n<br />\nMena in Arkansas was the main drop-off point for narcotics shipments, the other bases serving as distribution points or as \u201cnesting facilities\u201d for the aircraft, mainly a fleet of about thirty C-130 transport planes. Bill Clinton was the governor of Arkansas..<br />\n<br />\nFollowing their seizure of power, the Sandinistas ruled Nicaragua from 1979 to 1990.. A militia, known as the Contras, was formed in 1981 to overthrow the Sandinista government and was funded and trained by the US Central Intelligence Agency.<br />\n<br />\nBarry Seal's operations at Mena and other bases were involved in the export of guns to Bolivia, Argentina, Peru, and Brazil, as well as to the Contras, and the importation of cocaine from Colombia to be sold in New York, Chicago, Detroit, St. Louis, and other cities, as well as in Arkansas itself.<br />\n<br />\nThe tons of drugs that Barry Seal and his associates brought into USA, affected hundreds of thousands of lives, and exacted an incalculable toll on American society.<br />\n<br />\nBarry Seal saw himself as a patriot to the end. He had dictated his own epitaph for his grave in Baton Rouge: \"A rebel adventurer the likes of whom in previous days made America great.\"<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br />PAKISTANI BANK BCCI WAS INSTRUMENTAL IN THIS CONTRA AFFAIR .</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">SEAL WAS MURDERED TO PROTECT CLINTONS, BUSHs AND REAGAN--DEAD MEN TELL NO TALES</span></b><br />\n<br />\nTHESE THREE PRESIDENTS TOLD LIES THAT NICARAGUAN FREEDOM FIGHTERS SANDINISTAS WERE THE ONES WHO SOLD COCAINE IN USA...<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">Nine separate attempts to investigate Mena, by both state and federal authorities, were stymied-- with ROTHSCHILD media in cahoots.</span><br />\n<br />\nALL IN GOOD TIME ( IF I START BLOGGING AGAIN )<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7298950765210217502\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_197M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. , serif;\">THEN A AGNET SAID \" USA WILL NEVER ALLOW IT \"</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ATLEAST THEY NEVER CONTESTED MY STATEMENT</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ONE OF MY CHIEF OFFICERs WIFE WAS ON BOARD FOR THE FIRST MAIDEN TRIP. I ASKED HER , \"FIRST TIME OUT OF INDIA ?\"</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SHE SAID \"NOPE --I HAVE BEEN TO SWITZERLAND AND EUROPE SEVERAL TIMES WITH MY DAD \"</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">HER DAD USED TO WORK FOR SAIL -- SHE HERSELF TOLD ME \"TOP SHOTS IN SAIL GET KICKBACKS FROM AUSTRALIA TO IMPORT COKING COAL \"</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SHE SAID THERE WAS ONE MMTC INDIAN BOSS WHO DID NOT WANT MONEY -HE ONLY WANTED YOUNG WHITE GIRLS TO HAVE SEX WHILE ON JAUNTS ABROAD</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">LATER I VERIFIED THIS WITH A CONTACT IN MMTC-- HE SAID THAT MANS DAUGHTER WOULD FUCK ANY MAN - EVEN SERVANTS -SHE WAS JUST 14 - A NYMPHOMANIAC&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE GREAT QUALITY OF AUSTRALIAN COKING COAL FOR INDIAN STEEL INDUSTRY HAS BEEN SUSTAINED BY CORRUPT INDIAN BOSSES IN SAIL AND STEEL INDUSTRY--IT IS A LIE</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NO MATTER HOW MUCH PM MODI JUMPS UP AND DOWN --INDIA WILL CONTINUE BURNING COAL-- WE KNOW APCO MODIs CLANDESTINE ROLE IN SHORING UP PARIS COP21.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I WROTE THE BELOW POST FOR PM MODI AND JNU WOMAN NIRMALA SIRARAMAN WHO WENT TO NAIROBI FOR WTO.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">READ ALL SIX PARTS --</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/12/thermal-coal-power-plants-clean-exhaust.html</span></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">INDIA HAS THE THIRD HIGHEST RESERVES OF COAL ON THIS PLANET</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Thermal coal, is suitable for electric power production. Thermal coal is ground into a fine powder that burns quickly at high heats and is used in power plants to heat water in boilers that run steam turbines.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Metallurgical or coking coal has a higher energy content and lower moisture and is used to make iron, steel and other metals.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Coking coal is simply coal that has already had the impurities burned out of it. Primarily, coking coal is low ash and also low sulfur and phosphorus. These impurities would adversely affect steel smelted using the coke.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">OUR COAL IMPORT BILL IS MORE THAN 1.1 LAKH CRORES ANUALLY .. THERE ARE HUGE KICKBACKS FOR POLITICIANS AND TOP SAIL OFFICIALS</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Coking coal produced in India has higher ash content which makes it less suitable to use with the technology available here--and there has been VERY LITTLE effort to do something about this..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Steel companies in India fulfill 83% of their coking coal requirements through imports--MAJJA HAI --&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THERE ARE SEVERAL GRADES OF COAL IN INDIA WHICH CAN BE EASILY UPGRADED TO COKING COAL. BUT HEY, NOBODY WANTS TO DO IT. KICKBACKS INTO SWISS BANKS WILL VANISH&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Coking coal is fed into ovens and subjected to oxygen-free pyrolysis, a process that heats the coal to approximately 1,100 degrees Celsius. It melts it and drives off any volatile compounds and impurities to leave pure carbon. The hot, purified, liquefied carbon solidifies into lumps called \"coke\" that can be fed into a blast furnace along with iron ore and limestone to produce steel.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE WATCH !</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: left;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">MODI WANTS TO RUN OUR STEEL/ HEAVY INDUSTRIES WITH SOLAR AND WIND POWER !</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">HIS KOSHER BOSSES WITH BE MAHAAAAA KHUSH ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">..</span></div>\n</span></li>\n<span id=\"bc_0_207b+seedDUD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_207b+seedDUD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_207b+seedDUD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_207b+seedDUD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here is Wikipedia SHIT\nabout Nirmala devi.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">QUOTE :She claimed to\nhave been born in a fully realised state and spent her life working for peace\nby developing and promoting a simple technique through which people can achieve\ntheir own self-realization.[1][2] Nirmala Srivastava said that while in Nargol,\non 5 May 1970, she witnessed the rising of the Primordial Kundalini. Later she\ndescribed the experience as follows: \"I saw my kundalini rising very fast\nlike a telescope opening out and it was a beautiful color that you see when the\niron is heated up, a red rose color, but extremely cooling and\nsoothing.\"[18] She stated that the potential for all humanity to gain\nspiritual self-awareness was realised at this time, which she characterises as\na \"historical process of en-masse self-realization and inner transformation\".\nSoon after she founded Sahaja Yoga in Mumbai. In 1972 Mrs. Nirmala Srivastava\nsailed to the US and warned against false gurus ( <span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>MY FRIEND WAS ON THIS SCI SHIP \u2013ON\nA VERY LONG VOYAGE</b></span> ) In 1979 Nirmala Srivastava </span><span style=\"background-color: white;\">declared herself to be the\n<b>complete incarnation of the Adi (Primordial) Shakti</b> </span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">or Holy Spirit to her\ndevotees.[19][20]</span><span style=\"background-color: white;\"> <b>She has also claimed to be Maitreya and the Mahdi</b>.[21]</span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">UNQUOTE\n</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">MAITREYA IS KALKI\u2014&nbsp; VISHNUs\n10<sup>TH</sup> AND FINAL AVATAR <o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; There is a procedure for and there are good reasons for relieving a superior officer. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/10/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1506997104665#c8801335067872328836\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 3, 2017 at 7:48 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_95MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nRECENTLY I SAW THREE MOVIES IN A THEATRE IN CALICUT -- ADJACENT TO THE MANACHIRA POOL.<br />\n<br />\nTHE NATIONAL ANTHEM BEFORE THE MOVIE WAS JUST MUSIC --THERE WAS NO LYRICS OR SONG<br />\n<br />\nTHERE WAS NO FLAG --THEY SHOWED THINGS LIKE SNAKE, WILD ANIMALS , BIRDS<br />\n<br />\nWHILE THE SO CALLED NATIONAL ANTHEM WAS IN PROGRESS PEOPLE WERE STREAMING INTO THE THEATRE<br />\n<br />\nI GUESS SOME COMMIES AND MUSLIMS ( IN POWER ) FEEL OK WITH THIS<br />\n<br />\nI ASK THE MODI GOVT--IS THIS ALLOWED ?<br />\n<br />\nLAY OUT THE PUNISHMENT<br />\n<br />\n1) SHUT DOWN THE THEATRE<br />\n2) FINE AND JAIL THE OWNER / MANAGER OF THE THEATRE--&nbsp; &nbsp;NEVER MIND SHOBHAA DE WHO WANTS INDIANS TO FOLLOW THE AMERICAN BLACKS EXAMPLE-- WHO DISRESPECT THE FLAG / ANTHEM/ NATION<br />\n<br />\nTHE FORMAT OF THE NATIONAL ANTHEM TUNE IS NOT UNIFORM ACROSS INDIA.. &nbsp;THIS IS OUR CULTURE..&nbsp; WE GO FOR ARRANGED MARRIAGES.<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/05/marriage-sans-fights-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nWHITE MEN COME TO INDIA AS TOURISTS , THEY JUST SIT IN PARKS, BEACHES ETC --AND WATCH INDIAN FAMILIES.<br />\n<br />\nTHEY SEE HOW THE WIFE IS LITERALLY LIKE MOTHER HEN TAKING CARE OF HER BROOD -- SHE IS NOT TRYING TO SHOW OFF HER PRIVATE PARTS TO OTHER MEN.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; &nbsp;she will never force her man to eat CROW.</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">WHEN A MARRIED WOMAN DRESSES UP TO ATTRACT OTHER MEN --WHAT IS SHE WORTH ?</span></b></div>\n<br />\nMY WIFE TAKES ALL MAJOR DECISIONS -- I DO NOT KEEP A RUPEE IN MY PURSE --SHE IS MY FINANCE MINISTER --I DO ALL THE EARNING , THOUGH<br />\n<br />\nUNLIKE JAPANESE WOMEN --INDIAN WOMEN WILL SLAP A PERVERT IF HE TRIES TO GROPE HER IN A CROWD<br />\n<br />\nINDIA HAS THE LEAST DIVORCES ON THIS PLANET \"BY PERCENTAGE \"<br />\n<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_102b+seedSA2D\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_102b+seedSA2D\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; She wondered how Draupadi managed 5 husbands when she could NOT manage even one .<br />\n<br />\nall BOONS and CURSES in Hindu mythology are dance of OPPOSITE FORCES<br />\n<br />\nDraupadi asked Lord Shiva ( BOON ) to bless her with a husband who had five of the best qualities a man can ever have: dharma, strength, archery skills, good looks, patience<br />\n<br />\nLord Shiva ( COSMIC ALLEGORY ) laughed and said that she will not be able to find one man with all these 5 qualities-- instead she shall marry five men who shall possess each of her mentioned qualities.<br />\n<br />\nDraupadi was the wife of all the five pandavas --she could stay with each of them for some time and HAS to move on to the other. She represents the feminine kundalini energy which travels through the spinal column via the chakras on her upward path.<br />\n<br />\nDRAUPADI IS YAJNASENI -- BORN OUT OF HOMAM FIRE-- AN ALLEGORY..( HEAT OF KUNDALINI )<br />\n<br />\nBALLS TO KALKI KOECHLIN ( SPONSORED BY HUM BHI FRENCH TUM BHO FRENCH RICHET KOEL PURIE OF COUCH FAME ) -- IF SHE SHOWS ME HER BUCK TEETH IN ONE DARK ALLEY , I WILL SURELY FAINT .<br />\n<br />\nKRISHNA WAS NOT BORN TO KILL SISHUPALA AND DANTAVAKRA KRISHNAs UNWRITTEN PASK WAS TO KILL ALL 100 TEST TUBE BABIES TO SAVE HUMANITY-- BY HOOK OR BY CROOK-- KEEPING LAWS OF KARMA INTACT<br />\n<br />\nKRISHNA HIMSELF ACCEPTED HIS KARMA ( RECEIVED AN ARROW UNDER HIS FOOT WHILE PLAYING THE FLUTE ) .. ACTUALLY IT WAS RAMAs KARMA .<br />\n<br />\nCHASTE TARA ( THE MOST BEAUTIFUL WOMAN IN HINDU MYTHOLOGY ) HAD CURSED RAMA .. CHASTE GANDHARI HAD CURSED KRISHNA<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/10/king-vali-and-queen-tara-of-ramayana.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/09/ethics-of-human-cloning-decided-6000.html</span><br />\n<br />\nALL THESE RATIONALISTS LIKE UR ANANTHAMURTHY, PANSARE, DHABHOLKAR, KALBURGI, BR AMBEDKAR, EVR PERIYAR , KANCHA ILAIAH SQUEAK, JOHN DAYAL, AMISH TRIPATHI, SHELDON POLLOCK, WENDY DONIGER ETC-- THEY DONT HAVE THE BRAINS OR THE PERCEPTION<br />\n<br />\nFUCK OFF !<br />\n<br />\nSPREAD THIS ON SOCIAL MEDIA-- PASS ON TO DESH BHAKTS AND HINDU STALWARTS<br />\n<br />\nHINDUS ARE NO LONGER SELF LOATHING !<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_196M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/10/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1507094301676#c2648383562591201230\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 4, 2017 at 10:48 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_207MC\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ONE OF THE SECONDARY REASONs WHY I USED BAD LANGUAGE IS TO --</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">KEEP AWAY SQUEAMISH PRUDES-- I HAVE NO TIME FOR THEM</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ONE THE SHIPs I COMMAND WHEN I SEE SQUEAMISH PRUDES ( USUALLY BONGS ) I WARN THEM \" SHAPE UP OR I THROW YOU OUT IN THE NEXT PORT\"</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">OUR TRAINING SHIP DUFFERIN WAS A FIRST WORLD WAR BRITISH TROOP CARRIER-- A FAST SHIP WHICH COULD DO 24 KNOTS THOSE DAYS&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE TOOK BATH IN A HALL --ALL 250 NAKED-- EVEN THE SHIT POTS DID NOT HAVE DOORS.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AS SOON AS WW1 GOT OVER DUFFERIN WAS BROUGHT TO MUMBAI TO BE A TRAINING SHIP</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE HAD 125 SENIORS AND 125 JUNIORS--- A TWO YEAR SYSTEM</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">RAGGING/ HAZINGs MAIN BONAFIDE ASPECT WAS TO MAKE MEN OUT OF SQUEAMISH PRUDE BOYS ( I TELL TEACHER VERY GOOD -TYPES )</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MIND YOU I HAD JUST CROSSED 16 YEARS OF AGE WHEN I JOINED THE SHIP</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">RAGGING WAS MOST SEVERE --I WOULD SAY THE WORST ON THE PLANET</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE HAD \"CODE RED\" ( HOLLYWOOD MOVIE -- A FEW GOOD MEN )</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE CALLED IT \"BLANKET PARTY\"-- IF TIME HONOURED TRADITIONS ARE BROKEN</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">BLANKET PARTY WAS ALWAYS GIVEN TO A BATCHMATE --NOT SENIOR TO JUNIOR -- OR JUNIOR TO SENIOR</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">PUT A BLANKET OVER THE VICTIM IN THE DARK WHILE SLEEPING --DOZENS OF HANDS WOULD POUND--NEXT 3 DAYS THE VICTIM WONT BE SEEN ( EVEN IN THE MESS ) AS HE WOULD HAVE A SWOLLEN FACE</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">USUALLY SNITCHED ( SNEAKS ) GOT THIS .. SNEAKING WAS STRICT NO NO NO..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A SNEAK WAS EX-COMMUNICATED --AND THIS WAS LIKE SLOW DEATH-- IT WAS BETTER TO LEAVE THE SHIP AND JOIN SOME OTHER PROFESSION. IN OLD ALUMNI RE-UNIONS SNEAKS ARE NOT CALLED&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: x-large;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: x-large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: x-large;\"><b>WE MAINTAINED THE BEST TRADITIONS OF \"STRENGTH AND HONOUR\"</b></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: x-large;\">\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE LEARNT PRECIOUS LITTLE ELSE</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MY JUNIOR BATCH OF 125 CADETS WERE THE LAST TWO YEAR BATCH.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AFTER THAT DUE TO HUGE DEMAND FOR MERCHANT NAVY OFFICERS THEY MADE IT A ONE YEAR TRAINING COURSE FOR 250 CADETS</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WITH A ONE YEAR COURSE ( NO SENIORS ) THE SHIP BECAME A WHORE HOUSE -- NO TRADITIONS-- NO SENIOR TO JUNIOR PERSONAL GROOMING --&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">BIHARIS AND BHAIYYAS FROM UP CHEWED PAAN AND SPAT AT CORNERS OF BULKHEADS . ALL GLORIOUS TRADITIONS OF THE PAST --CARRIED ON UNBROKEN CHAIN SINCE 19I4 WERE SCUTTLED IN 1976.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE TRAINING SHIP PRODUCED SQUEAMISH PRUDES AND SNEAKS AFTER 1976&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">RAGGING ( TWO YEAR COURSE ) WAS SEVERE AS OUR OFFICERS , INCLUDING CAPTAIN --WERE ALSO EX-CADETS&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THERE WERE SILLY TRADITIONS -- TODAY I SMILE WHEN I RECALL</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AIR RAID -- ######## 125 SENORS WOULD BEAT THEIR KNIVES AND FORKS ON THE TABLE --AND ALL 125 JUNIORS HAD TO GO UNDER THE TABLE --TIME USUALLY 90 SECONDS . THE OFFICERS TURNED A NELSONS EYE AND CONTINUED EATING , BECAUSE THEY ALSO WENT THROUGH THE SAME THING&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SAILING TICK -- ####### THE FIRST TIME A JUNIOR WENT FOR SAILING, HE WAS GIVEN THE SAILORS TOAST-- DRINK SEAWATER FROM A STINKING SENIORS TENNIS SHOE</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AT SEA I CONTINUED THE TRADITION OF \"EQUATOR CROSSING \" THOUGH IT WAS A OFFENCE WHERE CATPAIN WOULD BE SACKED ( COMPANY POLICY )&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/06/equator-crossing-ceremony-at-sea-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MY OWN WIFE AND TWO SONS WERE GIVEN EQUATOR CROSSING CEREMONY</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6qOWvtcudHI<br /><br />https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MwpFBPMtnj4</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">..</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">ONCE I HAD 4 SAILORS ( CHIEF OFFICER / SECOND ENGINEER / CADET / FITTER ) UNCONSCIOUS IN A NITROGEN PURGED TANK CONTAINING CARGO AT 74 DEG C AT MID SEA .&nbsp; &nbsp;MY <span style=\"color: red;\">SQUEAMISH</span> TELUGU CHIEF ENGINEER WAS RUNNING UP AND DOWN CRYING \" SO MANY DEAD PEOPLE \"&nbsp; --</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">HE WAS NO USE TO ME&nbsp; IMPORTANT...... IMPORTANT.......... THE WARSHIP INS BETWA , CAPSIZED WHILE UNDOCKING FROM DRYDOCK , DUE TO STABILITY CALCULATIONS NOT BEING DONE PROPERLY ..................... I AM A SHIP CAPTAIN WITH 30 YEARS EXPERIENCE ............. VIRTUAL LOSS OF GM DUE TO UPTHRUST .................... To calculate virtual loss of GM :-............. P= t X MCTC/ LCF ( t is trim in cms )....... virtual loss of GM= PX KM/W ( where W is displacement in tonnes )............. Not many people realise that <span style=\"color: red;\"><b>KM reduces with increase of trim </b>, because the white man cant think so deep&nbsp;</span>................this is the reason why docking/ undocking trim by stern must be as small as possible\u2026\u2026\u2026.. while undocking the most critical and dangerous period is when the ship is afloat with only the aftermost part of keel resting on the aftermost block \u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026 \u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026..FIRST STEP TO SALVAGE THE PATHETIC INDIAN NAVY IS TO CHANGE THE COLOUR OF THEIR UNIFORM FROM WHITE TO KHAKHI............. ALL RESPONSIBLE PEOPLE INCLUDING THE CAPTAIN MUST BE SACKED......... THIS IS SHEER INCOMPETENCE........... The interval of time between the stern post landing on the blocks and the ship taking the blocks overall is referred to as the<span style=\"color: red;\"> critical period</span>....... During this period part of the weight of the ship is being borne by the blocks, and this creates an upthrust at the stern which increases as the water level falls in the drydock. ......The upthrust causes a<span style=\"color: blue;\"> virtual loss in metacentric height</span> and it is essential that positive effective metacentric height be maintained throughout the critical period, or the ship will heel over and perhaps slip off the blocks with disastrous results. ....capt ajit vadakayil ..</div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The <b><span style=\"color: blue;\">Vishnu Schist</span></b> was named by geologist\nCharles Walcott in the 1880s after Vishnu Temple, a prominent rock formation on\nthe north side of the canyon near Cape Royale.&nbsp; The <b><span style=\"color: blue;\">Brahma Schist</span></b> was named by\ngeologists Campbell and Maxson in the 1930s after Brahma Temple, a butte\noverlooking Bright Angel Canyon.&nbsp; There is a&nbsp; <b><span style=\"color: blue;\">Rama Schist </span></b>derived its name from Rama\nTemple, a rock spire near Vishnu Temple.&nbsp; &nbsp;All of these ancient landmarks can be seen from the\nmajor overlooks on the South Rim. &nbsp;&nbsp;The rock cut idols have been chipped off&nbsp; long ago by Christian zealots.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_5BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_5B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; IN HINDUISM A PRIEST MUST MARRY AND HAVE CHILDREN .<br />\n<br />\nPatanjali Maharshi, the exponent of Raja Yoga philosophy, recommends that ten virtues should be practised by all men. The first five are: Ahimsa (non-violence), Satya (truthfulness), Brahmacharya (celibacy in thought, word and deed), Asteya (non-stealing) and Aparigraha (non-covetousness). These constitute Yama or self-restraint. The other five virtues are: Saucha (internal and external purity), Santosha (contentment), Tapas (austerity), Svadhyaya (study of scriptures or recitation of Mantra) and Isvarpranidhana (consecration of the fruits of all works to the Lord). These constitute Niyama or religious observance.<br />\n<br />\nThe most foul thing done was to encourage married men in Grihasta stage to practice Brahmacharya by sexual continence. He who seeks merely to suppress or subdue his sexual energy is in effect belittling his own origins.<br />\n<br />\nYou are today reading what I write because all your forefathers had sex. It is the creative relationship of purusa and prakriti which leads to freedom.<br />\n<br />\nRenunciation is a positive process of disengagement, not a sterile rejection. In the ancient past, almost all our maharishis were householders UNLESS come individual like Bhishma / Ayyappa took a vow not to procreate to create problems for succession of royalty<br />\n<br />\nThe religious or educational studentship of adolescence is also termed brahmacarya ashrama. In the Hindu system four stages of life have been prescribed: brahmacharya (celibacy), grihastha (family life), vanaprastha (literally, living in a forest), sanyasa (total renunciation).<br />\n<br />\nIn the first stage, brahmacharya, a person leads the life of a student as a celibate. After finishing the studies, he enters the married life of a grihastha. Having f<br />\nulfilled the obligations to children and the society, both husband and wife follow spiritual pursuits.<br />\nIn sanyasa, a person completely renounces all worldly belongings and becomes a mendicant. Again, in Sanatana Dharma a unmarried man or a widower cant perform a yajna or homam.<br />\n<br />\nThe word \u2018virya\u2019 mentioned means power of knowledge or action, vigor in body\u2019s organs and the mind, spiritual power or the attainment of siddhis. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/11/swami-vivekananda-greatest-son-of-india.html?showComment=1489807637629#c4627428490237722341\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 18, 2017 at 8:57 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_39MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nAttachment to sensual pleasures, ( of which excessive sex and infidelity is just one part ) is seen as an obstacle to spiritual knowledge. External denial and internal hankering after sensual pleasures is no form of discipline. Not strenuously objecting to indulgences but gently and naturally developing an indifference is what is recommended.<br />\n<br />\nIn the context of yoga practice, driving Prakriti back to its unmanifest state is the object. Prasadham ( tranquility) is the reward. The sign of attainment of this reward is the natural ( not forced) settling down of the senses away from chaotic pursuits.<br />\n<br />\nBrahmacharya asks an aspirant to think about where he is putting his energy \u2013 sexual or otherwise. Brahmacharya is about allocation: using your resources effectively to achieve your aspiration.<br />\n<br />\nTo hone our practice of this principle, we must learn to conserve and not waste energy on things that do not serve our purpose. In other words, we always have a choice between frittering away our energy on not-so-purposeful actions (and thoughts and worries), and directing them towards those that will serve us better and lead to more happiness, purpose, sense of union.<br />\n<br />\nBrahmacharya, is as simple as that. Brahmacharya means not misusing sex. Brahmacharya means \u2018to respect the creative power of sex and not abuse it by manipulating others sexually.<br />\n<br />\nThe sex you have with your wife is LOVE. The sex you have with a whore is LUST.<br />\n<br />\nBrahmacharya is a way to get to God\u2026 When sexual energy is directed wisely, it becomes a means to transcend separation, or otherness. When sexual energy is used to exploit, manipulate, or humiliate another, however, it propels us into deeper separation and ignorance (avidya).<br />\n<br />\nLike the other yamas, brahmacharya has to do with balance, and how we choose to use or \u201cinvest\u201d our resources. Each and every act and thought is an outflow of energy. Some thoughts and actions offer beneficial dividends, while others simply drain our resources. In the name of continence, we are asked to be wise investors.<br />\n<br />\nThe yamas all center around intuitive ways of being, and of treating ourselves and others, so that we can be more connected internally and externally. The yamas are about how to treat others \u2013 to achieve the aim of dissolving otherness.<br />\n<br />\nWhen brahmacharya becomes stable then the yogi gains great energy and power. In a very traditional sense Brahmacharya was a description for the early part of life, on average up to about the age of 25, before marriage, time focused on studies. Here all energy was devoted to learning of which much of that was gaining the tools to practice the ways to self-realisation. It was typically a time of sexual abstinence.<br />\n<br />\nLater one entered family life and naturally sex was part of it. This was the system and culture around the time of Patanjali. The yogic process is one of channeling and managing energy within, where as in average daily life this life energy, or prana, is wasted, drained out the senses.<br />\n<br />\nThe thought of sex and the force of the sex drive is a huge component in this. One of the biggest drainers of energy is the sex impulse. Very often it plays a large distraction just in the mind even though no physical engagement has occurred.<br />\n<br />\nIt is very difficult for that individual to find peace when the mind is continually distracted and desirous of sexual activity. It draws the energy down and keeps it low. The flip side is some people totally suppress the sexual urge which leads to an unnatural repressed state and block.<br />\n<br />\nSex is a need, both for society and for our personal well-being. Abstinence should never be forced. It should come naturally. One might find at a point in life that time in sex is complete. This aspect of Brahmacharya has arisen from within. Brahmacharya is about harnessing the energy or power of our senses and directing that instead to greater personal understanding- not withholding semen.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_39MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_39BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_39B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_40B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7434099521711110483\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_40M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. It means \"devoting oneself to Brahman\".<br />\n<br />\nBrahmacharya is the virtue of celibacy when unmarried and fidelity when married. It represents a virtuous lifestyle that also includes simple living, meditation and other behaviors.<br />\n<br />\nBrahmacharyam means an overall lifestyle conducive to the pursuit of sacred knowledge and spiritual liberation. Brahmacharya is a means, not an end. It usually includes cleanliness, ahimsa, simple living, studies, meditation, and voluntary restraints on certain foods, intoxicants, and behaviors-(including sexual behavior.<br />\n<br />\nQUOTE : Now what people call yajna (sacrifice) is really Brahmacharya, for only by means of Brahmacharya does the knower attain that world (of Brahman). And what people call Ishta (worship) is really Brahmacharya, for only worshipping by means of Brahmacarya does one attain the Atman (the liberated Self).<br />\n<br />\nNow, what people call the Sattrayana (sacrificial session) is really Brahmacharya, for only by means of Brahmacharya does one obtain one's salvation from Sat (Being). And what people call the Mauna (vow of silence) is really Brahmacharya for only through Brahmacharya does one understand the Atman and then meditate.<br />\n<br />\nNow, what people call a Anasakayana (vow of fasting) is really Brahmacharya, for this Atman never perishes which one attains by means of Brahmacharya. And what people call the Aranyayana (life of a hermit) is really Brahmacharya, for the world of Brahman belongs to those who by means of Brahmacharya attain the seas Ara and Nya in the world of Brahman. For them there is freedom in all the worlds.\u201d \u2014\u2009Chandogya Upanishad, VIII.5.1 - VIII.5. 5000 BC. text-decoration-line: none;\">May 28, 2016 at 1:10 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_34MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">LET TRUTH BE TOLD -</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I want my readers to know that Vivekananda was part of the Brahmo Samaj which-</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Rejected the Vedas&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Rejected Vishnu avatars Krishna and Rama</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Rejected temple worship of Shiva, Vishnu and Devi</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Rejected Karma , be-birth and Moksha theory.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b>The Brahmo Samaj was founded by two Opium drug running agents of Jew Rothschild.</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/opium-raja-british-stooge-ram-mohan-roy.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/opium-drug-running-tagore-family-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Raja Ram Mohan Roy was a Pir Ali Muslim who founded a missionary committee in Calcutta, and in 1828 asked for support for missionary activities from the American Unitarians. Unitarian Church dictated terms to Brahmo Samaj.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The son of Pir Ali Muslim Dwarknath Tagore introduced Rothschild\u2019s Western esotericism, into Brahmo Samaj . The theology of the Brahmo Samaj was called \"neo-Vedanta\" by Christian commentators.</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: x-large;\">Rothschild\u2019s agent Keshub Chandra Sen, a Christian convert controlled his nephew Vivekananda and had him enrolled in his Nava Vidhan ( Nobobidhan ).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Keshab Chandra Sen and Vivekananda incorporated Christian theology within the framework of Hindu thought.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Keshab Chandra Sen was Secretary to the Goodwill Fraternity, Masonic lodge associated with the Unitarian Rev.Charles Dall and a Christian missionary Rev. James Long .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">With them Sen establish a TRAITOR \"British Indian Association\" filled with Bhadaraloks , Pir Ali \u201cbrahmins\u201d , white people and anglo Indians..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In 1866 Sen delivered an address on Jesus Christ, Europe and Asia, in which he proclaimed that \"India would be for Christ alone who already stalks the land\"</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">On 24th January 1868, Keshub Chanda Sen laid the foundation stone of his new church, the Brahmo Samaj of India Tabernacle of New Dispensation and the newly constructed chapel was consecrated on 22nd August 1869.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Sen declared, \"we believe in the Church Universal, which is the respiratory of all ancient wisdom and the receptacle of all modern science, which recognise in all prophets and saints a harmony, in all scriptures a unity and though all dispensations a continuity, which abjures all that separates and divides and always magnifies unity and peace, which harmonises reason, faith and Bhakti, asceticism and social duty in their highest forms and which shall make of all nations and sects one kingdom and one family in the fullness of time.\"</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AIYYOOOOOOO!</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large; font-weight: bold;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b>Vivekananda was a member of a Freemasonry lodge in 1883.</b></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Rothschild published ( 1896 ) and propagated Vivekananda\u2019s book Raja Yoga.</span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: large; font-weight: bold;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Rothschild send Swami Vivekananda on his ship to represent Hinduism at the Parliament of Religions at Chicago on September 11th, 1893.&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-size: large;\"></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-weight: bold;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\">\n<b></b></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">For the next three years Vivekananda would be shown to several western doctors in USA , England and Europe <span style=\"color: red;\">to treat his terrible diseases</span>\u2014and all the while he lectured too.</span></b></b></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>\n</b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Rothschild gave Narendra his new name Swami Vivekananda just before he boarded his ship in May 1893.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Capt Ajit Vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">..</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SORRY TO SAY THIS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; Too many positive ions ( modern air pollution) can cause depression,\nand ultimately,&nbsp; illnesses. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Negative\nions stimulate the reticuloendothelial system , a group of defense cells in our\nbodies which marshal our resistance to disease.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"> R</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">eticuloendothelial\nsystem a network of cells and tissues found throughout the body, especially in\nthe blood, general connective tissue, spleen, liver, lungs, bone marrow, and\nlymph nodes.&nbsp; These cells are concerned\nwith blood cell formation and destruction, storage of fatty materials, and\nmetabolism of iron and pigment, and they play a role in inflammation and\nimmunity.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Some of the cells are motile\u2014that is, capable of spontaneous\nmotion\u2014and phagocytic\u2014they can ingest and destroy unwanted foreign material.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;
