, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">These positive and negative charges of energy are the basis\nof swara yoga.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The ancient rishis called the negative flow ida and the positive\nflow pingala. &nbsp;The maharishis &nbsp;of yore knew the techniques to channelize\nbio-energy or prana throughout the body. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Just as electrical power is at our disposal\nby connecting a switch to the main power line, so the rishis knew how to\nconnect the switches and circuits of energy in the body.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">They\nunderstood that the flow of energy, whether internal or external, is constantly\nbeing circulated from the more highly charged to the lesser charged centres in\norder to create a balance between the positive and negative poles. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Swara yoga teaches us to manipulate the flow\nof breath through the nostrils, thereby controlling the energy switches in our\nown body which regulate the flow of positive and negative currents.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">VIVEKANANDA\nWAS MADE TO SLEEP WITH HIS HEAD FACING THE NORTH, WHILE HE WAS ON VIVEKANANDA\nROCK<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/for-not-too-bright-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/for-not-too-bright-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Negative\nions &nbsp;help people sleep better .</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">With quality sleep, cells are repaired, the immune system is\nstrengthened and mental functions are sharpened. Quality sleep can also help\nreduce the occurrence of common pains such as backache, and increase your\nresistance to illness.</span> &nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Negative ions play a role in causing blood flow to increase\nthrough dilation of the capillaries, thus causing greater oxygenation to occur.\nThe oxygen level in hemoglobin is increased, helping to maintain good health\nand well being. This promotes cell respiration, helping us heal.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It is\nby balancing these two poles of energy that the ancient yogi brings about the\nawakening of kundalini, the high powered generator which illumines the\nfabulous, hitherto unexplored areas of the brain responsible for all of man's\ningenuity, higher knowledge and self-realization<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nSympathetic and Parasympathetic Nervous systems are what is referred to in Yoga\nparlance as the Ida and Pingala Nadis. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nSympathetic Nervous System primes the body for action known as the Fight and\nFlight response. This keeps the energy and blood circulating to the skeletal\nmuscles. The Parasympathetic Nervous System is for rest-and-digest\" or\n\"feed and breed. This keeps the energy and blood concentrated near the\norgans.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Sympathetic\n( Tamas ) and Parasympathetic divisions ( Rajas ) typically function in\nopposition to each other. &nbsp;But this\nopposition is better termed complementary in nature rather than antagonistic. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">For an analogy, one may think of the\nSympathetic division as the accelerator and the Parasympathetic division as the\nbrake. The Sympathetic division typically functions in actions requiring quick\nresponses. The Parasympathetic division functions with actions that do not\nrequire immediate reaction. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nSympathetic Nervous System originates from the left side of the Sushmna. &nbsp;It flows into the left nostril ultimately\ncrossing and powering the right side of the brain.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">As\nlong as our Sushumna is clogged, the energy cannot make it to the Third Eye\n(Ajna Chakra) and we live in darkness (Body Consciousness). &nbsp;&nbsp;The Third Eye literally turns on just like a\nlight when it receives the proper energy from the Sushumna.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nspecific functions of the cerebral region of the brain correlate with the\nactivities of ida and pingala. &nbsp;The &nbsp;cerebrum is symmetrical, consisting of the\nright and left &nbsp;hemispheres.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-LJDcYrkVvQ8/Wc-Radl7exI/AAAAAAABV0A/-fQCfLaatqMvMrGTk1E97U10h4eN6ugvgCLcBGAs/s1600/Hjjerne2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"420\" data-original-width=\"596\" height=\"450\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-LJDcYrkVvQ8/Wc-Radl7exI/AAAAAAABV0A/-fQCfLaatqMvMrGTk1E97U10h4eN6ugvgCLcBGAs/s640/Hjjerne2.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nright brainlobe &nbsp;governs the left side of\n&nbsp;the body and the left brainlobe governs\nthe right side of the body. &nbsp;&nbsp;Ida is\nconnected to the right hemisphere and &nbsp;pingala\nto the left.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Pingala\nemerges on the right hand side of mooladhara, &nbsp;exactly opposite to ida. It spirals up the\nspinal column, &nbsp;crossing ida at the four\nmajor energy centres, and terminates &nbsp;at\nthe root of the right nostril.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Pingala governs the whole &nbsp;right side of the body.&nbsp; To control pingala the\nbreath in the &nbsp;right nostril is\nmanipulated by the Swara Yogi.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>Below:&nbsp; Pingala\nNadi,&nbsp; Right side of the body,&nbsp; Right Nostril , Left Brain dominance.&nbsp; &nbsp;</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>&nbsp;Ida Nadi\n,&nbsp; Left side of body , Left Nostril ,&nbsp; Right brain dominance . &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>Subconscious brain lobe is right side for\nright handers .</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-NcYyIpnLsus/Wc-RA3W7p_I/AAAAAAABVz8/TaxLzhk-guomocswd_pDcqBtaUBfrg9FgCLcBGAs/s1600/Nandis.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"499\" data-original-width=\"474\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-NcYyIpnLsus/Wc-RA3W7p_I/AAAAAAABVz8/TaxLzhk-guomocswd_pDcqBtaUBfrg9FgCLcBGAs/s640/Nandis.jpg\" width=\"606\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">An\nelectrical circuit, has &nbsp;three specific\nwires-- one positive, one negative and one neutral.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Likewise,\nwithin the body there are three specific nadis for conducting energy. In yoga &nbsp;the negative line is ida, the channel of manas\nshakti &nbsp;or mental force .The positive &nbsp;line is pingala, which channels the dynamic\nenergy of prana &nbsp;shakti. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">In\norder to avoid short-circuiting of these lines there &nbsp;is a third channel, sushumna , which functions\nas an earth &nbsp;wire, being rooted in\nmooladhara chakra, when it is in its &nbsp;dormant\nstate.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">But the real purpose of sushumna is to &nbsp;provide a channel for the spiritual energy,\nwhich is a greater force than either manas or prana shakti.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nswara yogi &nbsp;manipulates the flow of air\nin the left nostril in order to control ida directly and either bring about its\ninfluence at will or suppress it when necessary.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/chakra-vortex-scalar-energy-transciever.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/chakra-vortex-scalar-energy-transciever.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">According\nto swara yoga, left nostril breathing influences the activities of manas\nshakti, and indicates that introversion and mental creativity predominate so\nthat any extremely dynamic or extrovert activity should be avoided.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Ida\nnadi, the negative channel, brings consciousness into every part of the body. &nbsp;&nbsp;Shiva Swarodaya likens its nature to the energy created by the moon; therefore,\nit is also &nbsp;known as the chandra or lunar\nnadi.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Ida is associated with &nbsp;the parasympathetic nervous system (PNS),\nwhich sends impulses to the visceral organs to stimulate the internal &nbsp;processes. This creates a general state of\nrelaxation in the &nbsp;superficial muscles,\nthus lowering the outer body temperature.&nbsp; &nbsp;Ida is\ncooling, relaxing and introverting.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Pingala\nis the transmitter of prana shakti. &nbsp;It\nis the positive &nbsp;aspect, also known as\nthe surya or solar nadi because its &nbsp;energy\nis as invigorating as the sun's rays.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Pingala energy &nbsp;activates the physical body and externalizes\nawareness. It is &nbsp;associated with the\nsympathetic nervous system (SNS), which &nbsp;releases\nadrenaline to stimulate the superficial muscles. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The SNS prepares the body to cope with stress\nand external &nbsp;activity; for example, it\nmakes the heart beat rapidly and &nbsp;heats\nthe body.&nbsp; &nbsp;Pingala is energizing, &nbsp;heating and extroverting.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nnegative ion concentration in ida nadi quickly increases from its rest or basal\nconcentration during left nostril inhalation. &nbsp;&nbsp;It then reaches a maximum and begins to fall\noff gradually, because the concentration of ions is greater in the regions of\nlow pranic density and less in regions of high pranic density. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nnegative ion concentration in ida nadi quickly increases from its rest or basal\nconcentration during left nostril inhalation. &nbsp;&nbsp;It then reaches a maximum and begins to fall\noff gradually, because the concentration of ions is greater in the regions of\nlow pranic density and less in regions of high pranic density.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">At the\nionoplasmic centres (chakras) where ida and pingala are in the closest\nproximity, one being in front of sushumna and the other behind, there is an\neffect called ionic migration and annihilation. When the negative ions from ida\nmigrate towards pingala, attracted by its positive ions, many are annihilated\nas they merge.</span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-fSlKSoI3R4Q/Wc-PVgGH_NI/AAAAAAABVzw/CpollP_aTEkoXRIOIuGHg04A7jctDdgfQCLcBGAs/s1600/DIAGRdAM-OF-THE-PARASYMPATHETIC-AND-SYMPATHETIC-BRANCHES-OF-THE-NERVOUS-SYTEM.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"328\" data-original-width=\"556\" height=\"376\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-fSlKSoI3R4Q/Wc-PVgGH_NI/AAAAAAABVzw/CpollP_aTEkoXRIOIuGHg04A7jctDdgfQCLcBGAs/s640/DIAGRdAM-OF-THE-PARASYMPATHETIC-AND-SYMPATHETIC-BRANCHES-OF-THE-NERVOUS-SYTEM.gif\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Swara\nyoga explains that the two major energy circuits, ida &nbsp;and pingala, can be regulated and controlled\nby means of &nbsp;the breath. If these\ncurrents are not flowing properly, it &nbsp;becomes\nquite evident in the breath<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Unconscious\nbreathing is controlled by the medulla oblongata in the brain stem, a region\nknown as the primitive brain, while conscious breathing comes from the more\nevolved areas of the brain in the cerebral cortex.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Pranayama\ncreates static electricity in the body which helps to recharge the positive\nions breathed in from the environment and convert them into negative ions.&nbsp; &nbsp;The\neffect is the same as that created by rain and thunderstorm<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Hatha\nYoga Pradipika states: \"If the air is inhaled through the &nbsp;left nostril, it should be expelled again\nthrough the right. &nbsp;Then breathing in\nthrough the right and retaining, it should &nbsp;be expelled through the left. \"(2: 10) .&nbsp; This particular practice, &nbsp;which is known as nadi shodhana, brings about\nregularity in &nbsp;the whole system and is\nextremely important in swara yoga &nbsp;for &nbsp;harmonizing the pranic flow.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Negative\nions have been dubbed \u201cthe happy element\u201d because they help to increase the\noxygen-carrying capacity of the blood \u2014 especially to the brain.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Negative ions\nalso speed up the oxidation of serotonin (5-hydroxtryptamine), which has\npositive effects on mood, pain relief and sexual drive. They also counteract\nfree radicals \u2014 known as positive ions \u2014 which are created through exposure to\nenvironmental toxins \u2014 like chemicals, electronic equipment, cellphones and\nradiation.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Moreover, negative ions encourage proper pH and hormonal balance in\nthe body, while also strengthening metabolism and the immune system.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Modern\ntechnology is recklessly &nbsp;destroying the\nnatural balance of ions in the atmosphere, &nbsp;especially in more populated areas. Deficiency\nof negative &nbsp;ions is a major contributing\nfactor to the rise of physical and &nbsp;mental\ndepression people are suffering today<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Exposure\nto WiFi can result in a buildup of positive ions in your body.&nbsp; &nbsp;In&nbsp; my childhood I used to see and run after\nTHUMBIs ( small dragon flies) and butterflies \u2014all have disappeared.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Swara\nyoga equates Shakti and Shiva with prana and &nbsp;chitta, which manifest in the body as the two\nnadis, pingala &nbsp;and ida. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;In Samkhya philosophy they are known as\nprakriti and purusha, which created the cosmos .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_178M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/09/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_30.html?showComment=1506827350149#c931298814126135710\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 1, 2017 at 8:39 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_68MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nRECENTLY OUR LOSER LAWYER TURNED COLLEGIUM JUDGES ( BOTTOM DREGS OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL ) BANNED BURNING OF CROP STUBBLE ( WHICH PRODUCES BIOCHAR ) BECAUSE OF DELHI SMOG\u2026<br />\nIF THIS IS THE CASE SHIFT THE CAPITAL OF INDIA TO A PLACE WHERE THERE IS NO TEMPERATURE INVERSION\u2026.<br />\nIndian were to first on the planet to do agriculture. ..We taught the rest of the planet about the magic of BIOCHAR \u2026 Biochar has the ability to sequester carbon out of the atmosphere and back into the ground ...Tall grasses burn quick and hot, however, close to the ground where the roots start, air is excluded so the base of the grasses will pyrolyze and not burn\u2026 Carbon is the most essential element of soil fertility. When organic matter is added to agricultural soils to increase carbon levels, most of it rapidly decomposes to carbon dioxide and escapes to the atmosphere... Only a very small percentage eventually becomes stable humic matter... Humification takes decades to centuries..The process creates a fine-grained, highly porous charcoal that helps soils retain nutrients and water\u2026.Biochar serves as an electron buffer for redox reactions and helps bacteria swap electrons among themselves, improving their metabolic efficiency as a microbial community.. ..With its pores and its electrical charges, biochar is capable of both aBsorption and aDsorption.. ..The surfaces of biochar, both internal and external, aDsorb materials by electro-chemical bonds, working like an electric sponge...Biochar surfaces adsorb carbon and retain it in compounds with minerals, supporting at the same time a large microbial community that potentially makes more efficient use of organic debris containing carbon and other nutrients...Unlike biochar, compost is quickly broken down by microbial action in soil over months to at most, decades, depending primarily on climate... Biochar lasts at least ten times longer in most soils.... Biochar is effective at retaining nitrogen in soils and there is NO need for CHEMICAL UREA...The desh drohi GREEN REVOLUTION has left us with a rapidly deteriorating climate, and soils that are dying and eroding.... Biochar, as a form of recalcitrant carbon, is the medicine that DELIBERETELY degraded and unproductive Indian top soils need....India was blessed with HUMUS laden topsoil with healthy microbes and earthworms for millions of years.... Just 55 years of desh drohi GREEN REVOLUTION has decimated our holy topsoil...THIS IS THE ONLY INTELLIGENT WAY TO PREVENT FARMER SUICIDES...The desh drohi GREEN REVOLUTION has caused our holy topsoil to lose 80% of their original soil organic carbon (SOC) pool...<br />\n90% of our lakes have disappeared due to artificial nitro fertIliser overuse. ..<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5017809766937878946\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_69M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nJune 21, 2016 at 11:24 AM<br />\nhi is,<br />\n<br />\nSAI BABA OF SHIRDI WAS CREATED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD USING HIS CHITPAVAN JEW AND PARSI STOOGES.<br />\n<br />\nShirdi Sai baba died only 98 years ago.<br />\n<br />\nHe wandered out of the kingdom of hyderabad ( ruled by Crypto JEW Nizam ) and landed up at Shirdi.<br />\n<br />\nA Hindu goldsmith who first saw him called him \" Sai baba\"- as he was dressed like a sufi saint.<br />\n<br />\nThis young Muslim stranger surviving by begging for alms.<br />\n<br />\nI have seen several black and white photos of his shown to me by a Muslim quarter master whose grandfather took care of Sai Baba while he stayed under a neem tree .<br />\n<br />\nHis close up photos showed Sai baba had light eyes and he whispered to me that Muslims in Shirdi knew that he was a Jew masquerading as a Muslim\u2014 that is why their family rejected him.<br />\n<br />\nInitially Shirdi Sai Baba stayed under a neem tree for 4 years. Women used to be afraid of him, as he used to wear torn clothes, smoke hashish and mutter under his breath, when he saw them approaching. He often used to take his intestines out of his anus to dry it-- yogis usually wash it in the river..<br />\n<br />\nSince he often uttered \"allah malik\" ( allah is supreme ) and did namaz daily, and was dressed like a sufi singer, he was directed to stay in a dilapidated mosque where he stayed for the next 50 years.<br />\n<br />\nIn the disused broken down mosque he maintained a fire for warming himself which he referred to as a dhuni, from which he gave sacred ashes ('Udhi') to his guests before they left \u2013 always with the words ALLAH MALIK ( allah is supreme ) . He was illiterate and did NOT know how to read or write.<br />\n<br />\nA Haji Abdul Baba appeared from nowhere and gave company to Sai Baba when he became too old.<br />\n<br />\nJew Rothschild converted him to an avatar of Hindu god Shiva after he died . Sorry, Lord Shiva has NO avatars. Till he died he was a local man and the local muslims created a dargah. Today NO muslim goes there .<br />\n<br />\nAs soon as he died the white invader created a Hindu temple at Bhivpuri, Karjat , Mumbai.<br />\n<br />\nA myth was perpetrated that \" He who cometh to My Mazaar(tomb), his sorrow and suffering shall cease\".<br />\n<br />\nShirdi was a small farming village consisting of a few dilapidated houses in 1918 , when shirdi sai baba died.<br />\n<br />\nToday the town survives on a \"money spinning \" industry.... Shirdi Sai baba industry. It is estimated they milk more than hundreds of crores every year.<br />\n<br />\nThey splashed in Parsi/ Chitpavan Brahmin controlled media about miracles such as invisibilty, astral travel, bilocation, levitation, mindreading, materialisation, exorcisms, making the river Yamuna, entering a state of Samadhi at will ( this takes the cake ) , lighting lamps with water, removing his limbs or intestines and sticking them back to his body (khandana yoga if you pleaJJe ), curing the incurably sick, appearing beaten when another was beaten, after death rising on third day ( resurrection like Jesus Christ ), preventing a mosque from falling down on people, and helping his devotees in miraculous ways, creating ad stopping rain BLAH BLAH .<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_100BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE The Markandeya\nPurana reports that Dattatreya, to free himself of all attachments, dove into a\nlake where he stayed for many years. By doing so, he also hoped to evade an\nassembly of Munis who remained on the banks of the lake awaiting his return.\nDatta emerged from the water naked in the company of a beautiful woman. The\ntext relates that he made love with her (maithuna), drank liquor, and enjoyed\nsinging and music. font-size: large;\"><b>YES-- KAMA HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH SEX.</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/07/kamasutra-by-vatsayana-immoral-sexual.html</span><br />\n<br />\nKama is a broad subject which encompasses arts, emotions, poetry . relationships and other sciences. By Purushartha we mean the pursuance of those actions which lead to the fulfillment of socially approved values and goal. Kama refers to all the desires in man for the enjoyment and satisfaction and sensual gratification of the five human senses.<br />\n<br />\nKAMA could be music or being creative or team spirit in sport or travelling to places of natural beauty or sitting with family at the beach or riding a fast horse or participating in a arrow shooting contest - anything which brings delight to human life and spirit .<br />\n<br />\nIt has absolutely nothing to do with LUST and sexual orgasm. Kama would refer to the totality of the innate desires and drives of man- motivations of man.</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<b style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\">Kama refers to the instinctive and emotional life of man, and provides for the satisfaction of his aesthetic urges.</b></div>\n<br />\nSanatana Dharma wants man and woman to be happy as this is the chief purpose of life and of course the final goal of Moksha.<br />\n<br />\nTATTUS ( CANT GET THE PRICK UP ) AND HOMOSEXUALS HAVE HIJACKED MOKSHA<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\"></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\"><br /></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_156M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. \"If all the Punjabis were to die to the\nlast man without killing (a single Muslim), Punjab will be immortal. Offer yourselves\nas nonviolent willing sacrifices.\" (Collins and Lapierre, Freedom at\nMidnight, p-385).<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>Gandhi\nspeaking to Hindu refugees&nbsp; &nbsp;\u201cHindus should never be angry against the\nMuslims even if the latter might make up their minds to undo their (Hindus\u2019)\nexistence. If they put all of us to the sword, we should court death bravely. \u2026\nWe are destined to be born and die, then why need we feel gloomy over it?\u201d (speech\ndelivered on April 6, 1947).<o:p></o:p></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-g3Vgk1E1Wi0/WdHXXo8vyrI/AAAAAAABV3Y/BBIe8swfQ58WIE1r2L1xrzoZ4CG13o3zgCLcBGAs/s1600/XXimages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"167\" data-original-width=\"302\" height=\"220\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-g3Vgk1E1Wi0/WdHXXo8vyrI/AAAAAAABV3Y/BBIe8swfQ58WIE1r2L1xrzoZ4CG13o3zgCLcBGAs/s400/XXimages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>\"If\nthose killed have died bravely, they have not lost anything but earned\nsomething.\" They should not be afraid of death. After all, the killers\nwill be none other than our Muslim brothers.\" (Shri Nathuram Godse, Why I\nAssassinated Gandhi, p-92,93<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">Gandhi\u2019s\nfantastic advise to Hindu women&nbsp; \u201cIf a\nMuslim expressed his desire to rape a Hindu or a Sikh lady, she should never refuse\nhim but cooperate with him. She should lie down like a dead with her tongue in\nbetween her teeth. Thus the rapist Muslim will be satisfied soon and sooner he\nleave her. font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">A laser hologram is that it exhibits the distributive property. This means that even a small part of an entire holographic record contains the entire record of the recorded image .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">The fact that living cells in any organism evolve and grow from more simple stem cells, implies quantum entanglement throughout the organism and its composite parts, with an associated instantaneous exchange of information through PCAR.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">PCAR is necessary for the brain to perceive objects as they really exist in three dimensional space. If the brain had to rely solely on the visible light spectrum that was reflected off the external object and onto the retina of the eyes, the object would appear two dimensional just as it would be if a picture of the object was recorded photographically with a camera.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Contrary to the popular opinion that we see objects in three dimensions entirely because of binocular vision, just close one eye and observe an external object with the remaining open eye. The object appears \"out there\" and not as an image \"in the brain\" because of PCAR. This clearly presents a survival advantage to an organism allowing it to accurately see and locate objects (especially predators and food) in three dimensional space.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Normally these emissions are random exchanges of energy between particles and the ZPF. Recall that the quantum phenomena of non-locality implies instantaneous transmission of information across space and time<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">The Quantum Hologram is a model of how reality works. Like all models it enables us to make predictions and create interpretations about how nature operates<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Every one of our cells contains the same genetic blueprint of DNA and clearly that DNA and environmental influences exert major influences over the development and functioning of our cells. But cells are not only subordinate to DNA; they also function and maintain homeostasis by communicating and cooperating simultaneously with many other cells of the body and by the information they receive from the environment. Much of this inter-cellular signaling is electrochemical in nature<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">With up to 100 trillion cells it is hard to imagine how that many cells can remain in harmony by the slow process of electrochemical signaling especially under times of great distress when survival of the entire organism is at stake and / or requires extremely rapid and coordinated responses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Epigenetics which is the study of the mechanisms by which the environment influences cells and their offspring without changing genetic codes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Inter-cellular communication is especially critical in embryonic development. From a single fertilized egg, the embryo divides thousands of times and each time producing identical offspring cells called stem cells. Then at some critical point when the embryo has reached a certain size, something truly miraculous happens.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">CONTINUED TO 4--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">CONTINUED FROM 2-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Cells begin to differentiate and form groups of like cells that will eventually become all the highly specialized tissues and organs that make up the human body. Out of the entire mass of undifferentiated cells making up the embryo, how does a particular stem cell suddenly know that it is to transform into a heart cell, liver cell, neuron, etc?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Clearly, some of the differentiation results from electrochemical signaling with the immediate surrounding cells. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE:&nbsp; Criminal investigation is all about picking\nup a lead- and then following it with determination to the logical end.&nbsp; It always succeeds.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let me tell you about a\ntrue incident which happened on my ship at Kingston anchorage, Jamaica. We were\nto go to dry dock and the paint store was full of ship side paint-- a fortune,\nas the orange ( 99.99% Sulphuric acid resistant ) paint is very expensive.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At 0630, My Jamaican\nThird Mate knocks on my door and tells me that the paint store is empty, and\nthe lock is broken. &nbsp;This now meant our dry docking would be delayed and all\ncommercial plans would go PHUT!.&nbsp; And\nCapt Vadakayil would smell of shit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So I called up the\nagents and told them to come on my ship immediately, with the local police.\nMeanwhile I found that one of the drums was leaking slightly as there were\ndrips on Orange paint till the area on the main deck where they lowered it into\na boat .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As soon as the agent\nand the police came, I told them to take me to all the small boat berths in\nthat area, starting off with the furthest and the least busiest, at that\nhour.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As we approached the first berth\nitself, I could see by binoculars a huge black guy sitting at the water edge\nand despondently trying to scrape off orange marks from his body. It will NOT\ncome off unless you apply a specific thinner stripper.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anyway we bush whacked\nhim, and got him to confess , where the paints have been taken by a lorry. The\npaints were back on board within two hours.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Later the Third mate\ntells me&nbsp; &nbsp;\" As soon as you left , the Jamaican crew\nwere commenting,&nbsp; that our Indian Captain\nhas the brains to get all the paint back. &nbsp;And they were laying out wagers &nbsp;. Because all were terribly afraid of a brutal\nJamaican police inquiry , which could mean losing their jobs , as an 'inside\njob' \" .</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To be frank, I felt\ngood.&nbsp; UNQUOTE&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-vG3e4yBDTaU/WF61PSK1MlI/AAAAAAABP5g/DNh5i6N7VbEuFyZOlv1_bosR9sG0B50GgCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; max-width: 36px; padding: 5px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7460329188405863224\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_57M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/09/inquiry-into-death-of-cm-of-tamil-nadu.html?showComment=1506502014313#c2932337392781133656\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 27, 2017 at 2:16 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_18MC\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOME READERS HAVE BEEN FOLLOWING MY ADVISE AND HAVE BEEN TAKING FRESH GARLIC IN THE MORNING<br />\n<br />\nGARLIC HAS FULL POTENCY ONLY IF IT IS CHEWED AND MIXED WITH SALIVA<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">OTHERWISE IT IS LIKE TUBE FEEDING JAYALALITHAA IN HOSPITAL</span></b><br />\n<br />\nProduced in salivary glands, saliva contains many important substances, including electrolytes, mucus, antibacterial compounds and various enzymes. Saliva contains enzyme amylase that breaks some starches down into maltose and dextrin. Digestion of food occurs within the mouth, even before food reaches the stomach.<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br />6200 YEAR OLD AYURVEDA GAVE IMPORTANCE TO MIXING FOOD WITH SALIVA. PICKLES WERE USED TO PRODUCE SALIVA .&nbsp; &nbsp;THERE WERE RULES WHICH PART OF THE TONGUE MUST COME IN CONTACT WITH PICKLES TO EXCRETE MAXIMUM SALIVA. THIS IS WHY WE ATE WITH FINGERS.</span></b><br />\n<br />\nTHERE WERE EVEN RULES WHICH NOSTRIL ( LEFT/ RIGHT ) MUST BE PREDOMINANT WHILE EATING CERTAIN FOODS ( SWARA YOGA )<br />\n<br />\nSalivary glands to go into overdrive when you eat very spicy foods. Now you know why Indians eat spicy food.<br />\n<br />\nTO KEEP SALIVA DUCTS CLEAN \u2013 OILPULLING WAS DONE WITH VIRGIN COCONUT OIL.. THIS WAS THE PRIMARY NEED \u2013SECONDARY WAS TO PROTECT GUMS AND TEETH<br />\n<br />\nTaste buds on your tongue play a big role in how much saliva you make. Indians scrape the tongue of gooey slime . Pop something spicy cum sour pickle in your mouth and your taste buds react by telling your body to make more saliva.<br />\n<br />\nThe salivary glands sit inside each cheek, at the bottom of your mouth, and near your front teeth by the jaw bone. There are six major salivary glands and hundreds of minor ones. Usually, the body makes the most saliva in the late afternoon.<br />\nIt makes the least amount at night.<br />\n<br />\nDry mouth causes the gums, tongue, and other tissues in the mouth to become swollen and uncomfortable. Germs thrive in this type of setting. A germy, dry mouth leads to bad breath.<br />\nI brush my teeth and scrape my tongue at night before going to sleep.<br />\n<br />\nIf you have dry mouth, you may also notice you do not taste things like you used to.<br />\n<br />\n\"Fight or flight\" stress response gives you a dry mouth.<br />\n<br />\nSwallowing saliva protects the digestive tract by shielding the esophagus from harmful irritants, and helping to prevent gastrointestinal reflux (heartburn). Have morning tea before brushing your teeth.<br />\n<br />\nSaliva serves as the mouth\u2019s natural protector against bacteria created acids by washing them away or otherwise neutralizing them. It also contains calcium and phosphate ions that essentially reverse the decay process by helping to re-mineralize teeth.<br />\n<br />\nCapt Ajit Vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_22B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4844226718381455980\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_22M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/09/inquiry-into-death-of-cm-of-tamil-nadu.html?showComment=1506522525562#c7495508167106436517\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 27, 2017 at 7:58 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_33MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nEvery body in the universe spins! Interstellar molecules spin. Stars, planets, satellites, even entire galaxies and clusters of galaxies all are known to spin-- the whole universe spins!<br />\n<br />\nRATIONALISTS WHO THROW SHIT ON HINDUISM WONT AND NEED NOT UNDERSTAND THIS --THIS IS MENTIONED IN OUR VEDAS.<br />\n<br />\nThe existence of spin as a force account for why the universe has not come together in clumps, for spin forces operate at right angles to gravity forces.<br />\n<br />\nThe term CHAKRA means wheel in Sanskrit and these spinning energy vortices are seen as structures in the body\u2019s subtle energy anatomy.<br />\n<br />\nWhen I wrote the post below-- all were most sarcastic--they called me a CRACKPOT<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/chakra-vortex-scalar-energy-transciever.html</span><br />\n<br />\nSubtle energy is to electromagnetism as water vapor is to water. Just as we do not measure water vapor with the same tools we use to measure water, we can\u2019t use the same tools to measure subtle energy that we use to measure electricity.<br />\n<br />\nSCALAR WAVES ( TESLA ) CANNOT BE SHIELDED BY FARADAY CAGES. WHEN MY ELDER SON HAS A HEADACHE HE CALLS MY WIFE-- SHE SENDS HIM REIKI SCALAR WAVES FROM HALF WAY AROUND THE GLOBE .<br />\n<br />\nTHESE SCALAR WAVES ARE FASTER THAN LIGHT AND PASSES THROUGH THE EARTH. THIS IS WHY WIKIPEDIA WILL EVER ALLOW AN ARTICLE ON CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<br />\n<br />\nMAHARISHIS WITH 12 STRAND DNA COULD READ AURAS. SUPERMEN MAHARISHIS EXISTED ONLY IN THE HOLY LAND OF INDIA<br />\n<br />\nPRANA in Sanskrit and Malayalam means primal energy or \u201cvital force\"<br />\n<br />\nPrana is the master form of all energy working at every level of our being. The entire cosmos is a manifestation of prana.<br />\n<br />\nPrana awakens the three and a half coils of kundalini shakti, with a HISSSSSS --- the serpent power or inner energy which transforms our consciousness, develops from awakened prana.<br />\n<br />\nShiva and his wife Shakti are the characters in SANKHYA vedanta..From the unmanifest prana of pure awareness comes the manifest prana of creation, through which the entire universe comes into being. There is no SEMEN here.<br />\n<br />\nThe Pranamaya kosha (sheath made of breath) is the vital body, composed of five aspects of prana called vayus. I have written about it before.. This KOSHA mediates between the physical body on one side and the three sheaths of the mind (outer mind, intelligence, and inner mind) on the other.<br />\n<br />\nPranamaya Kosha mediates between the five gross elements and the five sensory impressions. . It provides us with enthusiasm and motivation for all we do.<br />\n<br />\nI had also written about the VAYUS-- like Prana Vayu , Apana Vayu , Udana Vayu, Samana Vayu , Vyana Vayu etc before<br />\n<br />\nPrana brings in the fuel, samana converts this fuel to energy, and vyana circulates the energy to various worksites. Apana disposes of the waste products produced by the conversion process. Udana manages the energy thus created, enabling the machine to function effectively.<br />\n<br />\nBreathing is the main form of pranic activity in the body. He who masters BREATH is the true Yogi. I have NOT talked about this is my 2 part yoga series--as this is advanced level<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/01/yoga-only-complete-exercise.html</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/01/yoga-only-complete-exercise-part-2-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\nOn a psychological level, prana governs our receptivity to positive sources of nourishment, feeling, and knowledge through the mind and senses.<br />\n<br />\nAs we practice yoga, the subtle aspects of these pranas begin to awaken.<br />\n<br />\nThe Vedas say that mortals eat food with apana, while the gods eat food with prana.<br />\n<br />\nRegular alternate nostril breathing is the most important method for keeping our pranas or energies in balance<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/pranayama-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\nNadi shodhana (alternate nostril breathing), helps balance right and left prana currents.<br />\n<br />\nThe body and all its channels have a right or left predominance. We must learn to be open to and welcome this greater force and seek to bring it more fully into our life and actions. This is THE greatest secret of yoga.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3-</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_34b+seedDBlnD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-thread\" id=\"bc_0_32T_box\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_34b+seedDBlnD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_34b+seedDBlnD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_34B_box\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_36B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1384837764123927313\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_36M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/09/inquiry-into-death-of-cm-of-tamil-nadu.html?showComment=1506523333759#c1384837764123927313\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 27, 2017 at 8:12 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_36MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2-<br />\n<br />\n\u201ccatvari vak parimita padani tani vidur brahmana ye minishinah, guha trini nihita neengayanti turiyam vaco manushya vadanti\u201d --RIG VEDA 1.164.45--5000 BC<br />\n<br />\n\"The cognoscenti know of the Vak that exists in four forms . Three are hidden and the fourth is what men speak\"<br />\n<br />\nPARA VAK is the transcendent speech, it is the unified field, the seat of super consciousness where the I is merged in the whole, the ultimate divine vibration that creates the cosmos.<br />\n<br />\nSEERS HEARD THE SRUTIS OF PARA VAK<br />\n<br />\nParaa Nada is a high frequency sound, so high that it does not stir or produce any vibrations.<br />\n<br />\n\u0915\u093e\u092e\u0938\u094d\u0924\u0926\u0917\u094d\u0930\u0946 \u0938\u092e\u0935\u0930\u094d\u0924\u0924\u093e\u0927\u093f \u092e\u0928\u0938\u094a \u0930\u0946\u0924: \u092a\u094d\u0930\u0925\u092e\u0902 \u092f\u0926\u093e\u0938\u0940\u0924\u094d \u0964<br />\n\u0938\u0924\u094a\u092c\u0928\u094d\u0927\u0941\u092e\u0938\u0924\u093f \u0928\u093f\u0930\u0935\u093f\u0928\u094d\u0926\u0928\u094d\u0939\u0943\u0926\u093f \u092a\u094d\u0930\u0924\u0940\u0937\u094d\u092f\u093e \u0915\u0935\u092f\u094a \u092e\u0928\u0940\u0937\u093e \u0965\u096a\u0965<br />\n<br />\nkamastadagre samavartatadhi | manaso retah prathamam yadasit |<br />\n<br />\nsato bandhumasati niravindanna | hrudi pratishya kavayo manisha || 4 ||<br />\n<br />\nIn the great cosmic mind all pervading<br />\nVibrations of Kama sprout from conscious thought<br />\nThe seers who have searched within with wisdom<br />\nHave witnessed the conscious equation between matter and energy<br />\n<br />\nThe video below is understood in the 7000 year old Vedas- if you are NOT shocked you have NOT understood it . This is the reason why all Quantum physicists including Einstein desired to be cremated as Hindus.<br />\n<br />\narthashrayatvam shabdasya<br />\ndrashtur lingatvam eva ca<br />\ntan-matratvam ca nabhaso<br />\nlakshanam kavayo viduh-- SRIMAD BHAGAVATAM 3.26.33 --5000 BC<br />\n<br />\n\"Persons who are learned and who have true knowledge define sound as that which conveys the idea of an object, indicates the presence of a speaker and constitutes the subtle form of ether\"<br />\n<br />\nSound is not just the vibration created by the meeting of two objects. Sound is that which conveys the idea of an object. The exact word used in this connection is \"artha-ashraya\" or \"the shelter of the meaning\". In the Vedic conception the aksharas (letters) are bijas, or seeds of existence.<br />\n<br />\nThe audible sound is categorized into 54 alphabets of Sanskrit/ Malayalam--the triple intersections of the Sri Yantra divine geometry.<br />\n<br />\nIn the Tantras the aksharas are traced back to their material source level which is a particular deity of Shakti. Each of her stages of manifestation are phases in the evolution of the universe.<br />\n<br />\nTHE WHITE INVADER HAS REDUCED TANTRA TO PERVERTED ANAL SEX. ALL OF TANTRA ARE SRUTIS--IN THE FORM OF AMAZING CONVERSATIONS BETWEEN PURUSHA AND PRAKRITI ( SHIVA AND HIS WIFE SHAKTI ) ABOUT CREATION OF THE COSMOS AT MACRO AND MICRO LEVELS.<br />\n<br />\nTantra affirms that the creative force of the universe resides in all the 54 letters of the alphabet. The different letters symbolize the different functions of that creative force, and their totality is designated as matrika or the \"mother in essence\".<br />\n<br />\nTantra sees the mantras as not just a mere combination of whimsical sounds but as the subtle form of the presiding deity; and the real purpose of one\u2019s meditation through the mantra is to communicate with the deity of that particular mantra.<br />\n<br />\nA KOSHER IDIOT NAMED NOAM CHOMSKY TRIED TO MAKE LINGUISTICS IN ENGLISH TO MATCH SANSKRIT MANTRAS -- WHAT A CUNT !<br />\n<br />\nThe Shiva-Shakti dance generated a rhythmic spiritual sound which the Vedic Rishis termed as NADA BRAHMAN, the initial primordial sound of extremely high frequencies that were beyond one\u2019s imagination. The union of two triangles is the six pointed star --stolen by Jews<br />\n<br />\nYogakundalyupanishad III.18-19 ( 5000 bc ) says that sound sprouts in Par\u0101 (supreme) form, it becomes two-leafed (that is first manifested) in Pashyanti (radiant) form, buds in the Madhyama (subliminal) form and blooms in Vaikhari (acoustic) form; sound thus produced will become unmanifested, when the order is reversed.<br />\n<br />\nShabda Brahman is the source of sound and is in the form of sound which is unmanifest, therefore it is called PARA.<br />\n<br />\nSANATANA SHARMA IS ROOTED IN SOUND<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 4-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_36BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_36b+seedDBlqD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_35T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_35TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_36b+seedDBlqD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_35B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5148421199797154031\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_35M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/09/inquiry-into-death-of-cm-of-tamil-nadu.html?showComment=1506523386737#c5148421199797154031\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 27, 2017 at 8:13 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_35MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 3---<br />\n<br />\nShabda brahmAn manifests through his power of maya first as para vani in the mooladhara chakra at the perineum, then as pashyanti in the manipura chakra at the navel, next as madhyama in the heart and then eventually as vaikhari in the throat and mouth.<br />\n<br />\nThe first three are internal and yogic and can be experienced only by seers. The fourth stage is Vaikhari is the audible speech, which is used by all human beings.<br />\n<br />\nThese states of consciousness correspond with the four states known technically as Jagrat, Svapna, Sushupti, and Turiya - or the wakeful state, the dreaming state, the dreamless state, and the transcendental state.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/06/beyond-theta-state-to-turiya-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nPara-vak is also known as \"rava-shabda\" - an unvibratory condition of sound beyond the reach of mind and intelligence (avyakta), only to be realized by great souls, the 12 strand maharishis, parama-jnanis.<br />\n<br />\nPara is pure intention. Pure because it is a direct expression of the will of reality, unadulterated by any personal preference. Para means transcendental, \u2018beyond\u2019 or \u2018the other side\u2019. It is beyond the reach of the indriyas, or sense organs, and the mind and other means of cognition.<br />\n<br />\nHence para nada is the transcendental sound. It is indicative of a truth that there is a sphere of super-consciousness where the sound is heard in different dimensions<br />\n<br />\nWE HINDUS BREAK COCONUTS WITH INTENTION --SHAMELESSLY LIFTED BY LYNNE MC TAGGART WITHOUT GIVING CREDIT.&nbsp; &nbsp;HER BOOKS \"THE INTENTION EXPERIMENT\" AND \"THE FIELD \" ARE 100% LIFTED FROM SANATANA DHARMA.<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/04/vedic-quantum-intention-experiment.html</span><br />\n<br />\nPRANA is the connecting link between the body and the mind. The body and the mind have no direct connection. They are connected through Prana alone.<br />\n<br />\nTHE TRAILER --CHAATNE KE VAASTE IS OVER!<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n</div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_36b+seedDBlqD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1301834754903074033\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_65M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. IBC sets are not for working in the literal sense. \" Working time \" relates to \"lung demand\" of free air, which is 10 litres / min for rest, 30 litres/ min for light work and 100 litres / min for strain of fireman's lift.&nbsp; &nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">Fill up a form in capital does NOT mean you have to take a flight to the capital city of your country.</span></b>&nbsp; &nbsp;SCBA sets are for emergencies and must be donned by two sailors. IT IS NOT SO. \" WORKING TIME \" IS TO BE READ AS \" LUNG DEMAND TIME \" -- WHICH IS 100 LITRES OF FREE AIR A MINUTE FOR STRAIN ( OF FIREMANS LIFT RESCUE) , 30 LITRES A MINUTE FOR LIGHT ACTIVITY , AND 10 LITRES A MINUTE WHILE AT REST---UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nONLY CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL HAD THE BALLS AND THE PERCEPTION TO SPELL OUT A KOSHER LIE..<br />\n<br />\nTODAY VADAKAYILs WALL WASH METHOD IS USED ALL OVER THE GLOBE.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/02/wall-wash-method-chemical-tankers-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE WORLD RUNS ON LIES.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_65BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc;
