THESE SOFT DRINKS GIVE FATTY LIVER DISEASE.<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/03/high-fructose-corn-syrup-fatty-liver.html</span><br />\n<br />\nThe largest organ inside your body, your liver processes cholesterol<br />\n<br />\n30 YEARS AGO in India, fatty liver disease was rarely diagnosed except in people who drank large amounts of alcohol.<br />\n<br />\nExcess body fat and diabetes can also cause fatty liver disease<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/08/understanding-obesity-shedding.html</span><br />\n<br />\nLADA was unknown in India 20 years ago.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/lada-latent-autoimmune-diabetes-of.html</span><br />\n<br />\nPM MODI LOVES HEALTH MINISTER JP NADDA--GOT HIM VIA THE RAJYA SABHA BACKDOOR.<br />\n<br />\nLowering of LDL to under 100 mg/dl can easily be done by the vast majority of people, without drugs and with only making some changes to their diet. The choice is not between drugs and high cholesterol.<br />\n<br />\nEXPERTS groomed by EVIL PHARMA are now pushing to set target limits for LDL to less than 80, which would mandate that millions of Indians be on moderate to high doses of statin drugs for the rest of their lives.<br />\n<br />\nArteries are vessels that transport blood from the heart to the farthest spots in the body. Arterial blood has bright red color because of oxyhemoglobin (oxygenated hemoglobin). When a lot of calcium and cholesterol accumulates in the arterial walls, the plaque is created.<br />\n<br />\nArterial plaque is a list of cardiovascular diseases it could cause: a heart attack, a stroke, and a peripheral arterial disease.<br />\n<br />\nThe condition of hardening and narrowing of arteries caused by plaque is also called atherosclerosis. Depending on the artery that is struck, atherosclerosis results in dysfunction of vital organs such as heart and brain and even leads to death.<br />\n<br />\nVeins are the \u2018\u2018afferent\u2019\u2019 wing of our circulatory system, meaning that they send blood low in oxygen back to the heart. The color of the blood they carry is dark because of the lack of oxygen. Common venous disorders include venous insufficiency and deep venous thrombosis. The former one is an inability of veins to send blood up to the heart. The latter one can pose much greater harm, even to our lives.<br />\n<br />\nDeep venous thrombosis presents a blood clot that resides in a vein until it breaks off, ends up in our lungs and causes the deadly pulmonary embolism.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/07/deep-vein-thrombosis-dvt-pulmonary.html</span><br />\n<br />\nAtherosclerosis is an asymptomatic and long process. When oxidized, lipoprotein binds white blood cells to the arteries endothelium and damages it. That\u2019s when the inflammation takes place, and it is additionally promoted by LDL\u2019s that sneak cholesterol and triglycerides into your arteries.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_195BR\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/09/inquiry-into-death-of-cm-of-tamil-nadu.html?showComment=1506691648913#c3955815114554860358\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 29, 2017 at 6:57 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_194MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nThis could cause stiffening of your arteries if you don\u2019t have enough good cholesterol to get the bad one to the kidneys to flush them out. The arteries\u2019 hardening, atherosclerosis, is caused by the plaque which is separated into 2 categories: stable and unstable.<br />\n<br />\nThe stable plaque has an extracellular matrix and smooth muscle cells, while the unstable one contains macrophages and foam cells (extracellular matrix separating the lesion from the arterial lumen). The former, also known as the fibrous cap, is susceptible to detaching and consequently exposing a thrombus-forming element to the bloodstream-collagen.<br />\n<br />\nArteries are multi-layered vessels. The innermost layer is called tunica intima, made of squamous epithelium immersed in connective tissue membrane with elastic fibers. The middle and the thickest layer is tunica media that provides support to our arteries and is greatly in charge of blood pressure control.<br />\n<br />\nTunica Externa is the outermost layer that connects arteries to the neighboring tissues thanks to its collagen and elastin. Its density varies from really thick to soft depending on the closeness to the tunica media.<br />\n<br />\nThe veins have less smooth muscle and elastic tissue, so they have to rely on valves and contractions of your skeletal biggest muscles to push the blood through.<br />\n<br />\nHEY, BRAAAYYYYYYYYYYYYY-- TAKING INTO ACCOUNT THAT THE SAME BLOOD GOES THROUGH HOW COME ONLY ARTERIES GET BLOCKED BY PLAQUE.<br />\n<br />\nThe abundance of muscles in arteries is the key for this puzzle. When smooth muscles die off, lactic acid is produced. For people who are in an alkaline state, it won\u2019t be hard to clean the acid off with all the oxygen in their blood. However, if your diet is high in acids, the plaque is sure to stay in your arteries.<br />\n<br />\nThe endo lethal lining of muscles provides nitric oxide. This substance triggers another useful molecule- cyclic GMP- which relaxes the arterial muscles while preparing them for the next contraction.<br />\n<br />\nNITRIC OXIDE burns away fat and sugar which is certainly what we want in order to avoid plaque in arteries.<br />\n<br />\nHardening of the arteries often occurs with aging. As you grow older, plaque buildup narrows your arteries and makes them stiffer. These changes make it harder for blood to flow through them.<br />\n<br />\nTHE MAIN PURPOSE OF PRANAYAMA IS THE PRODUCTION OF NITRIC OXIDE. YOGIS WHO DO PRANAYAMA DONT GET ARTERIAL PLAQUE.<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/pranayama-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\nHigh cholesterol levels are due to a diet that is too high in saturated fats and trans fats. font-size: 22px; font-stretch: normal; font-weight: normal; line-height: normal; margin: 0.75em 0px 0px; position: relative;\">\nEthical NLP, Neuro-Linguistic Programming sans covert manipulation and predatory deception, Part 10 - Capt Ajit Vadakayil</h3>\n<div class=\"post-header\" style=\"font-size: 14.4px; line-height: 1.6; margin: 0px 0px 1.5em;\">\n<div class=\"post-header-line-1\">\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"post-body entry-content\" id=\"post-body-59103463493741160\" itemprop=\"description articleBody\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 1.4; position: relative; width: 688px;\">\n<div dir=\"ltr\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">THIS POST IS CONTINUED FROM PART 9, BELOW-</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/06/ethical-nlp-neuro-linguistic_15.html\" style=\"background-color: lime; color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/06/ethical-nlp-neuro-linguistic_15.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: medium;\">Below: This conman Tony Robbins made more than 500 million USD selling his mental snake oil.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: medium;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: medium;\">His intellect, &nbsp; I can hold under the foreskin of my uncircumcised prick with space for 99% more. &nbsp; I am not an illiterate like him. &nbsp;I have a technical brain.</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/ANY8-_kqCZQ/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/ANY8-_kqCZQ?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Tony Robbin\u2019s book \u201cUnlimited Power\u201d, discusses the topics of health and energy, overcoming fears, persuasive communication, and enhancing relationships.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: medium; line-height: 27px;\">In the book, Robbins argues that by using neuro-linguistic programming \"anyone can become successful at almost anything\u201d ( by cheating and con tactics )&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: medium; line-height: 27px;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: medium; line-height: 27px;\">&nbsp;But hey his wife kicked him out and fled into her lover\u2019s arms with a big alimony booty</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: medium; line-height: 27px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 26.4px;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Tony Robbins &nbsp;spends multi million marketing budgets to get you to the free seminars so he can upsell his paid seminars and coaching.</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">In 2001, Robbins filed a lawsuit against The Vancouver Sun newspaper, alleging defamation and libel. The judge determined the Vancouver Sun defamed Robbins ( gave 20,000 USD in damages ) when it called him an \"adulterous, wife-stealing hypocrite\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Robbins has no academic background\u2014only a glib tongue. He was a janitor ( his mother kicked him out of the home and chased him with a knife ) &nbsp;with mental skills for this low level job. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">&nbsp;During Thanksgiving his family was too poor to have food, leave alone fat turkey. His mother was an alcoholic and he had four stepfathers.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Tony Robbins made more than 500 million US&nbsp; dollars by conning the asses off na\u00efve white people. He scoots around in a plush private jet .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Tony Robbins used Ericksonian hypnosis to put his subject into a trance without their knowing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">NLP is a slimy technique of layering subtle meaning into spoken or written language so that you can implant suggestions into a person\u2019s unconscious mind without them knowing what you\u2019re doing.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">This is just a con job<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 26.4px;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\">An NLP con guru knows how to &nbsp;cause a person to drop their guard and enter a state of openness and suggestibility.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 26.4px;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\"><br /></span></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 26.4px;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\">In their own personal lives all are complete failures. Their children hate them. Their wives cheat.<o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 26.4px;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\"><br /></span></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 26.4px;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\"><b>SLIME DOES NOT WORK AT HOME</b></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Once rapport by deceit is achieved, the NLP conman will then begin subtly leading the interaction. Having mirrored the other person, they can now make subtle changes to actually influence the other person\u2019s behavior. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Combined with subtle language patterns, leading questions and a whole slew of other techniques, a skilled NLP conman can at this point steer the other person wherever they like, as long as the other person isn\u2019t aware of what\u2019s happening and thinks everything is arising organically, or has given consent.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The classical hypnosis depends in the process of putting the subjects in the alpha state so that their mind becomes more suggestive to the commands and can be programmed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Whereas, the Neuro-Linguistic Programming (NLP) techniques is capable of covertly inducing the thoughts in the subject's unconscious mind that are consciously unnoticed.&nbsp; The persuasive power is high in the neuro-linguistic programming, and this technique is far more used in the business, marketing, socializing, etc. .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">NLP founder Bandler used shock tactics \u2013 he used his gun in NLP sessions in order to produce dramatic psychological changes in clients\u2014a technique that was later mirrored by Hollywood in the movie Fight Club, in which Brad Pitt\u2019s character pulls a gun on a gas station attendant and threatens to kill him if he doesn\u2019t pursue his dreams in life.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">In 1986 Bandler was at the home of Corine Christensen, the girlfriend to his drug dealer, James Marino. Christensen was a prostitute and also Bandler\u2019s bookkeeper. Bandler and Marino were arguing. That night Corine Christensen was shot dead. Each man accused the other of pulling the trigger. Bandler stood trial for murder with Marino being the state witness. The jury reached their decision quickly. Bandler was innocent.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Violence has been a theme in Bandler\u2019s life. He was brought up in a tough neighborhood in New Jersey. In his childhood he says, \u201c\u201dI had every bone in my body broken by adults\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">He admits to and justifies using a level of violence in theraputic and training environments to get his message across.&nbsp; Bandler says:\u201dI\u2019ve slapped a client across the face \u2013 just to wake him up.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">In crude terms, Bandler\u2019s NLP explores the relationships between how we think (neuro), how we communicate (linguistic) and our patterns of behaviour and emotions (programmes)\u2014which is<b><span style=\"color: red;\">BULLSHIT</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Bandler himself still teaches NLP regularly, and claims to be able to \"erase\" traumatic memories, improve your relationships and even ' \"cure\" schizophrenia and paralysis (he taught himself to walk again using NLP after a stroke put him in a wheelchair).&nbsp;&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">LIES</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Bandler has beaten up his students, been admitted for drug abuse rehab and even stood trial for murder. But in NLP circles Bandler is hailed as a sort of Messiah\u2014his own self promotion.. NLP gurus have their propaganda dept repeating again and again -- \"NLP changed my life\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">NLP practitioners \u2013 whose vocabulary is littered with phrases such as \"installing strategies\", \"behavioural technologies\", \"cybernetics\", \"deletion\", \"content reframing\" and \"hypnosis\" \u2013 &nbsp;are scary people<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Grinder is long out of the NLP picture; the gruesome pair acrimoniously parted ways following a bitter copyright lawsuit in 1997 \u2013 proof that even NLP experts don't have solutions for everything<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">\"How many of you are not artistic?\" Bandler asks from the stage at a typical NLP session.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Hands are raised. \"Is that because you weren't born with the 'art gene'?\" It's a leading question. A table on the stage is kitted out with brushes, paints and paper and four non- artistic volunteers are plucked to sit at it, then put into a trance. \"Every time you hear yourself saying 'I'm not the kind of person who...',\" he murmurs to the budding artists, \"I want you to laugh because it's just like masturbating one stroke at a time, it'll never get you there...\" This is typical of the way Bandler talks. Crude quips, detailed anecdotes and seemingly random digressions spill out relentlessly, punctuated by sound effects, imitations and expletives.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">There's the one about how he punched a man (\"Thwack!\") who hit his own daughter because she was speaking to invisible angels (the girl was cured, naturally, by Bandler); the smut (the following day on stage he'll motivate a young man to clear out his garage by thinking about breasts) and the tales to discredit psychotherapists (cue the account of the time he smuggled rubber snakes into a schizophrenic's shower at a mental hospital to prove that he didn't require drugs for sanity, but simply the opportunity to differentiate between hallucinated and actual serpents)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">\"You all know my cure for schizophrenia is to alter reality not hallucinations,\" he says to his audience. \"A lot of patients with mental issues simply don't have proper strategies.\" He's a little scary, but his thinking is persuasive. And it seems to be working on stage,too \u2013 the budding artists are \u2013 surprise surprise \u2013 confidently expressing themselves via the medium of acrylic paint. There had been similar turnarounds at the end of yesterday's session: the BRIBED woman from Baghdad who thanked Bandler for \"giving her life back\" after he'd erased a horrific image from her mind; the delegate who had been petrified of heights but, by day three, was embracing several of Orlando's most dramatic roller coasters.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Bandler used to get pissed off when people pulled him up for smoking \u2013 a habit NLP is popular for ridding people of. \"I knew how to stop, I just didn't want to!\" he says.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Bandler tells the Independent newspaper,&nbsp; \u201cif I wasn\u2019t this imperfect I wouldn\u2019t have had room for improvement.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The NLP CONMEN use a specific pattern of words that seems normal but are more suggestive and permissive. The hot words that are more connected with the senses are more suggestive.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The words like hear this, see that, feel free, eventually, means, now, as, because, etc. could invoke a certain state of mind like feeling, experiencing,&nbsp; imagining and perception in the mind. They also use certain vague words to control your thoughts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Listen\u2014anybody can fool people<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">What does a magician \u2013 a con man --do?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">He fools people!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Are we to make a magician the PM of India or worship him ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Triple Sri called for a volunteer to come up on stage for a \u201cpatented\u201d magic oil surprise demonstration.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">One of the students from the back rows of the auditorium was chosen to share the dais.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The chosen volunteer, a male student wearing a black t-shirt with horizontal white stripes, was asked to extend his arm parallel to the floor, clinch his fist and resist the pulling down of his arm.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; of the na\u00efve audience.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">He then produced from his pocket a small vial containing some oil.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-yPWfeJSjIW8/WUVE82UAtTI/AAAAAAABUaA/BN4-e9mmaZIFMaIlK4gMOsGTs9mhuYbsQCLcBGAs/s1600/big1.1EE97dd3221.3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\" width=\"424\" /></a></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The volunteer was then asked to rub and spread this oil over his arm. After the volunteer took a step back and a deep breath to relax, the whole exercise was repeated again \u2013 except this time Triple Sri with his gargantuan paunch struggled quite hard to pull down the volunteer\u2019s arm, amazing the vast audience.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The volunteer, visibly impressed and believing that he had in fact become stronger in a matter of seconds after the application of the oil, went onto fall at the feet (cultural practice of surrender) of the extraordinary messiah Triple Sri.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Following the thundering applause from his gullible audience, Mr. Ravishankar went on to urge stronger volunteers to come forth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The next male volunteer also went on to fall at the feet of Mr. Ravishankar after his new found strength.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The frenzy in the arena attracted a male \"skeptic\" from the audience to volunteer.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">He was visibly unimpressed by the arm pull down test and the claim of instantaneous improvement of strength and vigor following the application of a few drops of oil.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">SO I KNOW.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">and then i made her stand on one leg-- destabilised her with my finger.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">then i made her wear my bracelet.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">by now the entire gym of 20 people were watching us in a circle.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">then i pretended to try and push her off with both my hands -- there is trickery in this ( parallelogram law of forces ) .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">and all wanted to buy that bracelet off my hand-- any amount ,, kuch bhi-- and some of them were very rich.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">By mirroring body language and linguistic patterns, the NLPer is attempting to achieve one very specific response: \u201crapport by deceit\u201d.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Rapport is the mental and physiological state that a human enters when they let their social guard down, and it is generally achieved when a person comes to the conclusion that the person they\u2019re talking to is just like them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Combined with subtle language patterns, leading questions and a whole slew of other techniques, a skilled NLPer can at this point steer the other person wherever they like, as long as the other person isn\u2019t aware of what\u2019s happening and thinks everything is arising organically, or has given consent.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">There is slimy BREACH OF TRUST going on here.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/j25qV5RO-nU/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/j25qV5RO-nU?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Eliciting happens when an NLPer uses leading and language to engineer an emotional state\u2014for instance, hunger. Once a state has been elicited, the NLPer can then anchor it with a physical cue\u2014for instance, touching your shoulder.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">In theory, if done right, the NLPer can then call up the hungry state any time they touch your shoulder in the same way. It\u2019s conditioning, plain and simple. This works till the NLP conman cheats you. &nbsp;By the time you realize this he would have scooted with your moolah or even your wife .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">NLP conmen love to win by making an ass out of you. Trust means nothing to them. Usually trust takes years to build. The NLP conman put you fog where you confused instant rapport ( by cheating ) &nbsp;with trust.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-mQP8dYGwzOs/WUXdPeNf5MI/AAAAAAABUao/KwQKR6Z5VDgjO7SPOh9LEsJIzWP9iuG6QCLcBGAs/s1600/imssages.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em; text-decoration-line: none;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"266\" data-original-width=\"190\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-mQP8dYGwzOs/WUXdPeNf5MI/AAAAAAABUao/KwQKR6Z5VDgjO7SPOh9LEsJIzWP9iuG6QCLcBGAs/s400/imssages.png\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\" width=\"285\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Wait 24 hours before making any decisions, especially financial ones.&nbsp;&nbsp; Do NOT let yourself get swept up into making an emotional decision in the spur of the moment. When a unknown person gets too friendly have your guard up.&nbsp;&nbsp; Sales people are armed with NLP techniques specifically for engineering impulse buys. Don\u2019t do it. Leave, and use your rational mind.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/02/jealousy-growing-ulcer-within-capt-ajit.html\" style=\"background-color: lime; color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/02/jealousy-growing-ulcer-within-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"true\" class=\"b-hbp-video b-uploaded\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" id=\"BLOGGER-video-a4124b69fe8a4a85-11240\" mozallowfullscreen=\"true\" src=\"https://www.blogger.com/video.g?token=AD6v5dxAY5eBYvNmWgiEgd-rC0hkg3Uh3kvdpisiaYixrLUrYuTCpF7InHfkkeV1NZHXiNkiAZ23lfs8rqeYSWRGAuWFFDPstp3atVPuS6YtMdT_rFsk_Zg43Fb25zmwwtG3P3HGk_rG\" webkitallowfullscreen=\"true\" width=\"320\"></iframe><a href=\"rtsp://v2.cache8.googlevideo.com/ChoLENy73wIaEQmFSor-aUsSpBMYDSANFEgDDA==/0/0/0/video.3gp\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\" type=\"video/3gpp\"></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">WANNA HEAR OF BIZARRE NLP SHIT ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">QUOTE: &nbsp;Picture confidence as a golden aura around you Imagine a very, extremely confident person. It is clear that Confido knew everyone would love him before he even started speaking. Picture a golden aura surrounding him that only you can see. This is his confidence. You can take this aura and bring it over yourself. Feel how the confidence flows around you. Everything feels natural and you are confident to do anything you want. Imagine the sound of all the saturated animal fats congealing into a sickly putty and clogging up your arteries.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">How do you imagine that processed fat smells once it\u2019s stripped of its artificial flavours and sugars? &nbsp;Focus on the negative aspects of the food, and they will soon outweigh the positive aspects. NLP learning let\u2019s pretend it does. In reality, your fat deposits are broken down by your body to gain energy for the processing of the celery.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">What is your favourite aspect of celery? Picture the celery being nicely broken down and literally turning old fat deposits into pure water. Concentrate on the taste.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Say words like \u201cmmm delicious!\u201d and really mean them. Unpleasant?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Well how about this - take a mouthful of that thick, hot, sticky, smelly tar, and chew it. font-size: 16px;\">\nDIOXINS IN TAMPONS CAUSE CANCER<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nDioxin, which has been called one of the most toxic\nsubstances ever created by humans, is a by-product of the chlorine bleaching\nprocess used in the production of tampons<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nDioxin is carcinogenic (cancer-causing), and is known to\nimpair the immune and reproductive systems.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nThere is a link between tampons containing dioxin, and other\nchlorine by-products, and an increased risk of cancers of the female\nreproductive tract (especially the uterus, ovaries and bladder).<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nRayon used to make tampons is treated with chemicals to\nincrease the absorption capability.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nThese super absorbent fibers then absorb not only the\nmenstrual blood, but normal vaginal secretions as well, causing drying, and\nulceration of vaginal tissues. The fibers can also become embedded in the\nvaginal walls.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nThe rayon acts like a petri dish encouraging bacterial\ngrowth.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nWhat makes these toxic residues even more disturbing, is\nthat they come in direct contact with some of the most absorbent tissue in a\nwoman's body.Rayon is made from bleached wood pulp.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nThe tampon industry is convinced that women need bleached\nwhite products. They seem to think that we view this as \"pure\" and\n\"clean.\"<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nThe fact is, if Dioxin puts women at risk for cancer and\nDioxin is stored in fatty tissue (just like that found in the vagina), and a\nwoman uses as many as 12,000 tampons in her lifetime<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; ..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nThe amount machines are able to extract from the picked cotton\nhas diminished. . .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nIn other words, Bt cotton produces both less cotton lint,\nand lint of an inferior quality. . .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nCotton fiber quality is defined by the physical properties\nthat relate to its spin ability into yarn and contribute to textile performance\nand quality. . .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nThe most important of these properties are those associated\nwith the length, strength and fineness (micronaire) of the fiber. One of the\nmost important aspects of cotton fiber quality is fiber or staple length. . .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nFiber length is the normal length of a typical portion of\nthe fibers of a cotton sample. Longer fibers can be processed at greater\nefficiencies and produce finer and stronger yarns by allowing fibers to twist\naround each other more times, while shorter fiber require increased twisting\nduring spinning, causing low-strength and poor-quality yarns. . .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nFiber fineness is another important component of fiber\nquality because of its direct impact on processing performance and the quality\nof end product. . .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nFiber strength is important because the inherent breaking\nstrength of individual cotton fiber is considered to be the most important\nfactor in determining the strength of the yarn spun from those fibers. . .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nJEW DARLING APCO MODI AND HIS PMO WILL SAY ALL ABOVE IS\nFICTION. . .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nThey have just focused on a single single trait \u2013 pest\nresistance ( SIC )\u2013 compromising on cotton quality. ..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; A northwards\nbranch of the Gulf Stream, the North Atlantic Drift, is part of the\nthermohaline circulation<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nThe number of El Ni\u00f1o events has risen each decade--ever\nsince scientists have turned a NELSONS EYE towards Methane and Nitrous Oxide.\nParis COP21 was all about calling good CO2 gas the culprit and kicking bad\ngases Methane and Nitrous Oxide under the KOSHER carpet<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nWE HAVE OUR PM MODI ASSISTING ROTHSCHILD IN HIS RELENTLESS\nPURSUIT OF A NOBEL PRIZE. font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nIf the GLOBAL WARMING POTENTIAL ( GWP ) is 1 for Carbon\nDioxide, it is 302 for Nitrous oxide and 104 for Methane over a 20 year period.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nAs warmer water circulates, multiyear ice thins. Chunks of\nthis ice break off and are carried along on the ocean\u2019s currents. Thinning also\nreduces the insulating properties of the ice, which protects the freezing\narctic atmosphere from the relatively warm ocean waters. But without this\nbarrier, the atmosphere has no insulation from the ocean heat, further warming\nthe planet.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nAs permafrost melts, it spews warming methane in to the\natmosphere. And all that escaping water means more atmospheric water vapor,\nwhich in turn warms the air even more<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5KEwy-2RF4Q<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Ajit VadakayilJune 17, 2017 at 8:06 PM<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE SANSKRIT SPEAKING THIYYAS OF KERALA WERE CALLED\nNAMBOODIRIS<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE CREAM OF NAMBOODIRIS WHO WERE PROFICIENT IN MATH AND\nASTRONOMY WERE BHATTATHIRIS<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nARYABHATTA WAS ARYAN BHATTATHIRI<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nARYAN IS A TITLE-- A LEARNED MAN<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/isaac-newton-calculus-thief-capt-ajit.html<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAryabhatta born in Kerala ( my home state ) in 2700 BC, was\none of the early members of this school. Aryabhatta was the first to calculate\nPi of 3.1416 and the solar year of 365.358 days . He propounded a heliocentric\nuniverse 4200 years before Copernicus, with elliptically orbiting planets and a\nspherical earth spinning on its axis explaining the motion of the heavens. He\nwas the father of plane / spherical Trigonometry and Algebra, when Europe was\nin the dark ages.. Today you don't see this pioneers name in the list of top\n100 mathematicians.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAryabhatta was the first to compute the circumference of the\nearth, with an error of just 64 miles.. Aryabhatta gave a method to find the\ncube root of numbers and dealt with arithmetic,geometric and indeterminate\nequations in algebra. He dealt with square, cube, triangle, trapezium, circle\nand sphere in geometry. He was called Arjehir by the Arabs.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPoor Galileo did a Aryabhatta 4 millenuims years later ,\nthat the earth is round and circles the sun , and the church blinded him , so\nthat he can never look into another telescope .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nNAMBOODIRIS WERE PROFESSORS AT KODUNGALLUR/ TAXILA/ NALANDA/\nSARASWATI DHAR UNIVERSITIES<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nONLY NAMBOODIRIS CAN BE SHANKARACHARYAS ( PONTIFFS ) OF THE\n4 ORIGINAL MUTTS<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nNAMBOODIRIS HAD ALL 4 VEDAS AND 108 UPANISHADS FROM 4000 BC\nTO 2000 BC --THE SCRIPTURES WERE IN KERALA --PARASHURAMA ALLOWED THIS<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/01/my-visit-to-sringeri-mutt-exhuming.html<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCapt. font-size: 16px;\">\nThe revival process of the Hebrew language took place in\nEurope through which the language's usage changed from the liturgical language\nlanguage of ancient Judaism to a spoken and written language used for modern\nlife in Israel.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 16px;\">\nThe revival of Hebrew was a master plan by Zionist Jews in\nconjunction with carve out Israel policy.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 16px;\">\nThe characteristics of spoken Hebrew only began to seep into\nliterature in the 1940s, and only in the 1990s did spoken Hebrew start widely\nappearing in novels<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nRothschild employee Eliezer Ben-Yehuda (1858\u20131922) is the\n\"reviver of the Hebrew language\" .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 16px;\">\nRothschild made him spend four years in Paris and arrange to\nimport a Jew from Jerusalem who was fluent in spoken Hebrew . They met in\nRothschild's hospital in Paris.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nEliezer Ben-Yehuda raised the first modern Hebrew-speaking\nchild, his first son Ben-Zion Ben-Yehuda (Itamar Ben-Avi)<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 16px;\">\nCheck out the advance planning of Jew Rothschild.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nHe made a Rothschild funded Hebrew dictionary Milon Halashon\nHa\u2019ivrit ha\u2019yshana vehakhadasha borrowing humongous amount of foreign words,\nslightly altering them, to make the liturgical rustic language modern enough to\ndabble in science and math.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nWhile in USA , in search for words for his dictionary , he\nwas a house guest of Rothschild\u2019s agent Jew Whorthiem in New York.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nRothschild got his access to American libraries, being the\nonly man ever to be given a room to do research at the New York public library\non 42 street and Fifth Avenue. From this you can see Rothschild\u2019s clout with\nthe President of USA.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nAfter his death in 1922, his second wife Hemda ( sister of\nhis first wife ) and his son Ehud, finished his work.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nEliezer Ben-Yehuda never saw the creation of the State of\nIsrael. He passed away only one month after the British authorities declared\nHebrew to be the official language of the Jews of Palestine<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nRothschild got him buried with great honours on the Mount of\nOlives in Jerusalem ( 1922 ) though this man\u2019s ancestors ( Perelman ) were not\nfrom Palestine.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nToday the Hebrew dictionary has sixteen volumes plus an introductory\nvolume called Ha-Mavo-ha-Gadol (the great introduction) in 1959.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nHis work of the Hebrew was a tool for Zionist success to\nshow the planet that ancient Jews were intellectual scholars using modern\ntechnical words<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; Akasha, macro the morphogenetic consciousness field , as per Vedanta is the source of everything that exists, and in which the memory of the cosmos is encoded. SEERS LIFTED OFF THE VEDAS FROM COSMIC SOUNDS OF AKASHA . Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/09/nlp-blogpost-part-ten-reposted-capt.html?showComment=1506409171615#c7180695739300131479\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 26, 2017 at 12:29 PM</a></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_72MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\">CONTINUED FROM 1-<br /><br />https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dvaita_Vedanta<br /><br />Tamas and Rajas are opposing fields like positive and negative while Sattva is neutral. In Dvaita Hinduism opposite poles Tamas and Rajas are conscious of each other. Tamas creates Rajas, and Rajas activates/ excites Tamas.7000 year old Vedas say that the only constant in the cosmos is change, everything is in a state of flux, nothing is static-- everything is vibratory. This is what guarantees growth and evolution. It is a cosmic spiraling dance of separate opposing forces, which sustains this universe. No life is possible on earth without this subtle tension . What has a front has a back-- what has a beginning has an end. Sanatana dharma does not allow stagnancy. If stagnancy happens there will be PRALAYA ( dissolution of cosmos ).. Brahma / Vishnu / Shiva and their wives and children work in tandem and perfect harmony\u2014amazing cosmic allegories personalized as Hindu Gods. Like Padma Vibhushan holder Sri Sri Ravishankar tweeted , Shiva cannot anally FUCK Vishnu-- to producce Ayyappa ( the 9th avatar of Vishnu ) as they are NOT mortals. No phenomenon in this universe is completely devoid of its opposite. They consume each other yet support each other.Whatever is in excess gets reduces, whatever is deficient gets replenished.You must ponder over each waxing-waning cycle to appreciate the absolute truth . They keep each other in check, yet provide fuel to feed off each other.It is a perfect tango of dynamic balance where one polar opposite changes into another smoothly and constantly . If the restraining balance or equilibrium is lost by the mediator ( Vishnu ) , the universe will spiral out of control and end. This is why Lord Vishnu is called the PRESERVER god. It is about the quantum possibility wave vibration between two poles-there is not an IOTA of superstition in Sanatana Dharma .<br /><br />##############<br /><br />CCC- THE THIRD TEMPLATE IS <b><span style=\"color: blue;\">SANKHYA VEDANTA</span></b>.<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/05/sankhya-philosophy-of-hinduism.html<br /><br />CHECK OUT THE NONSENSE IN WIKIPEDIA<br /><br />https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Samkhya<br /><br />IN SANKHYA , THE PRIMORDAL <b><span style=\"color: blue;\">TANTRIC FORCES </span></b>ARE <b><span style=\"color: blue;\">PURUSHA AND PRAKRITI</span></b>. WE EQUATE THEM WITH SHIVA AND HIS WIFE SHAKTI. THESE FORCES HAVE TO COUPLE --THERE IS NO SEMEN OR SEX INVOLVED AS THESE ARE COSMIC FORCES. HERE WHEN THE INSENTIENT PRAKRITI ( FEMALE ) COMES IN CONTACT WITH THE SENTIENT PURUSHA ( MALE ) THE UNIVERSE EVOLVES . THIS INTELLIGENT CONCEPT CANNOT BE UNDERSTOOD BY HALF WITS. In the Tantric cosmology, the whole universe is perceived as being created, penetrated and sustained by two fundamental forces, which are permanently in a perfect, indestructible UNION. These forces or universal aspects are called Shiva and Shakti. Tantra is NOT perverted sex as made out to be by the white invader .Purusha is the embodiment of pure consciousness, and Pragati as the embodiment of pure energy. Shiva is the changeless static aspect of Consciousness, and Shakti is the kinetic, active aspect of the same Consciousness.When the insentient Prakriti comes in contact with the sentient Purusha , the universe evolves. The cosmos in all its manifestations, as an act of love. Shiva resides in the highest Sahasr\u0101ra Chakra and Shakti in the lowest M\u016bl\u0101dh\u0101ra Chakra. When Prakriti and Purusha unite in the Sahasr\u0101ra Chakra ( raising of Kundalini ) , knowledge, knower and the object of knowledge become one.<br /><br />If Hinduism is the vast ocean, the rest all combined together is a drop of dirty water.<br /><br />I ASK MY READERS TO SPREAD THIS MESSAGE TO EVERY DESH BHAKT AND HINDU STALWART. There is no SEMEN here.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nPranamaya kosha (sheath made of breath) is the vital body, composed of five\naspects of prana called vayus. I have written about it before.. This KOSHA\nmediates between the physical body on one side and the three sheaths of the\nmind (outer mind, intelligence, and inner mind) on the other. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pranamaya\nKosha mediates between the five gross elements and the five sensory\nimpressions. . It provides us with enthusiasm and motivation for all we do.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">I had\nalso written about the VAYUS-- like Prana Vayu , Apana Vayu , Udana Vayu,\nSamana Vayu , Vyana Vayu etc before<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prana\nbrings in the fuel, samana converts this fuel to energy, and vyana circulates\nthe energy to various worksites. Apana disposes of the waste products produced\nby the conversion process. Udana manages the energy thus created, enabling the\nmachine to function effectively. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Breathing\nis the main form of pranic activity in the body. He who masters BREATH is the\ntrue Yogi. I have NOT talked about this is my 2 part yoga series--as this is\nadvanced level<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/01/yoga-only-complete-exercise.html<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/01/yoga-only-complete-exercise-part-2-capt.html<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">On a\npsychological level, prana governs our receptivity to positive sources of\nnourishment, feeling, and knowledge through the mind and senses. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">As we\npractice yoga, the subtle aspects of these pranas begin to awaken.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Vedas\nsay that mortals eat food with apana, while the gods eat food with prana. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Regular\nalternate nostril breathing is the most important method for keeping our pranas\nor energies in balance<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/pranayama-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nadi\nshodhana (alternate nostril breathing), helps balance right and left prana\ncurrents. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The body\nand all its channels have a right or left predominance. We must learn to be\nopen to and welcome this greater force and seek to bring it more fully into our\nlife and actions. This is THE greatest secret of yoga.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTINUED\nTO 3-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;
