Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/09/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_22.html?showComment=1506227642303#c8169800730737030600\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 24, 2017 at 10:04 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_69MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nIT IS DIFFICULT TO EXPLAIN THE FUNCTION OF BLOOD BRAIN BARRIER TO HALF WITS<br />\n<br />\nThe blood\u2013brain barrier provides a defence against nano particles and disease-causing pathogens/ toxins that may be present in our blood.<br />\n<br />\nThe key structure of the blood\u2013brain barrier that offers a barrier is the \u201cendothelial tight junction\u201d.<br />\n<br />\nMeningococcal bacteria can bind to the endothelial wall, causing tight junctions to open slightly. As a result, the blood\u2013brain barrier becomes more porous, allowing bacteria and other toxins to infect the brain tissue, which can lead to inflammation and sometimes death.<br />\n<br />\nVACCINES DAMAGE THE MYELIN SHEATH .. INDIANS ARE BEING USED AS GUINEA PIGS--OUR HEALTH MINISTER JP NADDA PLAYS KOSHER BALL.<br />\n<br />\nOUR PM IS TOO BUSY MILKING VOTES<br />\n<br />\nEXPERIMENTS ARE BEING DONE ON \"CONSCIOUS\" HUMAN BRAIN--LAB RATS CANT PASS COLOUR / MIRROR TEST<br />\n<br />\nThe incomplete myelination of the nerves and the blood-brain barrier make infants in particularly vulnerable<br />\n<br />\nThe blood-brain barrier (BBB) forms a protective barrier in front of the central nervous system toxins and pathogens and the infant is still very vunerable (for toxic VACCINE substances, mercury, aluminum).<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/02/vaccine-induced-encephalitis-mylelin.html</span><br />\n<br />\nIN INDIA EVIL KOSHER PHARMA RUNS FREE --OUR POLITICIANS GET KICKBACKS<br />\nNano particle used in food and beverage packaging leaches into the food / beverage it protects .<br />\n<br />\nThe food packaging industry is now dabbling with Nanocomposites, a fusion of traditional food packaging material with nanoparticles . Freshness indicators can do away with expiry dates ( profits ) at the expense of human health.<br />\n<br />\nMost top food and beverage companies are secretly trying nano technology and using third world nations ( including India ) as guinea pigs.. Nanoparticles may enter into the body through inhalation, ingestion or cutaneous exposure .<br />\n<br />\nOnce they penetrate into the biological environment, NP will inevitably come into contact with a huge variety of biomolecules (proteins, sugars, and lipids) which are dissolved in body fluids such as the interstitial fluid between cells, lymph or blood..<br />\n<br />\nLiver and spleen are mainly responsible for distribution of nanoparticles, mediating their passage from intestine to the blood circulation.. The migration of nanoparticle(s) to food matrix mainly relies on the chemical and physical properties of food and polymer involved.<br />\n<br />\nOther controlling parameters includes the concentration, particle size, molecular weight, solubility and diffusivity of specific substance in polymer, pH value, temperature, polymer structure, polymer viscosity, mechanical stress, contact time and composition of food.<br />\n<br />\nThe solubility of metallic NP in aqueous solution is directly proportional to temperature and inversely proportional to the pH which ultimately augments the migration of metal into the food matrix.</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<b style=\"color: blue; font-size: xx-large;\">RISK ASSESSMENT MUST BE MADE COMPULSORY WHEN IT COMES TO INVASION OF THE BLOOD BRAIN BARRIER BY NANO PARTICLES .&nbsp;</b></div>\n<br />\nIT MUST BE SIGNED BY THE TOP HONCHOS.<br />\n<br />\nLIES MUST ENTAIL LONG TERM JAIL. The Council of Ancyra denounces the worship of Goddess Artemis.<br />\n<br />\n324 The emperor Constantine declares Christianity as the only official religion of the Roman empire. In Dydima, Minor Asia, he sacks the Oracle of the god Apollo and tortures the pagan priests to death. He also evicts all non-Christian peoples from Mount Athos and destroys all the local Hellenic temples.<br />\n<br />\n326 Constantine, following the instructions of his mother Helen, destroys the temple of the god Asclepius in Aigeai of Cilicia and many temples of the goddess Aphrodite in Jerusalem, Aphaca, Mambre, Phoenice,&nbsp;<span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>Baalbek</b></span>, etc.<br />\nUNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nEVERY GLORIOUS STRUCTURE IN ROME AND AROUND WERE CREATED WITH HINDUS MONEY AND HINDU ARCHITECTS<br />\n<br />\nHAS ANYBODY EVER SEEN BAALBECK TEMPLE? IT WAS A HINDU TEMPLE IN LEBANON-- THE GREATEST ARCHITECTURAL STRUCTURE IN THE WEST OF INDIA<br />\n<br />\nBAAL WAS A PAGAN ( HINDU ) GOD--SHIVA<br />\n<br />\nWHEN KERALA NAMBOODIDIRIS CREATED JUDAISM, BAAL WAS THE SUPREME GOD WHICH WAS WORSHIPPED IN PALESTINE AND LEBANON<br />\n<br />\nBAAL WAS RUN DOWN BY JESUS CHRIST ( COOKED UP BY THE ROMAN EMPEROR IN 325 AD AT THE FIRST COUNCIL OF NISCEA )<br />\n<br />\nIn Matthew 12:27, Jesus calls Satan \u201cBeelzebub,\u201d linking the devil to Baal-Zebub<br />\n<br />\nThe Baalim of the Old Testament were nothing more than demons masquerading as gods, and all idolatry is ultimately devil-worship (1 Corinthians 10:20).<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE SEEN PETRA-- THE UPROOTED SHIVA LINGAM BASES ARE STILL THERE<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/09/lost-civilization-of-petra-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nBiblical references to baals associated with various places include: Baal Hazor, Baal Hermon, Baal Heon, Baal Peor, Baal Perazim, Baal Shalisha, Baal Tamar, Baal Zephon etc<br />\n<br />\nThe Bible considers that Israel's destruction by the Assyrian empire in 722 B.C and the later destruction of Judah by Babylon are both due to the failure to follow God's command to completely eliminate Baal worship and other Canaanite religious practices.<br />\n<br />\nDuring the English Puritan period, Baal was equated with Satan<br />\n<br />\nBiblical passages (I Kings, IX: 17-19) mention the name of King Solomon in connection with a place that was ancient Baalbek -- a Hindu temple in Lebanon<br />\n<br />\nJewish historians wrote that Solomon built Baalbek temple.. sorry , it existed hundreds of years before Solomon<br />\n<br />\nAlexander the Great went to see the temple of Baalbek. Greek historians call this place Heliopolis<br />\n<br />\nJulius Caesar settled a legion there and began construction of the great Temple of Jupiter. During the next three centuries, as emperors succeeded one another in the imperial capital of Rome, Heliopolis would be filled with the most massive religious buildings ever constructed in the far reaching Roman Empire. In those days Roman kings and senators were HINDU ( pagan ).<br />\n<br />\nTill 325 AD all Roman emperors were Hindu. Alexander the great was a Hindu.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/the-huge-statue-of-colossus-of-rome-at.html</span><br />\n<br />\nEmperor Theodosius who converted to Christianity destroyed many significant buildings and statues, and constructed a basilica with stones from the Temple of Jupiter. This signaled the end of Roman Heliopolis.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_1M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px; text-align: left;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/09/nlp-blogpost-part-ten-reposted-capt.html?showComment=1506319788988#c5647530477432963944\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 25, 2017 at 11:39 AM</a></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_1MC\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-bottom: 8px;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 16px;\">In the year 634, Muslim armies entered Syria and besieged Baalbek. A mosque was built within the walls of the temple compound, which was itself converted into a citadel. Over the next several centuries, the city and region of Baalbek were controlled by various Islamic dynasties including the Umayyads, Abbasids and Fatamids as well as the Seljuk and Ottoman Turks.<br /><br />During these years, Baalbek was ravaged by the Tartars in 1260, Tamerlane in 1401 and was also shaken by numerous powerful earthquakes.<br /><br />The massive stones of the Grand Terrace of Baalbek are simply beyond the engineering abilities and it was built to Hindu VAASTU--like the Pyramids at Giza<br /><br />The ceilings have the Hindu LOTUS --India's national flower and the SIX pointed star , the merge of SHIVA and SHAKTI ( Purusha and Prakriti )<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/eight-sided-pyramid-of-giza-egypt.html</span><br /><br />The great stones of Baalbek show stylistic similarities to other cyclopean stone walls at verifiably pre-Roman sites such as the Acropolis foundation in Athens, the foundations of Myceneae, Tiryns, Delphi and even megalithic constructions in the \u2018new world\u2019 such as Ollyantaytambo in Peru and Tiahuanaco in Bolivia--all HINDU structures.<br /><br />LEBANON WAS A SPICE TRADE OUTPOST FOR THE CALLICUT KING ( LIKE MECCA OASIS AND PETRA )-- A FREE TRADE AREA AS WELL AS CUSTOMS OUTPOST . FROM HERE SPICES WENT FROM KERALA MAPPILA OVERLAND CAMELS TO EUROPEAN SHIPS AT TYRE/ SIDON/ BEIRUT.<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0_p5yU4YGWI<br /><br />https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=F9rP8IbgUQk</span><br /><br />BAALBEK IS ON A GRID LINE<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VsuWNXV1g14</span><br /><br />TODAY INDIAN HINDUS ARE NO LONGER SELF LOATHING--WE ARE THE PROUDEST PEOPLE ON THE PLANET<br /><br />WE KNOW OUR TRUE GLORIOUS HISTORY --BURIED BY THE JEALOUS WHITE MAN.<br /><br />OUR SWASTIKA AND STAR OF DAVID SYMBOLS ( SIX POINTED STAR ) WERE STOLEN BY JEW ROTHSCHILD--ONE FOR JEW HITLER AND THE OTHER FOR ISRAEL<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</span><br /><br />I ASK MY READERS TO CELEBRATE HINDUS FESTIVALS WITH GUSTO. WE DONT WANT PIG SORPOTEL CHUTNEY MARY FESTIVALS<br /><br />MY REVELATIONS NOW JUMP TO&nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>51.70%</b></span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6131778563258552267\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_17M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. THIS IS THE DANCE OF OPPOSITE FORCES BRAHMA - SHIVA ( CONDENSATION/ EVAPORATION ) MEDIATED BY A PRESERVER ( WATER ). BRAHMA AND SHIVA ARE LIKE THE POLES OF AC ELECTRICITY . Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/09/nlp-blogpost-part-ten-reposted-capt.html?showComment=1506409171615#c7180695739300131479\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 26, 2017 at 12:29 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_72MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dvaita_Vedanta<br />\n<br />\nTamas and Rajas are opposing fields like positive and negative while Sattva is neutral. In Dvaita Hinduism opposite poles Tamas and Rajas are conscious of each other. Tamas creates Rajas, and Rajas activates/ excites Tamas.7000 year old Vedas say that the only constant in the cosmos is change, everything is in a state of flux, nothing is static-- everything is vibratory. This is what guarantees growth and evolution. It is a cosmic spiraling dance of separate opposing forces, which sustains this universe. No life is possible on earth without this subtle tension . What has a front has a back-- what has a beginning has an end. Sanatana dharma does not allow stagnancy. If stagnancy happens there will be PRALAYA ( dissolution of cosmos ).. Brahma / Vishnu / Shiva and their wives and children work in tandem and perfect harmony\u2014amazing cosmic allegories personalized as Hindu Gods. Like Padma Vibhushan holder Sri Sri Ravishankar tweeted , Shiva cannot anally FUCK Vishnu-- to producce Ayyappa ( the 9th avatar of Vishnu ) as they are NOT mortals. No phenomenon in this universe is completely devoid of its opposite. They consume each other yet support each other.Whatever is in excess gets reduces, whatever is deficient gets replenished.You must ponder over each waxing-waning cycle to appreciate the absolute truth . They keep each other in check, yet provide fuel to feed off each other.It is a perfect tango of dynamic balance where one polar opposite changes into another smoothly and constantly . If the restraining balance or equilibrium is lost by the mediator ( Vishnu ) , the universe will spiral out of control and end. This is why Lord Vishnu is called the PRESERVER god. It is about the quantum possibility wave vibration between two poles-there is not an IOTA of superstition in Sanatana Dharma .<br />\n<br />\n##############<br />\n<br />\nCCC- THE THIRD TEMPLATE IS SANKHYA VEDANTA.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/05/sankhya-philosophy-of-hinduism.html<br />\n<br />\nCHECK OUT THE NONSENSE IN WIKIPEDIA<br />\n<br />\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Samkhya<br />\n<br />\nIN SANKHYA , THE PRIMORDAL TANTRIC FORCES ARE PURUSHA AND PRAKRITI. WE EQUATE THEM WITH SHIVA AND HIS WIFE SHAKTI. THESE FORCES HAVE TO COUPLE --THERE IS NO SEMEN OR SEX INVOLVED AS THESE ARE COSMIC FORCES. HERE WHEN THE INSENTIENT PRAKRITI ( FEMALE ) COMES IN CONTACT WITH THE SENTIENT PURUSHA ( MALE ) THE UNIVERSE EVOLVES . THIS INTELLIGENT CONCEPT CANNOT BE UNDERSTOOD BY HALF WITS. In the Tantric cosmology, the whole universe is perceived as being created, penetrated and sustained by two fundamental forces, which are permanently in a perfect, indestructible UNION. These forces or universal aspects are called Shiva and Shakti. Tantra is NOT perverted sex as made out to be by the white invader .Purusha is the embodiment of pure consciousness, and Pragati as the embodiment of pure energy. Shiva is the changeless static aspect of Consciousness, and Shakti is the kinetic, active aspect of the same Consciousness.When the insentient Prakriti comes in contact with the sentient Purusha , the universe evolves. The cosmos in all its manifestations, as an act of love. Shiva resides in the highest Sahasr\u0101ra Chakra and Shakti in the lowest M\u016bl\u0101dh\u0101ra Chakra. position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_10M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/09/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1505884309296#c3866475352857846591\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 20, 2017 at 10:41 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_10MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nONCE ONE OF MY SENIORS GOT <span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>\"HAFTA\"</b></span> FROM A MUMBAI COP<br />\n<br />\nTHIS COP WAS STANDING WITH HIS HUGE FAMILY-- ON THE QUAY --ON A NATIONAL HOLIDAY.<br />\n<br />\nMY SENIOR WAS THE DUTY OFFICER ( TWO STRIPER )<br />\n<br />\nTHE COP IN PLAIN CLOTHES BEGGED -- SIR, MY FAMILY HAS COME FROM FAR TO VISIT A SHIP. NO CAPTAIN IS ALLOWING THEM ON BOARD . I HAVE BEEN TO ALL INDIAN SHIPS. YOUR SHIP IS GERMAN , WILL YOU ALLOW \"<br />\n<br />\nMY FRIEND ALLOWED THEM ON BOARD -- LOT OF WOMEN AND MANY CHILDREN --AND HE PERSONALLY TOOK THEM ALL OVER THE SHIP INCLUDING THE ENGINE ROOM --AND GAVE THEM CHILLED COKE AND MACKINTOSH CHOCOLATES TOO FOR GOOD MEASURE .<br />\n<br />\nJUST BEFORE THE COP LEFT HE GAVE HIS TELEPHONE NUMBER TO MY FRIEND AND INSISTED THAT HE CALL HIM AS SOON AS HE STEPS ASHORE .<br />\n<br />\nSO MY FRIEND CALLED HIM UP<br />\n<br />\nTHE COP TOLD HIM \" SIR, YOU HAVE SAVED ME FROM TOTAL DISGRACE IN MY WIFEs FAMILYs EYES. &nbsp; <b><span style=\"color: blue;\">MERA IZZAT KA FALOODA HONE WAALAH THA</span></b> . &nbsp; I WANT TO RETURN THE FAVOUR . PLEASE GO TO THIS ADDRESS\"<br />\n<br />\nMY FRIEND WENT TO THE ADDRESS AND THE FLAT DOOR IN A SWANK LOCALITY WAS OPENED BY A GORGEOUS YOUNG GIRL WITH LONG SILKY HAIR .<br />\n<br />\nSHE SERVED HIM TEA AND ASKED<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b> \" SHOCK KOREGA KYA ?\"&nbsp;</b></span><br />\nAPPARENTLY THIS GORGEOUS THING WAS A BONG--PROBABLY 17 YEAR OF AGE.<br />\n<br />\nMY FRIEND REPLIED KNEE JERK \" NO NO-- I DONT WANT SHOCK\"<br />\n<br />\nTHE GIRL WAS ADAMANT AND SHE SAT CLOSE TO HIM WITH HER HAND ON HIS CROTCH \" I HAVE BEEN TOLD BY THE POLICE UNCLE THAT I MUST GIVE YOU SHOCK--OR HE WILL BEAT ME \"<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nHE GOT A MASSIVE HARD ON--INSTANT<br />\n<br />\nTHEN IT DAWNED ON MY FRIEND - THIS GORGEOUS THING WAS TO ADMINISTER &nbsp;A HEAVENLY BLOW JOB<br />\n<br />\nOVERJOYED HE CRIED &nbsp;<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>\" GIVE ME SHOCK-- WHY ARE YOU ASKING ?\"</b></span><br />\n<br />\nALL THOSE YOU WANT SUCH CHENGA HAFTA RAISE YOUR HANDS<br />\n<br />\nTEE HEEEE !<br />\n<br />\nABOVE STORY IS TRUE<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\">Below: &nbsp; &nbsp;When my wife went on her maiden trip after marriage --all foreign agents would cry-- \"Your wife can win a hair contest in our country hands down--any day \".</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_242M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/12435979452878916185\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Srini</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/09/navratri-festival-durga-puja-capt-ajit.html?showComment=1505884010622#c7455938261118256968\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 20, 2017 at 10:36 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_242MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nDear Capt. Ajit,<br />\n<br />\nGreetings! Happy Navarathri to you and your family.<br />\n<br />\nThe elucidation on the cosmic significance of Gayathri Mantra has left me spellbound. As a Hindu, I understood the explanation given by the Pujari, when I was initiated into my rite of passage - Upanayana. Now I realise, after reading your syllable translation and the cosmic significance, how little I understood. I literally have goose pimples, my hair stood at end. Wow! Sir, many salutations to you.<br />\n<br />\nMy wife has been always observing Navarathri and other festivals in the utmost traditional manner. I will share this post with her, she would be thrilled. Your posts on Vrat, Navarathri and significance of fasting has steeled my resolve to wring out the old and ring in the new, during this Navarathri. I seek your best wishes in this journey. I will test for myself the power of Vrat and human intention to aid someone dear to me, who is in distress.<br />\n<br />\nI have certain queries related to this post. My apologies if you have already covered this elsewhere.<br />\na)What is the \u2018cosmic event\u2019 signifying the 9 days followed by Vijayadashami \u2013 both on the macro and micro scale?<br />\nb)As you mentioned: i) Life on Earth is under the rule of vast cosmic forces that originate from the stars. ii) Sapta Rishis are cosmic allegories.<br />\nFor example, how should I interpret Maharishi Agastya\u2019s invocation of \u2018Aditya Hridayam\u2019 to Sri Rama, on the battlefield \u2013 in the cosmic sense? Did Sri Rama pray to the Sapta Rishis and the hymn was the answer he received from the cosmos?<br />\nc)In many pictures, our Gods and Rishis have been depicted seated on deer or tiger skins. Is there any special significance of these?<br />\n<br />\nI have hardly completed 10% of your posts on Sanathana Dharma. You are truly trying to impart an ocean of knowledge to all of us who haven't understood the significance of Hinduism - our way of life. Kudos to you and much appreciation to your supporting family. God Bless.<br />\n<br />\nRegards,<br />\n<br />\nSrini</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_242BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/09/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1505967775657#c3386506670348706972\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 21, 2017 at 9:52 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_70MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RTktyOAUCYQ</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IN THE VIDEO ABOVE YOU SEE SUBRAMANIAN SWAMY AND RAM JETHMALANI ARGUING ABOUT ARTICLE 370.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">RAM JETHMALANI IS SENILE.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SUBRAMANIAN SWAMY DOES NOT HAVE THE FULL PICTURE</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Article 370 of the Indian constitution is an article that grants special autonomous status to the state of Jammu and Kashmir. The article is drafted in Part XXI of the Constitution: Temporary, Transitional and Special Provisions. The State's Constituent Assembly was empowered to recommend the articles of the Indian constitution to be applied to the state or to abrogate the Article 370 altogether. After the state Constituent Assembly dissolved itself without recommending abrogation, the Article 370 was deemed to have become a permanent feature of the Indian Constitution</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE ELECTIONS TO JAMMU AND KASHMIR ASSEMBLY 1951 WAS RIGGED.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/the-kashmir-conflict-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">They exploited Article 370 and adopted Sections 6, 8 and 9 for incorporation in the Constitution under which the State was to be governed in the future.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Article 370 gave the solitary State of Jammu &amp; Kashmir the right to have a separate Constitution and separate flag, but nowhere does it say which category of Indians will enjoy all citizenship rights in Jammu &amp; Kashmir and which sections will not.</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: x-large;\"><b>PARAMOUNT CLAUSE : \"ETHNIC CLEANSING\" OF SIX LAKHS KASHMIRI PANDITS BY KASHMIRI MUSLIMS SUPPORTED BY PAKISTAN, MAKES ARTICLE 370 NULL AND VOID.</b></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/09/uniform-civil-code-in-india-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Jawaharlal Nehru the HALF BROTHER of Shiekh Abdullah ( who married the wife of LAWWRENCE OF ARABIA-- JEWESS BEGUM AKBAR JEHAN ) subverted the basic structure of the Indian Constitution in May 1954 to deprive all Indian citizens, including refugees from West Pakistan settled in Jammu province, of their fundamental right to exercise all rights in Jammu &amp; Kashmir.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Nehru and Shiek Abdullah made sure that the Permanent Residents of Jammu &amp; Kashmir shall exercise all rights all over India.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Nehru amended Article 368 without taking the Indian Parliament into confidence, though Parliament alone had the power to amend or not amend the Constitution, to amend Article 35 and add to it the atrocious Article 35A which was enforced in Jammu &amp; Kashmir through the Constitution (Application to Jammu &amp; Kashmir) Order, May 1954.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Article 35A enabled the Jammu &amp; Kashmir Constituent Assembly to deny citizenship rights to the HINDU refugees from West Pakistan and all other Indians, barring Permanent Residents of the State. Armed with absolute power, the Jammu &amp; Kashmir Constituent Assembly adopted Section 6 which said no persons who had crossed over to the state after May 1944 will be considered eligible for citizenship rights.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Nehru enforced Article 35A in Jammu &amp; Kashmir UNCONSTITUTIONALLY --more important he criminally CONCEALED it.</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">He hid the amendments from the public by not mentioning the same in the main body of the Constitution. &nbsp; The unconstitutional amendments to Article 368 and Article 35 were mentioned only in Appendix-I and Appendix-II, respectively, so that they could escape public attention--in a CRIMINAL MANNER .</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\n</span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><b style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">APPENDIX CAN NEVER HIJACK THE MAIN BODY OF ANY ARTICLE. &nbsp; &nbsp;ANY IDIOT KNOWS THIS UNLESS HE IS SENILE&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Nehru in cahoots with his HALF BROTHER Shiekh Abdullah conspired against the HINDU refugees from West Pakistan, and then further hatched a conspiracy against all Indian citizens in order to pander to communalists in Kashmir by subverting Articles 16 and 19 of the Indian Constitution which deal with the rights of Indian citizens, including fundamental rights.</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED TO 2-</span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_70BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_70b+seedFwSZD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_68T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_68TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_70b+seedFwSZD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_68B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6050364058023905817\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_68M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/09/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1505967834609#c6050364058023905817\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 21, 2017 at 9:53 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_68MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nArticle 19, for example, says that \u201cAll citizens shall have the right (a) to freedom of speech and expression, (b) to assemble peacefully and without arms, (c) to form associations or unions, (d) to move freely throughout the territory of India, (e) to reside and settle in any part of the territory of India; (f) to acquire, hold and dispose of property; and (g) to practice any profession, or to carry on any occupation, trade or business\u201d.<br />\n<br />\nIt follows that what is needed is not just the abrogation of Article 370 but also the revocation of Article 35A. This is the only course left to enable the refugees from West Pakistan and other Indians to exercise citizenship rights in Jammu &amp; Kashmir and integrate it fully into India.<br />\n<br />\nIn October 2015, the High Court of Jammu and Kashmir has ruled that the Article 370 cannot be \"abrogated, repealed or even amended.\" It explained that the clause (3) of the Article conferred power to the State's Constituent Assembly to recommend to the President on the matter of the repeal of the Article. Since the Constituent Assembly did not make such a recommendation before its dissolution in 1957, the Article 370 has taken on the features of a \"permanent provision\" despite being titled a temporary provision in the Constitution.<br />\n<br />\nBALLS!</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<b style=\"font-size: xx-large;\"><span style=\"color: magenta;\">WHAT IS DONE BY DECEIT IS \"NULL AND VOID\"</span></b></div>\n<br />\nArticle 35A came into existence by a Presidential Order passed by Dr. Rajandra Prasad ( Rothschild sponsored FAKE Kayastha ) on the advice of Nehru\u2019s cabinet in 1954...<br />\n<br />\nPresident of India has sole legislative power under article 123 power to make ordinance when either house of the Parliament is not in session. This legislative powers of the President has an EXPIRY SHELL PERIOD OF MERE SIX MONTHS....<br />\n<br />\nThe Constitution can be amended only by the Parliament as per procedure clearly laid out in Article 368. But Article 35A was never presented before the Parliament of India.<br />\n<br />\nThis effectively means, in this case, the President bypassed the amending procedure as laid out in the Constitution of India in order to add the new Article 35A. This also means that Article 368 of the Constitution, in its application to Jammu and Kashmir, also got amended! The President of India does not have legislative power, but here in this case he performed the function of Parliament!<br />\n<br />\nArticle 35A appears in the Constitution as an appendix. How can an Article, which has been implemented on the ground as if it\u2019s a part of the Constitution, be missing from the text of the Constitution?<br />\n<br />\nArticle 35A was an amendment in our Constitution via back door (Presidential order), without the involvement of India\u2019s Parliament. Article 35A is an example of the abuse of Article 370. Article 35A is a violation of the basic structure of our Constitution. It curbs certain basic rights enshrined in the very Preamble of the Constitution.<br />\n<br />\nAs a result of the implementation of Article 35A, lakhs of Indian HINDU citizens have been deprived of \u201cJUSTICE, social, economic and political\u201d and \u201cEQUALITY of status and of opportunity\u201d<br />\n<br />\nIn the laws under Article 370 read with Article 35A even the President of India may be denied a place or land for official purpose. This is a breach of trust.<br />\n<br />\nDemocratic India cannot allow any section of its population to be treated as second-rate citizens in any part of the country<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3-</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_69B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c473854046352857825\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_69M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. The marginal note of Article 368 states \u201cPower of the Parliament to amend the Constitution and procedure, therefore\u201d which means it is the Parliament that has the power to amend the Constitution. Sub-clause 2 of the Article 368 states that: \u201cAn amendment of this Constitution may be initiated only by the introduction of a Bill for the purpose in either House of Parliament, and when the Bill is passed in each House by majority of not less than two-third of the members of that House present and voting, [it shall be presented to the President who shall give his assent to the Bill and thereupon] the Constitution shall stand amended in accordance with the terms of Bill...<br />\n<br />\nThe President of India does NOT have the sole UNBRIDLED power to amend the constitution through bypass the entire Constitutional mechanism nor the Article 370 gives power to the President to insert any Article in any Part of the Constitution....<br />\n<br />\nSUBJUDICE TERM DOES NOT APPLY TO INDIA \u2013WE DON\u2019T WANT THIS LOOPHOLE TO BE USED BY IDIOTS</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<b style=\"color: purple; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_7b+seedCi4WD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_5B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7665114136643980640\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_5M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/07/draw-diagram-marine-two-stroke-main.html?showComment=1501722105294#c7665114136643980640\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 3, 2017 at 6:31 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_5MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCapt. Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nAugust 3, 2017 at 6:21 AM<br />\n<br />\nHI S,<br />\n<br />\nWHEN I WAS IN SCHOOL I WAS HAJAAAAR --NAY -- MAHAAA IMPRESSED WITH NAMES LIKE DICK PRICK AND MARY<br />\n<br />\nIF A WHITE JOHN CAME IN FRONT OF ME I WOULD LOOK AT HIM IN GREAT ADMIRATION<br />\n<br />\nALL THIS DISAPPEARED WITHIN ONE YEAR OF JOINING THE SEA AND INTERACTING WITH THE WHITE SKINNED RACE<br />\n<br />\nI FOUND THAT I WAS A 1000 TIMES BETTER THAN THEM<br />\n<br />\nA 1000 TIMES ? SOME WHITE MAN WILL EXPOSTULATE ? AUTHENTICATE YOURSELF CAPTAIN.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/naive-sailor-ship-construction-capt.html<br />\n<br />\nTHIS WAS A BRAND NEW CHEMICAL TANKER WHOSE DELIVERY I TOOK FROM A EUROPEAN YARD --CLASSED UNDER LLOYDS REGISTER -- A 100% WHITE MANs ENTERPRISE .<br />\n<br />\nLloyd's Register Group Limited (LR) is THE oldest and most respected maritime classification society, wholly owned by the Lloyd\u2019s Register Foundation, a UK enterprise dedicated to research and education in science and engineering. The organisation dates back to 1760. Lloyds is GOLD standard.<br />\n<br />\nTHEY HAD ALREADY TAKEN OUT SEVERAL SISTER SHIPS- -ALL COMMANDED BY WHITE CAPTAINS --TILL A BROWN CAPTAIN CAME ON THE SCENE.<br />\n<br />\nI made a 1000 item DEFECT LIST . Every equipment was EXCELSIOR white industry.<br />\n<br />\nI was most sarcastic-- dont read more than 40 items in a day--your WHITE brains will get overheated.<br />\n<br />\nWhen it became too much they would keep a compartment locked -and open it out for the first time for me -- with a group of the yard's best intellectuals following me inside --<br />\n<br />\n--say a CO2 room -- and I would immediately point out-- CO2 is heavier than air --put the exhaust at the bottom--- remove these \"transport \" locking plates on the 200 CO2 cylinders , or in case of real fire the bank wont release CO2 etc . You will NOT find this in the 1000 item list in the post -- as they rectified it before sailing.<br />\n<br />\nConsider this post below--<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/super-typhoon-bart-perfect-storm-capt.html<br />\n<br />\nABOVE WAS A 13 YEAR OLD SHIP-- A BRITISH OFFICERS/ CREW COMPANY --TILL A INDIAN CAPTAIN ( YOURS TRULY ) ASSUMED COMMAND<br />\n<br />\nWITHIN 24 HOURS OF TAKING OVER COMMAND I MADE A 198 ITEM DEFICIENCY LIST- WHICH THIS BRITISH ENTERPRISE WITH ALL THEIR DEADLY INSPECTION AND VETTING PROCESSES COULD NEVER EVEN IMAGINE<br />\n<br />\nONE OF THE ITEMS WAS \" THE POST SLOP TANK IS THE CLEAN SLOP TANK AND STARBOARD SLOP TANK IS THE DIRTY SLOP TANK . IN THE PAST 13 YEARS EVERY OIL RECORD BOOK ENTRY ASSUMED THE REVERSE \u201c.<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br />THIS MEANS FOR 13 YEARS EVERY WHITE CAPTAIN , CHIEF OFFICER LIED--THEIR SIGNATURES ARE IN THE OIL RECORD BOOK.</span></b><br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/annex-1-closed-cycle-wash-on-chemical.html<br />\n<br />\nTHE SHIP MOSTLY TRADED IN USA AND EUROPE.<br />\n<br />\nEVERY CAPTAIN /CHIEF OFFICER WHO SIGNED THIS BOOK COULD BE THROWN INTO JAIL AND KEYS THROWN AWAY FOR MARINE POLLUTION AND LYING WHITE IN A MOST IMPORTANT OFFICIAL LOG BOOK.<br />\n<br />\nTHE OWNER OF THE COMPANY COULD BE JAILED FOR \"NOT EMPLOYING COMPETENT OFFICERS AND NOT EXERCISING DUE DILIGENCE \".<br />\n<br />\nHOW DID THEY MAKE THIS GRAVE DISGRACEFUL MISTAKE ?<br />\n<br />\nON EVERY SHIP AT SEA , THE CAPTAINS CABIN IS ON THE TOP STARBOARD SIDE WHILE THE CHIEF ENGINEERS CABIN IS ON THE TOP POST SIDE.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS AN UNWRITTEN RULE -- AS WHEN THERE IS A CROSSING SHIP FROM STARBOARD TO POST , THE SHIP HAS TO ALTER COURSE TO STBD AND GO FROM BEHIND THE STERN OF THE CROSSING SHIP ( ROR--RULES OF THE ROAD AT SEA ).<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_5MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_5BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_5B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_6B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3275531283746292817\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_6M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/07/draw-diagram-marine-two-stroke-main.html?showComment=1501722183421#c3275531283746292817\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 3, 2017 at 6:33 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_6MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nTHIS SHIP WAS SPECIAL \u2013 \u201cEQUIVALENT \u201c \u2013<br />\n<br />\n--THE DIRTY POST SLOP WAS ON STBD SIDE AND CLEAN STBD SLOP WAS ON PORT SIDE -- A UNIQUE ABERRATION .<br />\n<br />\nYOU SEE THE MEDIOCRE WHITE BRAIN , CANNOT THINK CLEARLY . THE POSITION OF THE LOWER EQUALIZING VALVE DECIDES WHICH TANK WOULD BE CLEAN SLOP OR DIRTY SLOP TANK<br />\n<br />\nTHIS COMPANY WAS THE NO 1 COMPANY OF THE PLANET IN THE SEVENTIES WITH MAX NUMBER OF SHIPS MOST OF THEM HUGE SUPER TANKERS ..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">THE OWNER WAS A CHINESE WITH \"SIR\" IN FRONT OF HIS NAME&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\nTHEN THERE WAS ANOTHER ITEM ( AMONG 198 ) .<br />\n<br />\n\"THIS SHIP HAS MORE THAN 2000 CHARTS-- ALL AUTO SUPPLY --EVERY CHART COSTING MORE THAN 55 US DOLLARS\".<br />\n<br />\nI WROTE \" THIS SHIP IS SO HUGE THAT IT CANNOT ENTER 85% OF THE PLACES FOR WHICH WE HOLD CHARTS -- AND IT WASTES THE TIME OF THE SECOND MATE WHO HAS TO CORRECT THEM WITH WEEKLY NOTICES.\"<br />\n<br />\nTHE CHINESE \"SIR\" RAPED SEVERAL BRITISH SHORE BOSSES -- I GOT THIS REPORT FROM A FAN IN THE SHORE OFFICE -- ALL CAPTAINS AND CHIEF ENGINEERS .<br />\n<br />\nAND THEY WERE ALL HOSTILE TO ME WITHIN 24 HOURS OF ME TAKING OVER COMMAND--AS SAME \"AUTO SUPPLY\" STATE EXISTED IN ALMOST ALL THEIR LARGE SHIPS<br />\n<br />\nWHEN I SIGNED OFF AFTER THE STORM--THIS CHINESE SHIP OWNER \"SIR\" CAME TO MEET ME IN MY HOTEL.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS UBER RICH MAN WANTED TO SEE IF I AM SUPER NATURAL OR A MORTAL HUMAN.</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">HE SPAKE &nbsp; \" IT IS IMPOSSIBLE TO MAKE A 198 ITEM DEFECT LIST OF A SHIP IN JUST 24 HOURS OF ASSUMING COMMAND \" SOMETHING WHICH HAS BEEN MISSED FOR 13 YEARS OF MINUTE INSPECTIONS BY SHIP AND SHORE STAFF .... \"</span></b></div>\n<br />\n--AND MORE IMPORTANT I GUESS HE WANTED TO IMPLORE \" DEAR CAPTAIN- SPARE MY HONOURABLE CHINKY SLIT ASSHOLE --IF YOU REPORT TO US COAST GUARD I WILL LOSE MY FORTUNE AND I WILL BE IN JAIL..\"<br />\n<br />\nI CAN GIVE THOUSANDS OF SUCH EXAMPLES--<br />\n<br />\nTODAY WHEN I SEE A JOHN , DICK OR PRICK IN FRONT OF ME-- I AUTOMATICALLY ASSUME TOTAL SUPERIORITY -- HENCE MY HUMONGOUS CONTEMPT FOR \"PICKLE JOHNS\" AND \"CHUTNEY MARYS\"<br />\n<br />\nBROWN SAHAB WEARING TIE , AUR BROWN MADAME WEARING SLIT GOWN SHOWING THIGH -- HAI BHAIYYA --WITH FAKE ANGREZI ACCCENT --<br />\n<br />\n--LEKIN CHUTNEY / PICKLE - NAY-- PIG SORPOTEL KA BHAAASSS AAYENGA \"<br />\n<br />\nI ASK MY READERS TO PUT THIS IN \"FAYE SORPOTEL DZOUZAs \" WEBSITE . SHE MAY LIKE TO KNOW WHY CAPTAIN HAS A PROBLEM WITH THE \"WANNABE GORA GAANDS \"<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_7b+seedCi4WD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_7b+seedCi4WD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL WAS THE ONLY CHAMPION RACE HORSE AMONG\nUS, &nbsp;THOUSANDS OF CHOOTIYA DONKEYS <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; &nbsp; AND HE\nIS BETTER THAN ALL ENGINEERS \u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; THEY NEED TO BE EMPOWERED .<br />\n<br />\nVEDAS AND UPANISHADS REMAINED IN KERALA FROM 4000 BC TO 2000 BC.<br />\n<br />\nIN 2000 BC A NAMBOODIRI NAMED ADI SHANKARACHARYA FELT THAT HIS CLAN WERE TOO ARROGANT AND SEXUALLY DEBAUCHED . His younger brothers were supposed <span style=\"color: red;\">to practice pure \"Brahmacharyam\" by being unmarried and to dedicate themselves to preserve Vedams and rituals</span>. UNQUOTE</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nVINOD DOES NOT KNOW THAT <b><span style=\"color: blue;\">BRAHMACHARYA HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH CELIBACY OR WITHOLDING SEMEN</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nBRAHMACHARYA HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH ABSTAINING FROM SEX</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>Brahmacharya means purity of speech, of body, and of mind \u2013being a righteous person.</b></span><br />\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n\u201cJahi satrum mahabaho kamarupam durasadam\u201d \u2014Kill this powerful enemy, passion, by the observance of Brahmacharya\u201d (Bhagwad Gita -Chap. III-43).</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nPASSION MENTIONED ABOVE DOES NOT INVOLVE SEMEN AND OJAS BULLSHIT .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIT HAS MORE TO DO WITH TEMPTATION, GREED , CRAVINGS , INDULGENCE IN SENSE OBJECTS , AVARICE , SELF RESTRAINT AND EGO.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTHIS IS FOR PURIFICATION OF NADIS IN WHICH FLOWS PRANA.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIF AT ALL I CONTINUE BLOGGING, I WILL CONTINUE MY SANATANA DHARMA SERIES --UNFINISHED AT PART 83-- I WILL RESUME WITH \"PRANA\"</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTHIS FOUL LIE OF SEMEN WAS INJECTED INTO OUR SCRIPTURES BY FAKE MUTTS AND THE LYING WHITE HISTORIAN.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nROTHSCHILD USED VIVEKANANDA AND GANDHI TO SPREAD HIS FAKE BRAHMACHARYA MESSAGE.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nHINDUISM IS NOT CATHOLIC CHRISTIANITY WERE PRIESTS DO NOT MARRY. IN HINDUISM A PRIEST MUST MARRY AND HAVE CHILDREN .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nONE READER KEEPS ASKING ME WHY ADI SHANKARACHARYA WAS A BRAHMACHARI--WELL THE ANSWER IS , HIS MOTHER WAS GIVEN A BOON AND AS A RESULT OF THIS HE HAD TO DIE YOUNG WITHOUT MARRYING AND CONTINUING HIS LINEAGE.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nPatanjali Maharshi, the exponent of Raja Yoga philosophy, recommends that ten virtues should be practised by all men. The first five are: Ahimsa (non-violence), Satya (truthfulness), Brahmacharya (celibacy in thought, word and deed), Asteya (non-stealing) and Aparigraha (non-covetousness). These constitute Yama or self-restraint. The other five virtues are: Saucha (internal and external purity), Santosha (contentment), Tapas (austerity), Svadhyaya (study of scriptures or recitation of Mantra) and Isvarpranidhana (consecration of the fruits of all works to the Lord). These constitute Niyama or religious observance.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe most foul thing done was to encourage married men in Grihasta stage to practice Brahmacharya by sexual continence. font-size: large;\"><b>KAMA is about the emotional and aesthetic values of the mind ( art / poetry / food for thought etc ) \u2013has nothing to with PRICK or TWAT.</b></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nPurushartha and Ashrama Vyavastha are closely linked with each other. These help in the conduct of human activities leading towards Moksha</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nPurushartha means those actions which are proper and correct. The aim of life of an individual is determined by the doctrine of Purushartha. It also decides the course of life of man and lays down norms and values for the behaviour patterns.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nBy Purushartha we mean the pursuance of those actions which lead to the fulfillment of socially approved values and goal.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nSANATANA DHARMA WANTS MAN AND WOMAN TO MARRY AND PROCREATE</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nSANATANA DHARMA DOES NOT ALLOW MAN TO REMAIN SINGLE AND CALL HIMSELF A BRAHMACHARI \u2013THE WAY ROTHSCHILD USED GANDHI TO PROPAGATE ( WITHHOLDING SEMEN )..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nGANDHI WAS MAKING MERRY WITH TEENAGED NAKED GIRLS ON HIS BED UNDER THE SAME BLANKET</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/01/mahatma-gandhi-and-his-endless.html</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nLot of TATTUS who can get it up and homosexuals who only get sexually excited with a male asshole , have become gurus..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nJEW ROTHSCHILD ENCOURAGED HOMOSEXUALS AND IMPOTENT MEN TO BECOME GURUS.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nEnjoy sex when engaged in it with your chosen wife . Give attention and care. This is love in itself. The self control as meant by Brahmacharya brings a healthy relationship into your life and, being so channeled, gives great strength and energy, as Patanjali has explained.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe technical meaning of Brahmacharya is self-restraint, particularly mastery of perfect control over the senses- not the PRICK or DICK or LODA ( reminds me of SKODA LAUDA ) alone.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nI repeat again , forget the bull given by fake TATTUS who cant get it up / homosexual gurus \u2013 The word brahmacharya literally means a lifestyle adopted to seek and understand Brahman \u2013 the Ultimate Reality. It means \"devoting oneself to Brahman\".</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nBrahmacharya is the virtue of celibacy when unmarried and fidelity when married. It represents a virtuous lifestyle that also includes simple living, meditation and other behaviors.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nBrahmacharyam means an overall lifestyle conducive to the pursuit of sacred knowledge and spiritual liberation. Brahmacharya is a means, not an end. It usually includes cleanliness, ahimsa, simple living, studies, meditation, and voluntary restraints on certain foods, intoxicants, and behaviors-(including sexual behavior.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nQUOTE : Now what people call yajna (sacrifice) is really Brahmacharya, for only by means of Brahmacharya does the knower attain that world (of Brahman). And what people call Ishta (worship) is really Brahmacharya, for only worshipping by means of Brahmacarya does one attain the Atman (the liberated Self).</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nNow, what people call the Sattrayana (sacrificial session) is really Brahmacharya, for only by means of Brahmacharya does one obtain one's salvation from Sat (Being). And what people call the Mauna (vow of silence) is really Brahmacharya for only through Brahmacharya does one understand the Atman and then meditate.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nNow, what people call a Anasakayana (vow of fasting) is really Brahmacharya, for this Atman never perishes which one attains by means of Brahmacharya. And what people call the Aranyayana (life of a hermit) is really Brahmacharya, for the world of Brahman belongs to those who by means of Brahmacharya attain the seas Ara and Nya in the world of Brahman. For them there is freedom in all the worlds.\u201d \u2014\u2009Chandogya Upanishad, VIII.5.1 - VIII.5. 5000 BC. It is regarded as one of the most sacred of the sacraments symbolizing the holy and indissoluble union of a couple who thereafter are mutually dependent and indispensable in the performance of religious duties.<br />\n<br />\nProgeny instrumental to cementing a relationship and for bliss.<br />\n<br />\nManu Smriti clearly states that \u201che is a perfect man, who consists of his wife, himself and his offspring.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nVedas have enjoined that dharma must be observed by man together with his wife. The article is drafted in Part XXI of the Constitution: Temporary, Transitional and Special Provisions. The State's Constituent Assembly was empowered to recommend the articles of the Indian constitution to be applied to the state or to abrogate the Article 370 altogether. After the state Constituent Assembly dissolved itself without recommending abrogation, the Article 370 was deemed to have become a permanent feature of the Indian Constitution<br />\n<br />\nTHE ELECTIONS TO JAMMU AND KASHMIR ASSEMBLY 1951 WAS RIGGED.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/the-kashmir-conflict-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html<br />\n<br />\nThey exploited Article 370 and adopted Sections 6, 8 and 9 for incorporation in the Constitution under which the State was to be governed in the future.<br />\n<br />\nArticle 370 gave the solitary State of Jammu &amp; Kashmir the right to have a separate Constitution and separate flag, but nowhere does it say which category of Indians will enjoy all citizenship rights in Jammu &amp; Kashmir and which sections will not.<br />\n<br />\nPARAMOUNT CLAUSE : \"ETHNIC CLEANSING\" OF SIX LAKHS KASHMIRI PANDITS BY KASHMIRI MUSLIMS SUPPORTED BY PAKISTAN, MAKES ARTICLE 370 NULL NAD VOID.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/09/uniform-civil-code-in-india-capt-ajit.html<br />\n<br />\nJawaharlal Nehru the HALF BROTHER of Shiekh Abdullah ( who married the wife of LAWWRENCE OF ARABIA-- JEWESS BEGUM AKBAR JEHAN ) subverted the basic structure of the Indian Constitution in May 1954 to deprive all Indian citizens, including refugees from West Pakistan settled in Jammu province, of their fundamental right to exercise all rights in Jammu &amp; Kashmir.<br />\n<br />\nNehru and Shiek Abdullah made sure that the Permanent Residents of Jammu &amp; Kashmir shall exercise all rights all over India.<br />\n<br />\nNehru amended Article 368 without taking the Indian Parliament into confidence, though Parliament alone had the power to amend or not amend the Constitution, to amend Article 35 and add to it the atrocious Article 35A which was enforced in Jammu &amp; Kashmir through the Constitution (Application to Jammu &amp; Kashmir) Order, May 1954.<br />\n<br />\nArticle 35A enabled the Jammu &amp; Kashmir Constituent Assembly to deny citizenship rights to the HINDU refugees from West Pakistan and all other Indians, barring Permanent Residents of the State. Armed with absolute power, the Jammu &amp; Kashmir Constituent Assembly adopted Section 6 which said no persons who had crossed over to the state after May 1944 will be considered eligible for citizenship rights.</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">Nehru enforced Article 35A in Jammu &amp; Kashmir UNCONSTITUTIONALLY --more important he criminally CONCEALED it.</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">He hid the amendments from the public by not mentioning the same in the main body of the Constitution. &nbsp; The unconstitutional amendments to Article 368 and Article 35 were mentioned only in Appendix-I and Appendix-II, respectively, so that they could escape public attention--in a CRIMINAL MANNER .</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div>\n<br /></div>\n<div>\n<b style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">APPENDIX CAN NEVER HIJACK THE MAIN BODY OF ANY ARTICLE. &nbsp; &nbsp;ANY IDIOT KNOWS THIS UNLESS HE IS SENILE&nbsp;</b></div>\n<br />\nNehru in cahoots with his HALF BROTHER Shiekh Abdullah conspired against the HINDU refugees from West Pakistan, and then further hatched a conspiracy against all Indian citizens in order to pander to communalists in Kashmir by subverting Articles 16 and 19 of the Indian Constitution which deal with the rights of Indian citizens, including fundamental rights.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_70BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; This is the only course left to enable the refugees from West Pakistan and other Indians to exercise citizenship rights in Jammu &amp; Kashmir and integrate it fully into India.<br />\n<br />\nIn October 2015, the High Court of Jammu and Kashmir has ruled that the Article 370 cannot be \"abrogated, repealed or even amended.\" It explained that the clause (3) of the Article conferred power to the State's Constituent Assembly to recommend to the President on the matter of the repeal of the Article. Since the Constituent Assembly did not make such a recommendation before its dissolution in 1957, the Article 370 has taken on the features of a \"permanent provision\" despite being titled a temporary provision in the Constitution.<br />\n<br />\nBALLS!</div>\n<div>\n<b style=\"font-size: xx-large;\"><span style=\"color: magenta;\">WHAT IS DONE BY DECEIT IS \"NULL AND VOID\"</span></b></div>\n<br />\nArticle 35A came into existence by a Presidential Order passed by Dr. Rajandra Prasad ( Rothschild sponsored FAKE Kayastha ) on the advice of Nehru\u2019s cabinet in 1954...<br />\n<br />\nPresident of India has sole legislative power under article 123 power to make ordinance when either house of the Parliament is not in session. This legislative powers of the President has an EXPIRY SHELL PERIOD OF MERE SIX MONTHS....<br />\n<br />\nThe Constitution can be amended only by the Parliament as per procedure clearly laid out in Article 368. But Article 35A was never presented before the Parliament of India.<br />\n<br />\nThis effectively means, in this case, the President bypassed the amending procedure as laid out in the Constitution of India in order to add the new Article 35A. This also means that Article 368 of the Constitution, in its application to Jammu and Kashmir, also got amended! The President of India does not have legislative power, but here in this case he performed the function of Parliament!<br />\n<br />\nArticle 35A appears in the Constitution as an appendix. How can an Article, which has been implemented on the ground as if it\u2019s a part of the Constitution, be missing from the text of the Constitution?<br />\n<br />\nArticle 35A was an amendment in our Constitution via back door (Presidential order), without the involvement of India\u2019s Parliament. Article 35A is an example of the abuse of Article 370. Article 35A is a violation of the basic structure of our Constitution. Sub-clause 2 of the Article 368 states that: \u201cAn amendment of this Constitution may be initiated only by the introduction of a Bill for the purpose in either House of Parliament, and when the Bill is passed in each House by majority of not less than two-third of the members of that House present and voting, [it shall be presented to the President who shall give his assent to the Bill and thereupon] the Constitution shall stand amended in accordance with the terms of Bill...<br />\n<br />\nThe President of India does NOT have the sole UNBRIDLED power to amend the constitution through bypass the entire Constitutional mechanism nor the Article 370 gives power to the President to insert any Article in any Part of the Constitution....<br />\n<br />\nSUBJUDICE TERM DOES NOT APPLY TO INDIA \u2013WE DON\u2019T WANT THIS LOOPHOLE TO BE USED BY IDIOTS</div>\n<div>\n<b style=\"color: purple; SOMEONE WANTED ONE SINGLE SOLID PROOF WHICH IS TANGIBLE.<br />\n<br />\nCONSIDER THIS<br />\n<br />\n#######################<br />\n<br />\nAT SEA ON CHEMICAL TANKERS,&nbsp; SAILORS WERE FORCED TO SPRAY METHANOL INSIDE CARGO TANKS.&nbsp; &nbsp;THE WHOLE IDEA WAS TO USE THE TEST MEDIUM WHICH IS USED TO DO WALL WASH AND CHEAT AND PASS TANKS.<br />\n<br />\nIN THE \"SAFETY OF LIFE AT SEA\" ( SOLAS )&nbsp; &nbsp;RULES THERE IS A PASSAGE ON \"<b><span style=\"color: red;\">LUNG DEMAND TIME</span></b>\" WHICH HAS BEEN KOSHER WHITE WASHED AS \"&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">WORKING TIME</span></b>\" IN THE PROSE<br />\n<br />\nNO REGULATION ALLOWS SAILORS TO GO DOWN INTO TANKS AND SPRAY METHANOL .<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/airline-breathing-apparatus-on-chemical.html</span><br />\n<br />\nQUOTE: By the way NO regulation allows methanol spray with SCBA IBC sets. IBC sets are not for working in the literal sense. \" Working time \" relates to \"lung demand\" of free air, which is 10 litres / min for rest, 30 litres/ min for light work and 100 litres / min for strain of fireman's lift.&nbsp; &nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">Fill up a form in capital does NOT mean you have to take a flight to the capital city of your country.</span></b>&nbsp; &nbsp;SCBA sets are for emergencies and must be donned by two sailors. UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nON CHEMICAL TANKERS WE ARE GIVEN SPARE SCBA SETS CALLED IBC SETS FOR METHANOL SPRAYING ..<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/08/scba-self-contained-breathing-apparatus.html</span><br />\n<br />\nMETHANOL SPRAY IS JUST CHEATING YOURSELF.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/methanol-spray-on-chemical-tankers-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\nQUOTE: In the IBC code , \" working time \" has been erroneously read by vested interests as&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">official sanction</span></b>&nbsp;to do routine WORK inside chemical cargo tanks. IT IS NOT SO. \" WORKING TIME \" IS TO BE READ AS \" LUNG DEMAND TIME \" -- WHICH IS 100 LITRES OF FREE AIR A MINUTE FOR STRAIN ( OF FIREMANS LIFT RESCUE) , 30 LITRES A MINUTE FOR LIGHT ACTIVITY , AND 10 LITRES A MINUTE WHILE AT REST---UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nONLY CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL HAD THE BALLS AND THE PERCEPTION TO SPELL OUT A KOSHER LIE..<br />\n<br />\nTODAY VADAKAYILs WALL WASH METHOD IS USED ALL OVER THE GLOBE.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/02/wall-wash-method-chemical-tankers-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE WORLD RUNS ON LIES.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_65BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; BASED ON THIS THE JUDGES MAKE NONSENSE JUDGEMENTS.<br />\n<br />\nIN INDIA AFTER 30 YEARS OF TAAREQ PEH TAREEQ PEH TAREEQ AFTER A COUPLE OF JUDGES AND LAWYERS AND WITNESSES HAVE DIED--THE GRANDSONS OF BOTH PARTIES ARE SUBJECTED TO A STUPID JUDGEs WHIMS .<br />\n<br />\nTHIS STUPID JUDGE DOES NOT BAT AND EYELID WHEN HE USES SOME PAST JUDGEMENT TO RULE YOUR CASE--WHICH IS TOTALLY OUT OF CONTEXT AND TOTALLY INCONGRUENT TO PRINCIPLES OF NATURAL JUSTICE<br />\n<br />\nTHE SPIKED FIST WHICH CRUSHED AND BLOODIED THE NOSE ALWAYS WINS ..SEE THE FIST WAS SUBJECTED TO TRAUMA BY THE NOSE .<br />\n<br />\nTHIS WILL STOP-- EVEN IF GOOGLE TAKES DOWN THIS SITE BY FALSE CHARGES<br />\n<br />\nGOOGLE PLUS ( FOR CONTENT ) WAS TAKEN DOWN WHEN THIS BLOGSITE ( RUN WITH A LAPTOP AND TWO FINGERS ) THREATENED TO OVERTAKE BBC -- ROTHSCHILDs BEHEMOTH WITH HUNDREDS OF OFFICES WORLDWIDE AND THOUSANDS OF EMPLOYEES<br />\n<br />\nALL ARE AT A LOSS NOW-- CAPT AJIT VADAKAYILs PROFILE VIEW IS 309 MILLION. font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">WHEN PM MODI WENT TO ISRAEL--STANDING AT THE END OF THE RECEPTION LINE WAS THE HEAD OF AHMEDDIYA SECT IN ISRAEL--PERSONALLY INTRODUCED TO MODI BY BENJAMIN NETANYAHU.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">I TOLD MY WIFE , WE WERE WATCHING LIVE -- THEY HAS TO BE AN AHMEDIYYA JEW PRETENDING TO BE A MUSLIM. SHE WAS VERY HAPPY WHEN I WAS VINDICATED<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">IN THE CASE OF GENIUS DIVYA NARENDRA , HIS SLEEING PARTNERS THE VINKLEVOSS TWINS HAD THE WHEREWITHAL TO SUE JEW MARK ZUCKERBERG --AND THEY CATAPULTED THEMSELVES TO FAME --USING A HOLLYWOOD MOVIE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">WHAT IS A SLEEPING PARTNER ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">AT CORNELL ONCE A KOREAN UNDERGRADUATE BOY TEAMED UP WITH MY ELDER SON ( MASTERS ) FOR A PROJECT IN COMPUTER SCIENCE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">THEY DECIDED ON WHAT THEY WOULD DO.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">THE KOREAN BOY THEN WROTE THE ENTIRE CODE \"LIKE HOW HE WOULD WRITE A LETTER TO HIS FRIEND\"-- THIS WAS WHAT MY SON TOLD ME AND MY WIFE ON SKYPE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">AT FREQUENT INTERVALS HE WOULD CRAVE THE INDULGENCE OF MY SON\u2014IMPLORING \"SIR, AM I RIGHT\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">MY SON WAS SO EMBARRASSED -- THE KOREAN DID THE WHOLE PROJECT IN ONE FLOWING SHOT -- LITERALLY THANKFUL WHEN MY SON SAID-- \" YES , CONTINUE\" TO HIS \" SIR- AM I RIGHT SO FAR ? \"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">WHEN THE CODE WAS WRITTEN AND TESTED -- MY ELDER SON TOLD HIM&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\"SO FAR YOU HAVE DONE EVERYTHING&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;-- I WILL WRITE THE FINAL PROJECT REPORT \"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">SO MY SON WROTE THE CODE PRESENTATION OVERNIGHT AND SHOWED IT TO THE KOREAN BOY THE NEXT DAY -- HE LOOKED ON MY SON AS AN ABSOLUTE HERO -- STARS IN HIS EYES AND CRIED \" WOW\u2014 I COULD HAVE NEVER DONE THIS , SIR\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">MY SON WAS A SLEEPING PARTNER IN THIS PROJECT. HE WAS HONEST TO ADMIT IT .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">MY SON INSISTED AND WROTE THE KOREAN BOYs NAME FIRST FOLLOWED BY HIS NAME-- THROUGH COLLEGE RULES REQUIRED THE MASTERs STUDENTS NAME FIRST AND THEN THE UNDERGRADUATE STUDENTs NAME<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">JEW ALBERT EINSTEIN WAS A MEDIOCRE BRAIN\u2014HE WAS ABSOLUTE DISGRACE IN MATH\u2014EINSTEIN DID NOT HAVE A MATHEMATICAL BRAIN-- HE OUTSOURCED ALL HIS MATH..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">ALL HIS AWARD WINNING IDEAS OF EINSTEIN IS STOLEN FROM FROM VEDAS AND SECONDARY ONES -- STOLEN FROM AN INTELLECTUAL PATENT POOL OF WHICH HE WAS CLEVERLY PLACED AS THE GUARDIAN CLERK BY JEW ROTHSCHILD<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">SRINIVASAN RAMANUJAN THE INDIAN MATH GENIUS --LOST HIS DIARY, IN WHICH HE HAD RECORDED ALL HIS PRICELESS FINDINGS . THE JEW BASTARDS STOLE IT. AFTER THAT RAMANUJAN USED TO DO HIS WORK ON A SLATE , RUB IT OFF AND RETAIN RESULTS INSIDE HIS HEAD<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;
