Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/12/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_14.html?showComment=1513299301098#c2062343270619180569\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">December 15, 2017 at 6:25 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_22MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">SOMEONE ASKED ME TO EXPOUND ON QUANTUM ENTANGLEMENT IN VEDAS</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">WHY DOES WIKIPEDIA BAN CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL. BECAUSE I GO WITH VEDAS AGAINST STUPID PEOPLE LIKE ISAAC NEWTON AND ALBERT EINSTEIN ( WHO SAYS FASTER THAN SPEED OF LIGHT IS IMPOSSIBLE ) \u2013 BOTH THIEVES WHO STOLE FROM VEDAS WITHOUT UNDERSTANDING .</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">ANCIENT VEDIC ASTROLOGY FACTORED IN QUANTUM ENTANGLEMENT.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">One of the core objections to astrology is that there is no known scientific mechanism to account for how it all works. Well for this modern scientists have to work hard for another 500 years . The lack of a mechanism using 5 low bandwidth human senses is MAD justification for dismissing a Quantum entanglement phenomenon.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Quantum entanglement says that two entangled particles affect each other irrespective of distance and time. We humans are NOT what you see in the mirror, we are balls of energy called SOULS.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">IN KERALA ASTROLOGY WE RUSTLE COWRIE SHELLS. MY WIFE MATCHED MORE THAN 500 HOROSCOPES FOR MY ELDER SONs BRIDE . AT EVERY INSTANCE THE ASTROLOGER RUSTLED COWRIE SHELLS TO PICK UP A RANDOM NUMBER OF SHELLS.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">The lodestone (compass) was used successfully for several millennia in India. Kerala navigators traded with crete . Yet, no white man understood the Earth's magnetic field until the 20th century.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">In Mahabharata Arjuna shot his arrow into the red ruby eye of a magnetic fish floating unsteadily overhead in a transparent rotating bowl filled with water, by looking at its reflection in a placid pool of water below. He won the hand of Princess Draupadi at the Swayamvar. This is the ultimate test of human consciousness .</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Only a couple of mammals like elephant, dolphin and bonobos can pass the mirror and colour test.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Quantum entanglement breaks the bedrock rules of standard physics: that nothing can travel FASTER THAN LIGHT , that objects are only influenced by their immediate surroundings\u2014that we need to verify by using our limited bandwith five sense for scientific approval.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Through quantum entanglement, seemingly independent particles become intertwined. Entangled atoms can no longer be considered separate entities, but make sense only as part of a whole \u2014 even though the atoms may be far apart.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Quantum entangled particles can be used for \u201cquantum communication\u201d \u2014 a means of sending super secure messages that doesn't rely on cables, wireless signals, or code.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Through a trick of quantum mechanics, you can link two particles in a special way, separate them, and then observe the effects of one upon the other over large distances. This is known as quantum entanglement \u2014 placing two objects in the same entangled quantum state.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Entanglement can be demonstrated in the lab with particles of light. When these two particles, or photons, are separated over large distances, they are still correlated with each other. If you measure one particle, the other particle's state will be determined immediately no matter how far it is away.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Because any interference with an entangled particle, even the mere act of observing it, automatically affects its partner, these missives can't be hacked. To hear quantum physicists tell it, entangled particles could help build a \u201cquantum internet,\u201d give rise to new kinds of coding, and allow for faster-than-light communication \u2014 possibilities that have powerful appeal in an era where hospitals, credit card companies, government agencies, even election systems are falling victim to cyber attacks.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Quantum entanglement is a quantum mechanical phenomenon in which the quantum states of two or more objects have to be described with reference to each other, even though the individual objects may be spatially separated. This leads to correlations between observable physical properties of the systems.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">CONTINUED TO 2-</span></div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_22BR\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span id=\"bc_0_22b+seedBpewD\" kind=\"d\"></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_18T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_22b+seedBpewD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_18TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_18TN\"></span></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_18TD\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_22b+seedBpewD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_22b+seedBpewD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_18TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_18TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n</div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_22b+seedBpewD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"></span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_18TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_22b+seedBpewD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_18B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5166903869757240958\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_18MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">CONTINUED FROM 1-</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">For example, it is possible to prepare two particles in a single quantum state such that when one is observed to be spin-up, the other one will always be observed to be spin-down and vice versa, this despite the fact that it is impossible to predict, according to quantum mechanics, which set of measurements will be observed.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">As a result, measurements performed on one system seem to be instantaneously influencing other systems entangled with it. Quantum entanglement has applications in the emerging technologies of quantum computing and quantum cryptography, and has been used to realize quantum teleportation experimentally.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Imagine you are a photon, a packet of light. You are a tiny blip of energy, hurtling through the universe on your own. But you have a twin, another photon to whom you have been intimately connected since the day you were born. No matter what distance separates you, be it the width of a lab bench or the breadth of the universe, you mirror each other. Whatever happens to your twin instantaneously affects you, and vice versa.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Entangled photons don't need wires or cables to link them, but on Earth it is necessary to use a fiber optic cable to transmit one of the particles to its desired location. But fibers absorb light as the photon travels through, so the quantum connection weakens with every mile the particle is transmitted. The previous distance record for what's known as quantum teleportation, or sending information via entangled particles, was about 141 kilometers</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">But no light gets absorbed in space, because there's nothing to do the absorbing. Space is empty. This means that entangled particles can be transmitted long distances across the vacuum and not lose information. Entangled particles sent through space could vastly extend the distance across which entangled particles communicate. The behavior of entangled particles in space and across vast distances offers insight into the nature of space-time.. Entangled photons know what their partner is doing</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Modern physicists know that there are actually four fundamental forces: the two nuclear forces, the electromagnetic force and the gravitational force. All of these play a role in binding matter together, from the tiniest of atoms to the largest of planets.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">It is well known in physics experiments that the observer can become entangled with the object that they are measuring, changing the measurement.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">It is written in the Vedas that we are all entangled in some way, and there really is a connection between every living thing in the galaxy. The effects of quantum entanglement tend to be very small for everyday objects.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Ancient Maharishis with 12 strand DNA and king sized pineal glands used their bodies for generating laser beams.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Processes in large biomolecules could be influenced by quantum entanglement effects. In the world of condensed matter physics \u2014 the study of solids \u2014 entanglement is more commonplace.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">A superconductor floating over a magnet in the Meissner effect \u2014 are from macroscopic quantum entanglements of electrons, or a spooky \"force\" acting over large distances. Quantum entanglement plays a role in modern physics and it is a binding principle for matter and energy. However, quantum entanglement on a large scale is difficult to achieve, and even more difficult to observe in living creatures.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Scientists are still struggling to develop a theory of Quantum Gravity and as a result a Grand Unified Field Theory\u2014which is represented by the divine 3D geometry of Sri Yantra\u2014the symbol of OM , whose digital number is 108.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">In Vedic Puranas the Great bear constellation stars ( 7 Sapt Rishis ) and entangled with their 7 wives in Pleiades constellation</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">CONTINUED TO 3-</span></div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_19B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; We live in a time obstructed world using 5 senses -- and also a timeless realm in the quantum dimension, where what you see is NOT what you get.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Without factoring in consciousness there can be NO Theory of Every Thing (TOE) and Grand Unification Theory (GUT). They could transcend the senses and limitations of space-time.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">In the quantum picture, electromagnetic radiation has a dual nature, existing both as waves and as streams of particles called photons. Photons are exchanged whenever electrically charged subatomic particles interact.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">The photon has no electric charge, so it does not experience the electromagnetic force itself\u2014in other words, photons cannot interact with one another.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">At the level of quantum reality the universe is not made up of things. The word origin of MAYA is derived from the Sanskrit roots MA ( not ) and YA ( that ). The term MAYA is mentioned 72 times in Rigveda written down in Sanskrit in 5000 BC. Maya is mentioned 29 times in the Atharva Veda.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">In Puranas and Vaishnava theology, Maya is described as one of the nine shaktis of the reclining Vishnu. MAYA is the veritable fabric of duality, and she performs this role at the behest of BrahmAn, the morphogenetic consciousness field.. The Supreme God is not bound by Maya just as magicians do not believe the illusions of their own magic.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Our 5 senses serve as a filter allowing us to experience only what is absolutely necessary for our physical existence. Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nDecember 29, 2017 at 5:18 AM<br />\n<br />\nBEFORE THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA--<br />\n<br />\nFULL MOON DAY ( POORNIMA ) AND THREE DAYS FOLLOWING IT..<br />\n<br />\nAND ..<br />\n<br />\nNEW MOON DAY ( AMAVASYA ) -- AND THREE DAYS FOLLOWING IT..<br />\n<br />\nWERE HOLIDAYS --FOR FASTING ..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/amavasya-poornima-ekadashi-fasting.html<br />\n<br />\nSIX FIXED HOLIDAYS IN A MONTH\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIF YOU DO THIS TODAY IN MODERN TIMES--AND EAT ORGANIC FOOD , YOU WILL NOT GET CANCER..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN THE EVIL WHITE INVADER-- BASTARD-- CAME TO INDIA-- HE MADE US WORSE THAN MONKEYS BY MAKING US FAST ON WRONG MEANINGLESS DATES ..<br />\n<br />\nBY 1947 JEW ROTHSCHILD CREATED HUNDREDS OF FAKE MUTTS IN INDIA. \u2026 HE MADE THE PONTIFFS OF THE 4 ORIGINAL MUTTS CRYPTO JEWS WITH PALE EYES --STOPPING THE 4000 YEAR OLD TRADITION OK KERALA NAMBOODIRIS HEADING THE 4 ORIGINAL MUTTS ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE POST ABOVE IS THE REPEAT THE MOST IMPORTANT FOR 1.1 BILLION HINDUS ON THIS PLANET..<br />\n<br />\nSPRING TIDES ARE STRONGEST THREE DAYS-- REPEAT ---THREE DAYS AFTER FULL MOON AND NEW MOON..<br />\n<br />\nTides are long-period waves that roll around the planet as the ocean is \"pulled\" back and forth by the gravitational pull of the moon and the sun as these bodies interact with the Earth in their monthly and yearly orbits\u2026<br />\n<br />\nDuring full or new moons\u2014which occur when the Earth, sun, and moon are nearly in alignment\u2014average tidal ranges are slightly larger. ..This occurs twice each month. ..<br />\n<br />\nThe moon appears new (dark) when it is directly between the Earth and the sun. The moon appears full when the Earth is between the moon and the sun. In both cases, the gravitational pull of the sun is \"added\" to the gravitational pull of the moon on Earth, causing the oceans to bulge a bit more than usual. This means that high tides are a little higher and low tides are a little lower than average.<br />\n<br />\nSpring tides, has nothing to do with the season of spring. Rather, the term is derived from the concept of the tide \"springing forth.\" ..<br />\n<br />\nSpring tides occur twice each lunar month all year long, without regard to the season\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://tides.mobilegeographics.com/calendar/month/547.html<br />\n<br />\nIN THE LINK ABOVE YOU CAN SEE THAT FULL MOON IS ON 3RD DEC 2017..<br />\n<br />\nTHREE DAYS LATER THE DATE IS 6TH DEC..<br />\n<br />\nTHE HIGH TIDE ( SPRING ) IS 12.5 METRES --THE HIGHEST..<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD TOOK AWAY INDIANS TO WORK AS INDENTURED LABOUR.. HE CUT THEM OFF CULTURALLY FROM INDIA BY INTRODUCING FAKE FESTIVALS AT FAKE DATES ..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/04/indentured-coolie-slavery-reinvented.html<br />\n<br />\nIF CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL WAS NOT BORN ON THIS PLANET..-- HINDUS WOULD HAVE NEVER EVER KNOW ABOUT THIS HUMONGOUS DECEIT\u2026 THIS IS WHY I STARTED THIS BLOGSITE ..<br />\n<br />\nHUMAN BODY AND BRAIN IS FULL OF WATER --AND SPRING TIDES AFFECT US..<br />\n<br />\nWater covers 70 percent of Earth\u2019s surface, makes up 66% of the human body. Brain is 83% water, blood-92%, kidneys - 82%, liver-69% , muscles-75%, bones-28%...<br />\n<br />\nIn my language Malayalam and in Sanskrit Kapha, Pitta and Vata means the same. Kapha is mucous , Pitta is bile and Vata means vayu or fart ( flatulence ). ..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN YOU FAST YOU BALANCE THE TRI DOSHAS..<br />\n<br />\nMost Hindus observe fast on Purnima and Amavasya. ..<br />\n<br />\nPeople who fast SERIOUSLY continue till the third day when the water pull/ push in human cells is highest . ..<br />\n<br />\nThese three days Hindus fast or take light veggie food rich in Magnesium\u2026<br />\n<br />\nFasting is done to reduce the acidic content in our system and to slow down the metabolic rates\u2026 This restores the body and mind balance. ..Meditation helps in centering your body, mind and soul\u2026<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2\u2014</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_141BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; There is a higher sodium content in the cell, therefore a higher hydrogen (acidifying) content, and as water follows sodium in the body, the water content of the cell starts to swell. ..<br />\n<br />\nSo the cell is under pressure from high acidity \u2013 so it pulls in more calcium, which displaces more magnesium causing an imbalance\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe moon-pull is much gentler than the sun-push. substitutions whenever convenient, and she called them \"amazingly accurate predictions\".</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\nOccasionally she went out on a limb and made future predictions, and when those years came and went with none of her predictions coming true, she'd issue updated editions of her books with new names and dates and make the same tired old predictions again. First she interpreted references to Moammar Qaddafi, and later changed them to the Ayatollah Khomeini, and later changed them again to Saddam Hussein..</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\nNEW YORK NEVER EXISTED DURING TIMES OF NOSTRADAMUS .. THE SHIP WHICH I SERVED AS SECOND MATE WAS THE FIRST TO PUMP 280,000 TONNED OF RASTANURA CRUDE OIL INTO VADINAR..<br />\n<br />\nTHE DISTANCE FROM MATHURA OIL REFINERY TO TAJ MAHAL ( TO THE SOUTH EAST ) IS JUST 48 KM.. THIS PIPELINE FROM VADINAR DEEP SEA TERMINAL TO MATHURA REFINERY IS ABOUT 1800 KM LONG.. A MASSIVE INVESTMENT FOR THE PROSPERITY OF BHARATATA ..<br />\n<br />\nAT THAT TIME I WAS A YOUNG OFFICER ( 1977 ) AND I SAID BULLSHIT -- WHEN I HEARD THE TOP IOC OFFICIALS TALKING ABOUT SHUTTING DOWN MATHURA REFINERY TO SAVE TAJ MAHAL - I CALLED THEM CUNTS !<br />\n<br />\nNow --<br />\n<br />\nI have carried huge 30 to 35 ton marble blocks from Sicily Italy ( Reggio Calabria ) to Kuwait , for making statues for the Kuwait Emir's palace. These marble blocks were unpolished and you would think it was a huge block of white chalk or limestone.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS WAS THE YEAR 1981 , AND I WAS 37 YEARS YOUNGER.. A BACHELOR..<br />\n<br />\nWE HAD HEAVY DERRICKS FROM 40 TONNES VALLES TO 125 TONNES JUMBOS ..<br />\n<br />\nDIGRESSION : ON THE SAME SHIP I LOADED A NUCLEAR PLANT FOR SADDAM HUSSAIN ( ITALY ) AND LANDED IT DIRECTLY INTO TRUCKS AT AL-KUWAIT PORT\u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHE SHIP HAD TWEEN DECKS ( UPPER AND LOWER ) INSIDE THE HOLD-- WHICH MEANT DOZENS OF HUGE HYDRAULIC CYLINDERS TO LIFT THE HATCH COVERS AND TWIN DECK COVERS..<br />\n<br />\nMY CAPTAIN WAS A MALAYALI IDIOT ( WE CALLED HIM FUCK-KNOWS-STEPHANOS ) WHO CAME UP FROM THE RANKS-- AND SO WHEN IT CAME TO USING BRAINS , I AS A THREE STRIPER CHIEF OFFICER HAD TO USE IT TO SAVE THE VENTURE--EVERY TIME.. MY CREW / COMPANY ( SCI ) LOOKED UP TO ME..</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">BELOW-- WHAT I DESCRIBED AT HAMBURG DRY DOCK WAS WHAT EXACTLY HAPPENED TO THE INDIAN NAVY WARSHIP IN MUMBAI LOCKS WHICH CAPSIZED RECENTLY..&nbsp; &nbsp; READ A MOST CRITICAL COMMENT DATED 6TH DEC 2016..&nbsp; &nbsp; I HAD TO COMMENT BECAUSE OUR INDIAN NAVY IS FULL OF CUNTS SANS HONOUR ..</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/india-stands-tall-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\nI WANTED THE TOP LAYER OF THE MARBLE BLOCK TO BE COVERED WITH LARGE PLASTIC SHEATH WRAPPING.. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_10.html?showComment=1525996919249#c7666295950680842272\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 11, 2018 at 5:31 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_71MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\">THE PASSAGE CHANNEL OF THE OIL INTO THE MARBLE BLOCK INTERIOR CAN NEVER BE POLISHED..AND THIS SPOT WOULD BE YELLOW FOREVER ON WHITE BACK GROUND..</span></div>\n<br />\nIN THE TAJ MAHAL, THE IDIOTS HAVE USED HEAVY DUTY ACIDIC DETERGENTS TO CLEAN THE MARBLE SLABS --AND THIS CAUSES THE MARBLE TO LOSE ITS ANCIENT POLISH AND BECOME SURFACE ROUGH... WHEN THIS HAPPENS DIRT AND OIL ENTERS THE MICRO PORES ..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS WHY , WHEN I MOVED INTO MY NEW HOME TWO DECADES AGO-- I SAW HUGE WHITE RAJASTANI MARBLE SLABS IN THE KITCHEN -- I GOT THEM RIPPED OFF AND CHANGED TO HIGHLY POLISHED SUPERIOR GRANITE WHOSE UNPOLISHED PORES WERE SMALLER ..<br />\n<br />\nALL CALLED ME CRAZY-- I SAID, I KNOW WHAT I AM DOING...THESE SURFACES WOULD BE CONSTANTLY COVERED BY OIL AND HARSH DETERGENTS..AND WOULD BE A DIRTY YELLOW EYE SORE SOONER THAN LATER ..<br />\n<br />\nWISDOM: WHEN YOU USE WHITE MARBLE SLABS--ENSURE THAT THE SURFACE IF HIGHLY POLISHED ..THIS IS EASIER DONE ON HORIZONTAL SURFACE WITHOUT GROOVES--AND ALMOST IMPOSSIBLE TO DO ON CURVED DOMES...<br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<b style=\"color: magenta; font-size: x-large;\">A COARSE UNPOLISHED MARBLE SURFACE HAS PITS WHICH HOLDS FOREIGN MATERIAL..</b></div>\n<div>\n<br /></div>\nI WAS THE FIRST TO INTRODUCE \"PASSIVATION\" ON STAINLESS STEEL CHEMICAL TANKERS USING NITRIC ACID-- TO BUILD UP AN ANGSTROM THIN VENEER OF CHROMIUM OXIDE.. I HAD A RUNNING BATTLE WITH THE WHITE POWERS WHO RULED THE SEAS.. I WON..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/05/stainless-steel-chemicaltankers.html</span><br />\n<br />\nON CHEMICAL TANKERS WE CARRY TOXINS LIKE MDI ( WHICH KILLED IN BHOPAL ), CARINOGENS LIKE BENZENE, STRONG ACIDS LIKE SULFURIC ACID, STRONG ALKALIES LIKE CAUSTIC POTASH , WHITE WINE, POTABLE RUM, ORANGE JUICE ETC..<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/04/passivation-on-stainless-steel-chemical.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHIS POST ( ON TRUCKS ) IS FOR INDIAS FOOD AND TRANSPORT MINISTERIES.. IT WENT IGNORED.. LUYTENS DESH DROHI BASTARDS WHO ARE BHOOKA FOR A PIECE OF JUDAS SILVER\u2026<br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">THIS BLOGSITE WILL SEND THESE LUTYENS TRAITORS TO JAIL\u2014THEY SHALL WAIT..</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/08/tanker-lorries-carrying-liquids-in-bulk.html</span><br />\n<br />\nHEAVY DUTY ACIDIC DETERGENT CLEANERS SPOIL THE SURFACE OF POLISHED MARBLE..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS WHO THEY UNEARTHED THE GOLD AT PADMANABHA SWAMY TEMPLE IN KERALA.. ONE OVER SMART MALAYALI PUJARI USED STRONG AMWAY DETERGENT ON A BLACK GREASY VISHNU IDOL-- AND THE IDOL SUDDENLY STARTED SHINING LIKE GOLD..<br />\n<br />\nNOW ABOUT FLYING BROWN ALGAE..WHICH MADE THE BOTTOM OF THE CEREBRAL BARREL MELORDS GO INTO A TIZZY..<br />\n<br />\nWHITE TAJ MAHAL DOMES CAN BE DARKENED BY NANO CARBON EMISSIONS FROM CNG CARS, NANO CARBON EMISSIONS FROM LPG COOKING CYLINDERS, DIESEL EXHAUSTS OF TRUCKS, DUST STORMS EMANATING FROM PAKISTAN SIDE, ACID RAIN WHOSE FOUNTAIN HEAD IS OIL REFINERIES IN THE SAUDI ARABIAN DESERT OR POLLUTION EVEN FURTHER AWAY..<br />\n<br />\nCALIFORNIAN WINE IS SHIT - BECAUSE&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">POLLUTION FROM CHINA TRAVELS ACROSS THE PACIFIC OCEAN IN 3 DAYS FLAT LIKE A HIGH ALTITUDE BALLOON</span></b>&nbsp;AND RAINS DOWN ON THE WEST COAST OF USA.. INSTEAD OF UNDERSTANDING THIS THE CUNTS IN USA ASKED ASKED SHIPS TO REDUCE SPEED AND USE LIGHT DIESEL OIL INSTEAD OF HEAVY FUEL OIL..<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE WRITTEN ABOUT IT 7 YEARS AGO.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">AL fuckin\u2019 BIRUNI STUDIED IN KODUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY AND TOOK ELABORATE NOTES WITH HIM -WITHOUT UNDERSTANDING, AS HE WAS NOT VERY BRIGHT<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Al-Biruni was a Sanskrit scholar who learnt Math and astronomy in from Namboodiri professors adept in Sanskrit and Arabic .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Let me quote Wikipedia -<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">QUOTE: Al-Biruni wrote an encyclopedic work on India called \u201cTarikh Al-Hind\u201d (History of India) in which he explored nearly every aspect of Indian life, including religion, history, geography, geology, science, and mathematics. My book is nothing but a simple historic record of facts. I shall place before the reader the theories of the Hindus exactly as they are, and I shall mention in connection with them similar theories of the Greeks in order to show the relationship existing between them.(1910, Vol. 1, p. 7;1958, p. 5)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Hindus considered Muslims violent and impure, and did not want to share anything with him.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Over time, Al-Biruni won the welcome of Hindu scholars. Al-Biruni collected books and studied with these Hindu scholars to become fluent in Sanskrit, discover and translate into Arabic the mathematics, science, medicine, astronomy and other fields of arts as practiced in 11th century India. He was inspired by the arguments offered by Indian scholars who believed earth must be ellipsoid shape, with yet to be discovered continent at earth's south pole, and earth's rotation around the sun is the only way to fully explain the difference in daylight hours by latitude, seasons and earth's relative positions with moon and stars.[36] Al-Biruni was also critical of Indian scribes who he believed carelessly corrupted Indian documents while making copies of older documents.[37] Al-Biruni's translations as well as his own original contributions reached Europe in 12th and 13th century, where they were actively sought.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">CONTINUED TO 2--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">CONTINUED FROM 1--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">While others were killing each other over religious differences, Al-Biruni had a remarkable ability to engage Hindus in peaceful dialogue. Mohammad Yasin puts this dramatically when he says, \u201cThe Indica is like a magic island of quiet, impartial research in the midst of a world of clashing swords, burning towns, and burned temples.\u201d (Indica is another name for Al-Biruni\u2019s history of India). (Yasin, 1975, p. 212). :UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Al-Biruni</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">############################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b>Ibn al-haytham<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Ibn fuckin\u2019 al-Haytham or Alhazen has been made out to be the first theoretical physicists, -- a system where a hypothesis must be proved by mathematical evidence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Alhazen\u2019s ( Ibn al-Haytham) science of optics is not his own. Whatever he wrote on Astronomy about the Milky way ( Akash Ganga ) was bought for gold.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">############################################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-size: x-large;\">Ab\u016b K\u0101mil Shuj\u0101\u02bf ibn Aslam</span><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Ab\u016b K\u0101mil Shuj\u0101\u02bf ibn fuckin\u2019 Aslam studied in Kodungallur University in 889 AD. He was given ready made translated to Arabic knowledge of Math in exchange for vast amount of gold.. Fibonacci stumbled on his work in Bejaya and patented it in his own name.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/12/perfect-six-pack-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">################################################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">Ibn Zuhr</b></span><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Ibn fuckin\u2019 Zuhr is considered a great cat in Surgery.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">BALLS !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Ibn Zuhr was not a surgeon at all. He bought ready made translated to Arabic texts on surgery from the Cordoba library for gold.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">NOW I HAVE BAD NEWS FOR JEW , MUSLIMS AND CHRISTIANS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">IT IS ABOUT A KERALA MERCHANT IN THE CALICUT KINGs EMPLOYMENT \u2013 A THIYYA NAMED MAIMONIDES<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">THERE IS A STATUE OF HIM IN CORDOBA MADE BY THE JEWS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Jews call him Moshe ben Maimon. ( statue below in Cordoba )..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Muslims call him Abu Imran Musa bin Maimun .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Christians call him Maimonides.</span><span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">THE LIBRARY OF CORDOBA IN SPAIN WAS RUN BY THE CALICUT KING. WESTERN UNIVERSITIES WERE STARTED BY LIFTING KNOWLEDGE FROM HERE . AND OF COURSE THEY HAD THE LIFTED AND PATENTED GREEK KNOWLEDGE TOO .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">THE HUGE SPICE BAZAAR OUTSIDE CORDOBA LIBRARY WAS OWNED BY THE CALICUT KING.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-size: x-large;\"><b>Ab\u016b K\u0101mil Shuj\u0101\u02bf ibn Aslam</b></span><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; Fibonacci stumbled on his work in Bejaya and patented it in his own name.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/12/perfect-six-pack-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">################################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-size: x-large;\"><b>Muhammad ibn Musa al-Khwarizmi</b></span><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Mathematician Muhammad ibn fuckin\u2019 Musa al-Khwarizmi studied in Kodungallur University in Kerala.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Fibonacci took his Arabic works to Italy from Bejaya , Algeria.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">ALGEBRA is derived from Al-Jabr, one of the two operations he used to solve quadratic equations. Algorism and algorithm stem from Algoritmi, the Latin form of his name.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Let me quote wikipedia:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">QUOTE- Ibn al-Nad\u012bm's Kit\u0101b al-Fihrist includes a short biography on al-Khw\u0101rizm\u012b together with a list of the books he wrote. Al-Khw\u0101rizm\u012b accomplished most of his work in the period between 813 and 833. After the Muslim conquest of Persia, Baghdad became the centre of scientific studies and trade, and many merchants and scientists from as far as China and India traveled to this city, as did al-Khw\u0101rizm\u012b. He worked in Baghdad as a scholar at the House of Wisdom established by Caliph al-Ma\u2019m\u016bn, where he studied the sciences and mathematics, which included the translation of Greek and Sanskrit scientific manuscripts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Al-Khw\u0101rizm\u012b's Z\u012bj al-Sindhind[11] (Arabic: \u0632\u064a\u062c \u0627\u0644\u0633\u0646\u062f \u0647\u0646\u062f\u200e, \"astronomical tables of Sindh and Hind\") is a work consisting of approximately 37 chapters on calendrical and astronomical calculations and 116 tables with calendrical, astronomical and astrological data, as well as a table of sine values. This is the first of many Arabic Zijes based on the Indian astronomical methods known as the sindhind.[22] The work contains tables for the movements of the sun, the moon and the five planets known at the time. This work marked the turning point in Islamic astronomy. Hitherto, Muslim astronomers had adopted a primarily research approach to the field, translating works of others and learning already discovered knowledge.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">-UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;
